00352 typedef enum
00353 {
00354       CITYTABLE_ELEMENT_NONE = 0,
00355       CITYTABLE_ELEMENT_CITYINFO,
00356       CITYTABLE_ELEMENT_CITYTABLE,
00357       CITYTABLE_ELEMENT_CITYTABLEROW,
00358       CITYTABLE_ELEMENT_CITYLIST,
00359       CITYTABLE_ELEMENT_CITY,
00360       CITYTABLE_ELEMENT_INDEX,
00361       CITYTABLE_ELEMENT_BASESECTOR,
00362       CITYTABLE_ELEMENT_BASESECTOR_X,
00363       CITYTABLE_ELEMENT_BASESECTOR_Y,
00364       CITYTABLE_ELEMENT_TOWNPOINT,
00365       CITYTABLE_ELEMENT_TOWNPOINT_X,
00366       CITYTABLE_ELEMENT_TOWNPOINT_Y,
00367 } CITYTABLE_PARSE_STAGE;
00368 
00369 typedef struct
00370 {
00371       UINT32      uiIndex;
00372       UINT8 ubBaseX;
00373       UINT8 ubBaseY;
00374       POINT townPoint;
00375 } cityInfo;
00376 
00377 typedef struct
00378 {
00379       CITYTABLE_PARSE_STAGE   curElement;
00380 
00381       INT8                          szCharData[MAX_CHAR_DATA_LENGTH+1];
00382       cityInfo                      curCityInfo;
00383       UINT32                              uiRowNumber;
00384       
00385       UINT32                              currentDepth;
00386       UINT32                              maxReadDepth;
00387 } citytableParseData;
00388 
00389 static void XMLCALL
00390 citytableStartElementHandle(void *userData, const char *name, const char **atts)
00391 {
00392       citytableParseData * pData = (citytableParseData *) userData;
00393 
00394       if(pData->currentDepth <= pData->maxReadDepth) //are we reading this element?
00395       {
00396 
00397             if(strcmp(name, "CITY_INFO") == 0 && pData->curElement == CITYTABLE_ELEMENT_NONE)
00398             {
00399                   pData->curElement = CITYTABLE_ELEMENT_CITYINFO;
00400                   pData->maxReadDepth++; //we are not skipping this element
00401             }
00402             else if(strcmp(name, "CITY_TABLE") == 0 && pData->curElement == CITYTABLE_ELEMENT_CITYINFO)
00403             {
00404                   pData->curElement = CITYTABLE_ELEMENT_CITYTABLE;
00405                   pData->maxReadDepth++; //we are not skipping this element
00406             }
00407             else if(strcmp(name, "CITY_TABLE_ROW") == 0 && pData->curElement == CITYTABLE_ELEMENT_CITYTABLE)
00408             {
00409                   UINT32 uiAttrIndex;
00410                   pData->curElement = CITYTABLE_ELEMENT_CITYTABLEROW;
00411 
00412                   for(uiAttrIndex = 0;atts[uiAttrIndex] != NULL;uiAttrIndex += 2)
00413                         if(strcmp(atts[uiAttrIndex], "row") == 0)
00414                         {
00415                               pData->uiRowNumber = atol(atts[uiAttrIndex+1]);
00416                               break;
00417                         }
00418 
00419                   if(atts[uiAttrIndex] != NULL && pData->uiRowNumber < MAP_WORLD_Y)
00420                         pData->maxReadDepth++; //we are not skipping this element
00421             }
00422             else if(strcmp(name, "CITYLIST") == 0 && pData->curElement == CITYTABLE_ELEMENT_CITYINFO)
00423             {
00424                   pData->curElement = CITYTABLE_ELEMENT_CITYLIST;
00425 
00426                   memset(sBaseSectorList,0,sizeof(sBaseSectorList));
00427                   memset(pTownPoints,0,sizeof(pTownPoints));
00428 
00429                   pData->maxReadDepth++; //we are not skipping this element
00430             }
00431             else if(strcmp(name, "CITY") == 0 && pData->curElement == CITYTABLE_ELEMENT_CITYLIST)
00432             {
00433                   pData->curElement = CITYTABLE_ELEMENT_CITY;
00434 
00435                   memset(&pData->curCityInfo,0,sizeof(cityInfo));
00436 
00437                   pData->maxReadDepth++; //we are not skipping this element
00438             }
00439             else if(strcmp(name, "uiIndex") == 0 && pData->curElement == CITYTABLE_ELEMENT_CITY)
00440             {
00441                   pData->curElement = CITYTABLE_ELEMENT_INDEX;
00442                   pData->maxReadDepth++; //we are not skipping this element
00443             }
00444             else if(strcmp(name, "baseSector") == 0 && pData->curElement == CITYTABLE_ELEMENT_CITY)
00445             {
00446                   pData->curElement = CITYTABLE_ELEMENT_BASESECTOR;
00447                   pData->maxReadDepth++; //we are not skipping this element
00448             }
00449             else if(strcmp(name, "x") == 0 && pData->curElement == CITYTABLE_ELEMENT_BASESECTOR)
00450             {
00451                   pData->curElement = CITYTABLE_ELEMENT_BASESECTOR_X;
00452                   pData->maxReadDepth++; //we are not skipping this element
00453             }
00454             else if(strcmp(name, "y") == 0 && pData->curElement == CITYTABLE_ELEMENT_BASESECTOR)
00455             {
00456                   pData->curElement = CITYTABLE_ELEMENT_BASESECTOR_Y;
00457                   pData->maxReadDepth++; //we are not skipping this element
00458             }
00459             else if(strcmp(name, "townPoint") == 0 && pData->curElement == CITYTABLE_ELEMENT_CITY)
00460             {
00461                   pData->curElement = CITYTABLE_ELEMENT_TOWNPOINT;
00462                   pData->maxReadDepth++; //we are not skipping this element
00463             }
00464             else if(strcmp(name, "x") == 0 && pData->curElement == CITYTABLE_ELEMENT_TOWNPOINT)
00465             {
00466                   pData->curElement = CITYTABLE_ELEMENT_TOWNPOINT_X;
00467                   pData->maxReadDepth++; //we are not skipping this element
00468             }
00469             else if(strcmp(name, "y") == 0 && pData->curElement == CITYTABLE_ELEMENT_TOWNPOINT)
00470             {
00471                   pData->curElement = CITYTABLE_ELEMENT_TOWNPOINT_Y;
00472                   pData->maxReadDepth++; //we are not skipping this element
00473             }
00474 
00475             pData->szCharData[0] = '\0';
00476       }
00477 
00478       pData->currentDepth++;
00479 
00480 }
00481 
00482 static void XMLCALL
00483 citytableCharacterDataHandle(void *userData, const char *str, int len)
00484 {
00485       citytableParseData * pData = (citytableParseData *) userData;
00486 
00487       if(pData->currentDepth <= pData->maxReadDepth && strlen(pData->szCharData) < MAX_CHAR_DATA_LENGTH)
00488             strncat(pData->szCharData,str,__min((unsigned int)len,MAX_CHAR_DATA_LENGTH-strlen(pData->szCharData)));
00489 }
00490 
00491 
00492 static void XMLCALL
00493 citytableEndElementHandle(void *userData, const char *name)
00494 {
00495       citytableParseData * pData = (citytableParseData *) userData;
00496 
00497       if(pData->currentDepth <= pData->maxReadDepth) //we're at the end of an element that we've been reading
00498       {
00499             if(strcmp(name, "CITY_INFO") == 0 && pData->curElement == CITYTABLE_ELEMENT_CITYINFO)
00500             {
00501                   pData->curElement = CITYTABLE_ELEMENT_NONE;
00502             }
00503             else if(strcmp(name, "CITY_TABLE") == 0 && pData->curElement == CITYTABLE_ELEMENT_CITYTABLE)
00504             {
00505                   pData->curElement = CITYTABLE_ELEMENT_CITYINFO;
00506             }
00507             else if(strcmp(name, "CITY_TABLE_ROW") == 0 && pData->curElement == CITYTABLE_ELEMENT_CITYTABLEROW)
00508             {
00509                   INT8 * curBuffer = pData->szCharData + strspn((const char *)pData->szCharData," \t\n\r");
00510                   UINT32 curCellIndex = 0;
00511                   UINT32 curNumber;
00512 
00513                   pData->curElement = CITYTABLE_ELEMENT_CITYTABLE;
00514 
00515                   while(curBuffer[0] != '\0')
00516                   {
00517                         sscanf( (const char *)curBuffer,"%d",&curNumber);
00518 
00519                         StrategicMap[curCellIndex+MAP_WORLD_X*pData->uiRowNumber].bNameId = curNumber;
00520 
00521                         curCellIndex++;
00522                         curBuffer += strcspn(curBuffer," \t\n\r\0");
00523                         curBuffer += strspn((const char *)curBuffer," \t\n\r");
00524                   }
00525             }
00526             else if(strcmp(name, "CITYLIST") == 0 && pData->curElement == CITYTABLE_ELEMENT_CITYLIST)
00527             {
00528                   pData->curElement = CITYTABLE_ELEMENT_CITYINFO;
00529             }
00530             else if(strcmp(name, "CITY") == 0 && pData->curElement == CITYTABLE_ELEMENT_CITY)
00531             {
00532                   pData->curElement = CITYTABLE_ELEMENT_CITYLIST;
00533 
00534                   sBaseSectorList[pData->curCityInfo.uiIndex-1] = SECTOR(pData->curCityInfo.ubBaseX,pData->curCityInfo.ubBaseY);
00535                   pTownPoints[pData->curCityInfo.uiIndex] = pData->curCityInfo.townPoint;
00536             }
00537             else if(strcmp(name, "uiIndex") == 0 && pData->curElement == CITYTABLE_ELEMENT_INDEX)
00538             {
00539                   pData->curElement = CITYTABLE_ELEMENT_CITY;
00540 
00541                   pData->curCityInfo.uiIndex = atol(pData->szCharData);
00542             }
00543             else if(strcmp(name, "baseSector") == 0 && pData->curElement == CITYTABLE_ELEMENT_BASESECTOR)
00544             {
00545                   pData->curElement = CITYTABLE_ELEMENT_CITY;
00546             }
00547             else if(strcmp(name, "x") == 0 && pData->curElement == CITYTABLE_ELEMENT_BASESECTOR_X)
00548             {
00549                   pData->curElement = CITYTABLE_ELEMENT_BASESECTOR;
00550 
00551                   pData->curCityInfo.ubBaseX = (UINT8) atol(pData->szCharData);
00552             }
00553             else if(strcmp(name, "y") == 0 && pData->curElement == CITYTABLE_ELEMENT_BASESECTOR_Y)
00554             {
00555                   pData->curElement = CITYTABLE_ELEMENT_BASESECTOR;
00556 
00557                   pData->curCityInfo.ubBaseY = (UINT8) atol(pData->szCharData);
00558             }
00559             else if(strcmp(name, "townPoint") == 0 && pData->curElement == CITYTABLE_ELEMENT_TOWNPOINT)
00560             {
00561                   pData->curElement = CITYTABLE_ELEMENT_CITY;
00562             }
00563             else if(strcmp(name, "x") == 0 && pData->curElement == CITYTABLE_ELEMENT_TOWNPOINT_X)
00564             {
00565                   pData->curElement = CITYTABLE_ELEMENT_TOWNPOINT;
00566 
00567                   pData->curCityInfo.townPoint.x = atol(pData->szCharData);
00568             }
00569             else if(strcmp(name, "y") == 0 && pData->curElement == CITYTABLE_ELEMENT_TOWNPOINT_Y)
00570             {
00571                   pData->curElement = CITYTABLE_ELEMENT_TOWNPOINT;
00572 
00573                   pData->curCityInfo.townPoint.y = atol(pData->szCharData);
00574             }
00575 
00576             pData->maxReadDepth--;
00577       }
00578 
00579       pData->currentDepth--;
00580 }
00581 
00582 
00583 BOOLEAN ReadInStrategicMapSectorTownNames(STR fileName)
00584 {
00585       HWFILE            hFile;
00586       UINT32            uiBytesRead;
00587       UINT32            uiFSize;
00588       CHAR8 *           lpcBuffer;
00589       XML_Parser  parser = XML_ParserCreate(NULL);
00590       
00591       citytableParseData pData;
00592 
00593 
00594 
00595       // Open weapons file
00596       hFile = FileOpen( fileName, FILE_ACCESS_READ, FALSE );
00597       if ( !hFile )
00598             return( FALSE );
00599       
00600       uiFSize = FileGetSize(hFile);
00601       lpcBuffer = (CHAR8 *) MemAlloc(uiFSize+1);
00602 
00603       //Read in block
00604       if ( !FileRead( hFile, lpcBuffer, uiFSize, &uiBytesRead ) )
00605       {
00606             MemFree(lpcBuffer);
00607             return( FALSE );
00608       }
00609 
00610       lpcBuffer[uiFSize] = 0; //add a null terminator
00611 
00612       FileClose( hFile );
00613 
00614       
00615       XML_SetElementHandler(parser, citytableStartElementHandle, citytableEndElementHandle);
00616       XML_SetCharacterDataHandler(parser, citytableCharacterDataHandle);
00617 
00618       
00619       memset(&pData,0,sizeof(pData));
00620       XML_SetUserData(parser, &pData);
00621 
00622 
00623     if(!XML_Parse(parser, lpcBuffer, uiFSize, TRUE))
00624       {
00625             CHAR8 errorBuf[511];
00626 
00627             sprintf(errorBuf, "XML Parser Error in Cities.xml: %s at line %d", XML_ErrorString(XML_GetErrorCode(parser)), XML_GetCurrentLineNumber(parser));
00628             LiveMessage(errorBuf);
00629 
00630             MemFree(lpcBuffer);
00631             return FALSE;
00632       }
00633 
00634       MemFree(lpcBuffer);
00635 
00636       XML_ParserFree(parser);
00637 
00638 #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
00639       hFile = FileOpen( "TABLEDATA\\~Cities.xml", FILE_ACCESS_WRITE | FILE_CREATE_ALWAYS, FALSE );
00640       if ( !hFile )
00641             return( FALSE );
00642       
00643       {
00644             UINT32 x, y, cnt;
00645 
00646 
00647             FilePrintf(hFile,"<CITY_INFO>\r\n");
00648             FilePrintf(hFile,"\t<CITYLIST>\r\n");
00649             for(cnt = 1;cnt <= 12;cnt++)
00650             {
00651                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<CITY>\r\n");
00652 
00653                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t\t<uiIndex>%d</uiIndex>\r\n",cnt);
00654 
00655                   switch(cnt)
00656                   {
00657                         case 1:
00658                               FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t\t<szName>Omerta</szName>\r\n");
00659                         break;
00660 
00661                         case 2:
00662                               FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t\t<szName>Drassen</szName>\r\n");
00663                         break;
00664 
00665                         case 3:
00666                               FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t\t<szName>Alma</szName>\r\n");
00667                         break;
00668 
00669                         case 4:
00670                               FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t\t<szName>Grumm</szName>\r\n");
00671                         break;
00672 
00673                         case 5:
00674                               FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t\t<szName>Tixa</szName>\r\n");
00675                         break;
00676 
00677                         case 6:
00678                               FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t\t<szName>Cambria</szName>\r\n");
00679                         break;
00680 
00681                         case 7:
00682                               FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t\t<szName>San Mona</szName>\r\n");
00683                         break;
00684 
00685                         case 8:
00686                               FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t\t<szName>Estoni</szName>\r\n");
00687                         break;
00688 
00689                         case 9:
00690                               FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t\t<szName>Orta</szName>\r\n");
00691                         break;
00692 
00693                         case 10:
00694                               FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t\t<szName>Balime</szName>\r\n");
00695                         break;
00696 
00697                         case 11:
00698                               FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t\t<szName>Meduna</szName>\r\n");
00699                         break;
00700 
00701                         case 12:
00702                               FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t\t<szName>Chitzena</szName>\r\n");
00703                         break;
00704                   }
00705 
00706                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t\t<baseSector>\r\n");
00707                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t\t\t<x>%d</x>\r\n",(sBaseSectorList[cnt-1]%16)+1);
00708                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t\t\t<y>%d</y>\r\n",(sBaseSectorList[cnt-1]/16)+1);
00709                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t\t</baseSector>\r\n");
00710 
00711 
00712                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t\t<townPoint>\r\n");
00713                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t\t\t<x>%d</x>\r\n",pTownPoints[cnt].x);
00714                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t\t\t<y>%d</y>\r\n",pTownPoints[cnt].y);
00715                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t\t</townPoint>\r\n");
00716 
00717 
00718                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t</CITY>\r\n");
00719             }
00720             FilePrintf(hFile,"\t</CITYLIST>\r\n");
00721 
00722             FilePrintf(hFile,"\t<CITY_TABLE>\r\n");
00723             for(y = 0;y < MAP_WORLD_Y;y++)
00724             {
00725                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<CITY_TABLE_ROW row=\"%02d\">",y);
00726                   for(x = 0;x < MAP_WORLD_X;x++)
00727                   {
00728                         if(x < MAP_WORLD_X-1)
00729                         {
00730                               FilePrintf(hFile,"%3d",StrategicMap[x+y*MAP_WORLD_X].bNameId);
00731                         }
00732                         else
00733                               FilePrintf(hFile,"%3d </CITY_TABLE_ROW>\r\n",StrategicMap[x+y*MAP_WORLD_X].bNameId);
00734                   }
00735             }     
00736             FilePrintf(hFile,"\t</CITY_TABLE>\r\n");
00737             FilePrintf(hFile,"</CITY_INFO>\r\n");
00738       }
00739       FileClose( hFile );
00740 #endif
00741 
00742       return TRUE;
00743 }
00744 
00745 BOOLEAN ReadInMapStructure(STR fileName)
00746 {
00747       memset(StrategicMap, 0, sizeof(StrategicMap));
00748 
00749       return ReadInStrategicMapSectorTownNames(fileName);
00750 }
00751 
00752 UINT32 UndergroundTacticalTraversalTime( INT8 bExitDirection )
00753 { //We are attempting to traverse in an underground environment.  We need to use a complete different
00754       //method.  When underground, all sectors are instantly adjacent.
00755       switch( bExitDirection )
00756       {
00757             case NORTH_STRATEGIC_MOVE:
00758                   if( gMapInformation.sNorthGridNo != -1 )
00759                         return 0;
00760                   break;
00761             case EAST_STRATEGIC_MOVE:
00762                   if( gMapInformation.sEastGridNo != -1 )
00763                         return 0;
00764                   break;
00765             case SOUTH_STRATEGIC_MOVE:
00766                   if( gMapInformation.sSouthGridNo != -1 )
00767                         return 0;
00768                   break;
00769             case WEST_STRATEGIC_MOVE:
00770                   if( gMapInformation.sWestGridNo != -1 )
00771                         return 0;
00772                   break;
00773       }
00774       return 0xffffffff;
00775 }
00776 
00777 // WANNE 2 <zooming>
00778 void BeginLoadScreen( void )
00779 {
00780       SGPRect SrcRect, DstRect;
00781       UINT32 uiStartTime, uiCurrTime;
00782       INT32 iPercentage, iFactor;
00783       UINT32 uiTimeRange;
00784       INT32 iLastShadePercentage;
00785       UINT8 ubLoadScreenID;
00786 
00787       SetCurrentCursorFromDatabase( VIDEO_NO_CURSOR );
00788 
00789       if( guiCurrentScreen == MAP_SCREEN && !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & LOADING_SAVED_GAME) && !AreInMeanwhile() )
00790       {
00791             DstRect.iLeft = 0;
00792             DstRect.iTop = 0;
00793             DstRect.iRight = SCREEN_WIDTH;
00794             DstRect.iBottom = SCREEN_HEIGHT;
00795             uiTimeRange = 2000;
00796             iPercentage = 0;
00797             iLastShadePercentage = 0;
00798             uiStartTime = GetJA2Clock();
00799 
00800             BlitBufferToBuffer( FRAME_BUFFER, guiSAVEBUFFER, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT );
00801             PlayJA2SampleFromFile( "SOUNDS\\Final Psionic Blast 01 (16-44).wav", RATE_11025, HIGHVOLUME, 1, MIDDLEPAN );
00802             while( iPercentage < 100  )
00803             {
00804                   uiCurrTime = GetJA2Clock();
00805                   iPercentage = (uiCurrTime-uiStartTime) * 100 / uiTimeRange;
00806                   iPercentage = min( iPercentage, 100 );
00807 
00808                   //Factor the percentage so that it is modified by a gravity falling acceleration effect.
00809                   iFactor = (iPercentage - 50) * 2;
00810                   if( iPercentage < 50 )
00811                         iPercentage = (UINT32)(iPercentage + iPercentage * iFactor * 0.01 + 0.5);
00812                   else
00813                         iPercentage = (UINT32)(iPercentage + (100-iPercentage) * iFactor * 0.01 + 0.05);
00814 
00815                   if( iPercentage > 50 )
00816                   {
00817                         ShadowVideoSurfaceRectUsingLowPercentTable( guiSAVEBUFFER, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT );
00818                   }
00819 
00820                   SrcRect.iLeft = 536 * iPercentage / 100;
00821                   SrcRect.iRight = SCREEN_WIDTH - iPercentage / 20;
00822                   SrcRect.iTop = 367 * iPercentage / 100;
00823                   SrcRect.iBottom = SCREEN_HEIGHT - 39 * iPercentage / 100;
00824                   
00825                   BltStretchVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER, guiSAVEBUFFER, 0, 0, 0, &SrcRect, &DstRect );
00826                   InvalidateScreen();
00827                   RefreshScreen( NULL );
00828             }
00829       }
00830 
00831       ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 0, 0, 0 ) ) );
00832       InvalidateScreen( );
00833       RefreshScreen( NULL );
00834 
00835       //If we are loading a saved game, use the Loading screen we saved into the SavedGameHeader file
00836       // ( which gets reloaded into gubLastLoadingScreenID )
00837       if( !gfGotoSectorTransition )
00838       {
00839             if( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & LOADING_SAVED_GAME )
00840             {
00841                   DisplayLoadScreenWithID( gubLastLoadingScreenID );
00842             }
00843             else
00844             {
00845                   ubLoadScreenID = GetLoadScreenID( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ );
00846                   DisplayLoadScreenWithID( ubLoadScreenID );
00847             }
00848       }
00849 
00850 #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
00851       uiEnterSectorStartTime = 0;
00852       uiEnterSectorEndTime = 0;
00853       //The grand total time for loading a map
00854       uiLoadWorldStartTime = 0;
00855       uiLoadWorldEndTime = 0;
00856       //The time spent in FileRead
00857       uiTotalFileReadTime = 0;
00858       uiTotalFileReadCalls = 0;
00859       //Sections of LoadWorld
00860       uiLoadWorldTime = 0;
00861       uiTrashWorldTime = 0;
00862       uiLoadMapTilesetTime = 0;
00863       uiLoadMapLightsTime = 0;
00864       uiBuildShadeTableTime = 0;
00865       uiEnterSectorStartTime = GetJA2Clock();
00866 #endif
00867 
00868 }
00869 
00870 void EndLoadScreen( )
00871 {
00872 #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
00873       //Report the time it took to load the map.  This is temporary until we are satisfied with the time
00874       //it takes to load the map.
00875       UINT16 str[60];
00876       FILE *fp;
00877       UINT32 uiSeconds;
00878       UINT32 uiHundreths;
00879       UINT32 uiUnaccounted;
00880       UINT32 uiPercentage;
00881       uiEnterSectorEndTime = GetJA2Clock();
00882       uiSeconds = (uiEnterSectorEndTime - uiEnterSectorStartTime) / 1000;
00883       uiHundreths = ((uiEnterSectorEndTime - uiEnterSectorStartTime) / 10) % 100;
00884       SetFont( FONT10ARIAL );
00885       SetFontForeground( FONT_YELLOW );
00886       SetFontBackground( FONT_NEARBLACK );
00887       if( !gbWorldSectorZ )
00888       {
00889             swprintf( str, L"%c%d ENTER SECTOR TIME:  %d.%02d seconds.", 
00890                                           'A' + gWorldSectorY - 1, gWorldSectorX, uiSeconds, uiHundreths );
00891       }
00892       else
00893       {
00894             swprintf( str, L"%c%d_b%d ENTER SECTOR TIME:  %d.%02d seconds.", 
00895                                           'A' + gWorldSectorY - 1, gWorldSectorX, gbWorldSectorZ, uiSeconds, uiHundreths );
00896       }
00897       ScreenMsg( FONT_YELLOW, MSG_TESTVERSION, str );
00898       if( fStartNewFile )
00899       { //start new file
00900             fp = fopen( "TimeResults.txt", "w" );
00901             ScreenMsg( FONT_YELLOW, MSG_TESTVERSION, L"See JA2\\Data\\TimeResults.txt for more detailed timings." );
00902             fStartNewFile = FALSE;
00903       }
00904       else
00905       { //append to end of file
00906             fp = fopen( "TimeResults.txt", "a" );
00907 
00908             if ( fp )
00909             {
00910                   fprintf( fp, "\n\n--------------------------------------------------------------------\n\n" );
00911             }
00912       }
00913       if( fp )
00914       {
00915             //Record all of the timings.
00916             fprintf( fp, "%S\n", str );
00917             fprintf( fp, "EnterSector() supersets LoadWorld().  This includes other external sections.\n");
00918             //FileRead()
00919             fprintf( fp, "\n\nVARIOUS FUNCTION TIMINGS (exclusive of actual function timings in second heading)\n" );
00920             uiSeconds = uiTotalFileReadTime / 1000;
00921             uiHundreths = (uiTotalFileReadTime / 10) % 100; 
00922             fprintf( fp, "FileRead:  %d.%02d (called %d times)\n", uiSeconds, uiHundreths, uiTotalFileReadCalls );
00923             
00924             fprintf( fp, "\n\nSECTIONS OF LOADWORLD (all parts should add up to 100%)\n" );
00925             //TrashWorld()
00926             uiSeconds = uiTrashWorldTime / 1000;
00927             uiHundreths = (uiTrashWorldTime / 10) % 100; 
00928             fprintf( fp, "TrashWorld: %d.%02d\n", uiSeconds, uiHundreths );
00929             //LoadMapTilesets()
00930             uiSeconds = uiLoadMapTilesetTime / 1000;
00931             uiHundreths = (uiLoadMapTilesetTime / 10) % 100; 
00932             fprintf( fp, "LoadMapTileset: %d.%02d\n", uiSeconds, uiHundreths );
00933             //LoadMapLights()
00934             uiSeconds = uiLoadMapLightsTime / 1000;
00935             uiHundreths = (uiLoadMapLightsTime / 10) % 100; 
00936             fprintf( fp, "LoadMapLights: %d.%02d\n", uiSeconds, uiHundreths );
00937             uiSeconds = uiBuildShadeTableTime / 1000;
00938             uiHundreths = (uiBuildShadeTableTime / 10) % 100;
00939             fprintf( fp, "  1)  BuildShadeTables: %d.%02d\n", uiSeconds, uiHundreths );
00940 
00941             uiPercentage = uiNumImagesReloaded * 100 / NUMBEROFTILETYPES;
00942             fprintf( fp, "  2)  %d%% of the tileset images were actually reloaded.\n", uiPercentage );
00943             if ( ( uiNumTablesSaved+uiNumTablesLoaded ) != 0 )
00944             {
00945                   uiPercentage = uiNumTablesSaved * 100 / (uiNumTablesSaved+uiNumTablesLoaded);
00946             }
00947             else
00948             {
00949                   uiPercentage = 0;
00950             }
00951             fprintf( fp, "  3)  Of that, %d%% of the shade tables were generated (not loaded).\n", uiPercentage );
00952             if( gfForceBuildShadeTables )
00953                   fprintf( fp, "  NOTE:  Force building of shadetables enabled on this local computer.\n" );
00954 
00955 
00956             //Unaccounted
00957             uiUnaccounted = uiLoadWorldTime - uiTrashWorldTime - uiLoadMapTilesetTime - uiLoadMapLightsTime;
00958             uiSeconds = uiUnaccounted / 1000;
00959             uiHundreths = (uiUnaccounted / 10) % 100; 
00960             fprintf( fp, "Unaccounted: %d.%02d\n", uiSeconds, uiHundreths ); 
00961             //LoadWorld()
00962             uiSeconds = uiLoadWorldTime / 1000;
00963             uiHundreths = (uiLoadWorldTime / 10) % 100; 
00964             fprintf( fp, "\nTotal: %d.%02d\n", uiSeconds, uiHundreths );
00965       
00966             fclose( fp );
00967       }
00968 #endif
00969 }

00973 {
00974       // this runs every time we start the application, so don't put anything in here that's only supposed to run when a new
00975       // *game* is started!  Those belong in InitStrategicLayer() instead.
00976

00978       BuildListOfTownSectors( );

00981       // since it takes quite a while to plot strategic paths between all pairs of town sectors...
00982 
00983 
00984 //#define RECALC_TOWN_DISTANCES
00985 //#ifdef RECALC_TOWN_DISTANCES
00986       CalcDistancesBetweenTowns ( );
00987 //    WriteOutDistancesBetweenTowns( );
00988 //    DumpDistancesBetweenTowns( );
00989 //#endif
00990       
00991 //    ReadInDistancesBetweenTowns( );
00992 
00993       return( TRUE );
00994 }

00996 
00997 UINT8 GetTownIdForSector( INT16 sMapX, INT16 sMapY )
00998 {
00999       // return the name value of the town in this sector
01000 
01001       return( StrategicMap[CALCULATE_STRATEGIC_INDEX( sMapX, sMapY )].bNameId );
01002 }
01003 
01004 
01005 // return number of sectors this town takes up
01006 UINT8 GetTownSectorSize( INT8 bTownId )
01007 {
01008       UINT8 ubSectorSize = 0;
01009       INT32 iCounterA =0, iCounterB = 0;
01010 
01011       for( iCounterA = 0; iCounterA < ( INT32 )( MAP_WORLD_X - 1 ); iCounterA++ )
01012       {
01013             for( iCounterB = 0; iCounterB < ( INT32 )( MAP_WORLD_Y - 1 ); iCounterB++ )
01014             {
01015                   if(  StrategicMap[CALCULATE_STRATEGIC_INDEX( iCounterA, iCounterB )].bNameId == bTownId )
01016                   {
01017                         ubSectorSize++;
01018                   }
01019             }
01020       }
01021 
01022       return( ubSectorSize );
01023 }
01024 
01025 UINT8 GetMilitiaCountAtLevelAnywhereInTown( UINT8 ubTownValue, UINT8 ubLevelValue )
01026 {
01027       INT32 iCounter = 0;
01028       UINT8 ubCount =0;
01029 
01030       while( pTownNamesList[ iCounter ] != 0 )
01031       {
01032             if( StrategicMap[ pTownLocationsList[ iCounter ] ].bNameId == ubTownValue )
01033             {
01034                   // match.  Add the number of civs at this level
01035                   ubCount += SectorInfo[ STRATEGIC_INDEX_TO_SECTOR_INFO( pTownLocationsList[ iCounter ] ) ].ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[ ubLevelValue ];
01036             }
01037 
01038             iCounter++;
01039       }
01040       return( ubCount );
01041 }
01042 
01043 
01044 // return number of sectors under player control for this town
01045 UINT8 GetTownSectorsUnderControl( INT8 bTownId )
01046 {
01047       INT8 ubSectorsControlled = 0;
01048       INT32 iCounterA =0, iCounterB = 0;
01049       UINT16 usSector = 0;
01050 
01051       for( iCounterA = 0; iCounterA < ( INT32 )( MAP_WORLD_X - 1 ); iCounterA++ )
01052       {
01053             for( iCounterB = 0; iCounterB < ( INT32 )( MAP_WORLD_Y - 1 ); iCounterB++ )
01054             {
01055                   usSector = (UINT16)CALCULATE_STRATEGIC_INDEX( iCounterA, iCounterB );
01056 
01057                   if( ( StrategicMap[ usSector ].bNameId == bTownId ) &&
01058                               ( StrategicMap[ usSector ].fEnemyControlled == FALSE ) &&
01059                               ( NumEnemiesInSector( ( INT16 )iCounterA, ( INT16 )iCounterB ) == 0 ) )
01060                   {
01061                         ubSectorsControlled++;
01062                   }
01063             }
01064       }
01065 
01066       return( ubSectorsControlled );
01067 }

01069 void InitializeSAMSites( void )
01070 {
01071       // move the landing zone over to Omerta
01072       gsMercArriveSectorX = 9;
01073       gsMercArriveSectorY = 1;
01074 
01075       // all SAM sites start game in perfect working condition
01076       StrategicMap[(SAM_1_X)+(MAP_WORLD_X*(SAM_1_Y))].bSAMCondition = 100;
01077       StrategicMap[(SAM_2_X)+(MAP_WORLD_X*(SAM_2_Y))].bSAMCondition = 100;
01078       StrategicMap[(SAM_3_X)+(MAP_WORLD_X*(SAM_3_Y))].bSAMCondition = 100;
01079       StrategicMap[(SAM_4_X)+(MAP_WORLD_X*(SAM_4_Y))].bSAMCondition = 100;
01080 
01081       UpdateAirspaceControl( );
01082 }

01093 
01094 
01095 void GetMapFileName(INT16 sMapX,INT16 sMapY, INT8 bSectorZ, STR8 bString, BOOLEAN fUsePlaceholder, BOOLEAN fAddAlternateMapLetter )
01096 {
01097       CHAR8  bTestString[ 150 ];
01098       CHAR8  bExtensionString[ 15 ];
01099 
01100       if ( bSectorZ != 0 )
01101       {
01102             sprintf( bExtensionString, "_b%d", bSectorZ );
01103       }
01104       else
01105       {
01106             strcpy( bExtensionString, "" );
01107       }
01108 
01109       // the gfUseAlternateMap flag is set in the loading saved games.  When starting a new game the underground sector
01110       //info has not been initialized, so we need the flag to load an alternate sector.
01111       if( gfUseAlternateMap | GetSectorFlagStatus( sMapX, sMapY, bSectorZ, SF_USE_ALTERNATE_MAP ) )
01112       {
01113             gfUseAlternateMap = FALSE;
01114 
01115             //if we ARE to use the a map, or if we are saving AND the save game version is before 80, add the a
01116             if( fAddAlternateMapLetter )
01117             {
01118                   strcat( bExtensionString, "_a" );
01119             }
01120       }
01121 
01122       // If we are in a meanwhile...
01123       if ( AreInMeanwhile( ) && sMapX == 3 && sMapY == 16 && !bSectorZ )//GetMeanwhileID() != INTERROGATION )
01124       {
01125             if( fAddAlternateMapLetter )
01126             {
01127                   strcat( bExtensionString, "_m" );
01128             }
01129       }
01130 
01131       // This is the string to return, but...
01132       sprintf( bString, "%s%s%s.DAT", pVertStrings[sMapY], pHortStrings[sMapX], bExtensionString );
01133 
01134       // We will test against this string
01135       sprintf( bTestString, "MAPS\\%s", bString );
01136 
01137       if( fUsePlaceholder && !FileExists( bTestString ) )
01138       {
01139             // Debug str
01140             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String( "Map does not exist for %s, using default.", bTestString ) );
01141             // Set to a string we know!
01142             sprintf(bString, "H10.DAT",pVertStrings[sMapY],pHortStrings[sMapX]);
01143             ScreenMsg( FONT_YELLOW, MSG_DEBUG, L"Using PLACEHOLDER map!");
01144       }
01145       return;
01146 }
01147 
01148 void GetCurrentWorldSector( INT16 *psMapX, INT16 *psMapY )
01149 {
01150       *psMapX = gWorldSectorX;
01151       *psMapY = gWorldSectorY;
01152 }
