01154 //not in overhead.h!
01155 extern UINT8 NumEnemyInSector();
01156 
01157 void HandleRPCDescriptionOfSector( INT16 sSectorX, INT16 sSectorY, INT16 sSectorZ )
01158 {
01159       UINT32      cnt;
01160       UINT8       ubSectorDescription[33][3] =
01161       {
01162              // row (letter), column, quote #
01163              { 2, 13,  0 },   // b13      Drassen
01164              { 3, 13,  1 },   // c13      Drassen
01165              { 4, 13,  2 },   // d13      Drassen
01166              { 8, 13,  3 },   // h13      Alma
01167              { 8, 14,  4 },   // h14      Alma
01168              { 9, 13,  5 },   // i13      Alma * (extra quote 6 if Sci-fi ) *
01169              { 9, 14,  7 },   // i14      Alma
01170              { 6,  8,  8 },   // f8 Cambria
01171              { 6,  9,  9 },   // f9 Cambria   
01172              { 7,  8, 10 },   // g8 Cambria
01173 
01174              { 7,  9, 11 },   // g9 Cambria
01175              { 3,  6, 12 },   // c6 San Mona
01176              { 3,  5, 13 },   // c5 San Mona
01177              { 4,  5, 14 },   // d5 San Mona
01178              { 2,  2, 15 },   // b2 Chitzena
01179              { 1,  2, 16 },   // a2 Chitzena
01180              { 7,  1, 17 },   // g1 Grumm
01181              { 8,  1, 18 },   // h1 Grumm
01182              { 7,  2, 19 },   // g2       Grumm
01183              { 8,  2, 20 },   // h2 Grumm
01184 
01185              { 9,  6, 21 },   // i6 Estoni
01186              {11,  4, 22 },   // k4 Orta
01187              {12,  11, 23 },  // l11      Balime
01188              {12,  12, 24 },  // l12      Balime
01189              {15,  3, 25 },   // o3 Meduna
01190              {16,  3, 26 },   // p3 Meduna
01191              {14,  4, 27 },   // n4 Meduna
01192              {14,  3, 28 },   // n3 Meduna
01193              {15,  4, 30 },   // o4 Meduna
01194              {10,  9, 31 },   // j9 Tixa
01195 
01196              {4,  15, 32 },   // d15      NE SAM
01197              {4,  2, 33 },    // d2 NW SAM
01198              {9,  8, 34 }     // i8 CENTRAL SAM
01199       };
01200 
01201   // Default to false
01202       gTacticalStatus.fCountingDownForGuideDescription = FALSE;
01203 
01204 
01205       // OK, if the first time in...
01206       if ( GetSectorFlagStatus( sSectorX, sSectorY, ( UINT8 )sSectorZ, SF_HAVE_USED_GUIDE_QUOTE ) != TRUE )
01207       {
01208             if ( sSectorZ != 0 )
01209             {
01210                   return;
01211             }
01212 
01213             // OK, check if we are in a good sector....
01214             for ( cnt = 0; cnt < 33; cnt++ )
01215             {
01216                   if ( sSectorX == ubSectorDescription[ cnt ][ 1 ] && sSectorY == ubSectorDescription[ cnt ][ 0 ] )
01217                   {
01218                         // If we're not scifi, skip some
01219                         if ( !(gGameOptions.ubGameStyle == STYLE_SCIFI && gGameExternalOptions.fEnableCrepitus) && cnt == 3 )
01220                         {
01221                               continue;
01222                         }
01223 
01224                         SetSectorFlag( sSectorX, sSectorY, ( UINT8 )sSectorZ, SF_HAVE_USED_GUIDE_QUOTE );
01225 
01226                         gTacticalStatus.fCountingDownForGuideDescription = TRUE;
01227                         gTacticalStatus.bGuideDescriptionCountDown                   = (INT8)( 4 + Random( 5 ) ); // 4 to 8 tactical turns...
01228                         gTacticalStatus.ubGuideDescriptionToUse                            = ubSectorDescription[ cnt ][ 2 ];
01229                         gTacticalStatus.bGuideDescriptionSectorX                     =  (INT8)sSectorX;
01230                         gTacticalStatus.bGuideDescriptionSectorY                     =  (INT8)sSectorY;
01231                   }
01232             }
01233       }
01234 
01235   // Handle guide description ( will be needed if a SAM one )
01236       HandleRPCDescription( );
01237 
01238 }
01239 
01240 
01241 BOOLEAN     SetCurrentWorldSector( INT16 sMapX, INT16 sMapY, INT8 bMapZ )
01242 {
01243       UNDERGROUND_SECTORINFO  *pUnderWorld=NULL;
01244       BOOLEAN                                                     fChangeMusic = TRUE;
01245 
01246 #ifdef CRIPPLED_VERSION
01247       if( sMapY >= 5 && sMapY != 16 )
01248       {
01249             CrippledVersionFailureToLoadMapCheck();
01250             return FALSE;     
01251       }
01252 #endif
01253 
01254       // ATE: Zero out accounting functions
01255       memset( gbMercIsNewInThisSector, 0, sizeof( gbMercIsNewInThisSector ) );
01256 
01257       SyncStrategicTurnTimes();
01258 
01259 #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
01260       if( gfOverrideSector )
01261       {
01262             //skip the cancel, and force load the sector.  This is used by the AIViewer to "reset" a level with
01263             //different numbers of various types of enemies.
01264       }
01265       else
01266 #endif
01267             // is the sector already loaded?
01268             if( ( gWorldSectorX == sMapX ) && ( sMapY == gWorldSectorY) && ( bMapZ == gbWorldSectorZ) )
01269             {
01270                   //Inserts the enemies into the newly loaded map based on the strategic information.
01271                   //Note, the flag will return TRUE only if enemies were added.  The game may wish to
01272                   //do something else in a case where no enemies are present.
01273 
01274                   SetPendingNewScreen(GAME_SCREEN);
01275                   if( !NumEnemyInSector( ) )
01276                   {
01277                         PrepareEnemyForSectorBattle();
01278                   }
01279                   if( gubNumCreaturesAttackingTown && !gbWorldSectorZ && 
01280                         gubSectorIDOfCreatureAttack == SECTOR( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY ) )
01281                   {
01282                         PrepareCreaturesForBattle();
01283                   }
01284                   if( gfGotoSectorTransition )
01285                   {
01286                         BeginLoadScreen( );
01287                         gfGotoSectorTransition = FALSE;
01288                   }
01289 
01290                   // Check for helicopter being on the ground in this sector...
01291                   HandleHelicopterOnGroundGraphic( );
01292 
01293                   ResetMilitia();
01294                   AllTeamsLookForAll( TRUE );
01295                   return( TRUE );
01296             }
01297 
01298             if( gWorldSectorX && gWorldSectorY && gbWorldSectorZ != -1 )
01299             {
01300                   HandleDefiniteUnloadingOfWorld( ABOUT_TO_LOAD_NEW_MAP );
01301             }
01302 
01303             // make this the currently loaded sector
01304             gWorldSectorX  = sMapX;
01305             gWorldSectorY  = sMapY;
01306             gbWorldSectorZ = bMapZ;
01307 
01308             // update currently selected map sector to match
01309             ChangeSelectedMapSector( sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ );
01310 
01311 
01312             //Check to see if the sector we are loading is the cave sector under Tixa.  If so
01313             //then we will set up the meanwhile scene to start the creature quest.
01314             if( !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & LOADING_SAVED_GAME ) )
01315             {
01316                   StopAnyCurrentlyTalkingSpeech( );
01317 
01318                   if( gWorldSectorX == 9 && gWorldSectorY == 10 && gbWorldSectorZ == 2 )
01319                   {
01320                         InitCreatureQuest(); //Ignored if already active.
01321                   }
01322             }
01323 
01324             //Stop playing any music -- will fade out.
01325             // SetMusicMode( MUSIC_NONE );
01326 
01327             // ATE: Determine if we should set the default music...
01328 
01329             // Are we already in 'tense' music...
01330 
01331             // ATE: Change music only if not loading....
01332             /*-
01333             if ( gubMusicMode == MUSIC_TACTICAL_ENEMYPRESENT  )
01334             {
01335             fChangeMusic = FALSE;
01336             }
01337 
01338             // Did we 'tactically traverse' over....
01339             if ( gfTacticalTraversal )
01340             {
01341             fChangeMusic = FALSE;
01342             }
01343 
01344             // If we have no music playing at all....
01345             if ( gubMusicMode == MUSIC_NONE  )
01346             {
01347             fChangeMusic = TRUE;
01348             }
01349             -*/
01350 
01351             if( (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & LOADING_SAVED_GAME ) )
01352             {
01353                   fChangeMusic = TRUE;
01354             }
01355             else
01356             {
01357                   fChangeMusic = FALSE;
01358             }
01359 
01360 
01361             if ( fChangeMusic )
01362             {
01363                   SetMusicMode( MUSIC_MAIN_MENU );          
01364             }
01365 
01366             // ATE: Do this stuff earlier!
01367             if( !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & LOADING_SAVED_GAME ) )
01368             {
01369                   // Update the last time we were in tactical...
01370                   gTacticalStatus.uiTimeSinceLastInTactical = GetWorldTotalMin( );
01371 
01372                   // init some AI stuff
01373                   InitializeTacticalStatusAtBattleStart();
01374 
01375                   // CJC: delay this until after entering the sector!
01376                   //InitAI();
01377 
01378                   // Check for helicopter being on the ground in this sector...
01379                   HandleHelicopterOnGroundSkyriderProfile( );
01380             }
01381 
01382             //Load and enter the new sector
01383             if( EnterSector( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, bMapZ ) )
01384             {
01385                   // CJC: moved this here Feb 17
01386                   if( !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & LOADING_SAVED_GAME ) )
01387                   {
01388                         InitAI();
01389                   }
01390 
01391                   //If there are any people with schedules, now is the time to process them.
01392                   //CJC: doesn't work here if we're going through the tactical placement GUI; moving
01393                   // this call to PrepareLoadedSector()
01394                   //PostSchedules();
01395 
01396                   // ATE: OK, add code here to update the states of doors if they should 
01397                   // be closed......
01398                   if( !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & LOADING_SAVED_GAME ) )
01399                   {
01400                         ExamineDoorsOnEnteringSector( );
01401                   }
01402 
01403                   // Update all the doors in the sector according to the temp file previously
01404                   // loaded, and any changes made by the schedules
01405                   UpdateDoorGraphicsFromStatus( TRUE, FALSE );
01406 
01407                   //Set the fact we have visited the  sector
01408                   SetSectorFlag( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ, SF_ALREADY_LOADED );
01409 
01410                   // Check for helicopter being on the ground in this sector...
01411                   HandleHelicopterOnGroundGraphic( );
01412             }
01413             else
01414                   return( FALSE );
01415 
01416             if( !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & LOADING_SAVED_GAME ) )
01417             {
01418                   if( (gubMusicMode != MUSIC_TACTICAL_ENEMYPRESENT && gubMusicMode != MUSIC_TACTICAL_BATTLE) || 
01419                         (!NumHostilesInSector( sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ ) && gubMusicMode == MUSIC_TACTICAL_ENEMYPRESENT) )
01420                   {
01421                         // ATE; Fade FA.T....
01422                         SetMusicFadeSpeed( 5 );
01423 
01424                         SetMusicMode( MUSIC_TACTICAL_NOTHING );
01425                   }
01426 
01427                   // ATE: Check what sector we are in, to show description if we have an RPC.....
01428                   HandleRPCDescriptionOfSector( sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ );
01429 
01430 
01431 
01432                   // ATE: Set Flag for being visited...
01433                   SetSectorFlag( sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ, SF_HAS_ENTERED_TACTICAL );
01434 
01435                   // ATE; Reset some flags for creature sayings....
01436                   gTacticalStatus.fSaidCreatureFlavourQuote = FALSE;
01437                   gTacticalStatus.fHaveSeenCreature                           = FALSE;
01438                   gTacticalStatus.fBeenInCombatOnce                           = FALSE;
01439                   gTacticalStatus.fSaidCreatureSmellQuote         = FALSE;
01440                   ResetMultiSelection( );
01441 
01442                   // ATE: Decide if we can have crows here....
01443                   gTacticalStatus.fGoodToAllowCrows                           = FALSE;
01444                   gTacticalStatus.fHasEnteredCombatModeSinceEntering = FALSE;
01445                   gTacticalStatus.fDontAddNewCrows          = FALSE;
01446 
01447                   // Adjust delay for tense quote
01448                   gTacticalStatus.sCreatureTenseQuoteDelay = (INT16)( 10 + Random( 20 ) );
01449 
01450                   {
01451                         INT16 sWarpWorldX;
01452                         INT16 sWarpWorldY;
01453                         INT8  bWarpWorldZ;
01454                         INT16 sWarpGridNo;
01455 
01456                         if ( GetWarpOutOfMineCodes( &sWarpWorldX, &sWarpWorldY, &bWarpWorldZ, &sWarpGridNo ) && gbWorldSectorZ >= 2 )
01457                         {
01458                               gTacticalStatus.uiFlags |= IN_CREATURE_LAIR;
01459                         }
01460                         else
01461                         {
01462                               gTacticalStatus.uiFlags &= ( ~IN_CREATURE_LAIR );
01463                         }
01464                   }
01465 
01466                   // Every third turn
01467                   //if ( Random( 3 ) == 0  )
01468                   {
01469                         if(gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_ALLOW_CROWS ] == TRUE)
01470                         {
01471                               gTacticalStatus.fGoodToAllowCrows   = TRUE;
01472                               gTacticalStatus.ubNumCrowsPossible  = (UINT8)( 5 + Random( 5 ) );
01473                         }
01474                   }
01475 
01476             }
01477 
01478             return( TRUE );
01479 }
01480 
01481 BOOLEAN MapExists( UINT8 * szFilename )
01482 {
01483       UINT8 str[50];
01484       HWFILE fp;
01485       sprintf( (char *)str, "MAPS\\%s", szFilename );
01486       fp = FileOpen( (STR)str, FILE_ACCESS_READ, FALSE );
01487       if( !fp )
01488             return FALSE;
01489       FileClose( fp );
01490       return TRUE;
01491 }
01492 
01493 void RemoveMercsInSector( )
01494 {
01495       INT32                         cnt;
01496       SOLDIERTYPE       *pSoldier;
01497 
01498       // IF IT'S THE SELECTED GUY, MAKE ANOTHER SELECTED!
01499       cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;
01500 
01501       // ATE: only for OUR guys.. the rest is taken care of in TrashWorld() when a new sector is added...
01502   for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; cnt++, pSoldier++)
01503       {     
01504             if ( pSoldier->bActive  )
01505             {
01506                   RemoveSoldierFromGridNo( pSoldier );
01507             }
01508       }
01509 
01510 }
01511 
01512 void PrepareLoadedSector()
01513 {
01514       INT32 iCounter = 0;
01515       BOOLEAN fEnemyPresenceInThisSector = FALSE;
01516       BOOLEAN fUsingOverride = FALSE;
01517       BOOLEAN fAddCivs = TRUE;
01518       INT8 bMineIndex = -1;
01519 
01520       if( AreInMeanwhile( ) == FALSE )
01521       {
01522             if( gbWorldSectorZ == 0 )
01523             {
01524 //                MakePlayerPerceptionOfSectorControlCorrect( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ );
01525             }
01526             else
01527             {
01528                   // we always think we control underground sectors once we've visited them
01529                   SectorInfo[ SECTOR( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY ) ].fPlayer[ gbWorldSectorZ ] = TRUE;
01530             }
01531       }
01532 
01533       if( !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & LOADING_SAVED_GAME ) )
01534       {
01535             UpdateMercsInSector( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ );
01536       }
01537 
01538       // Reset ambients!
01539       HandleNewSectorAmbience( gTilesets[ giCurrentTilesetID ].ubAmbientID );
01540 
01541       //if we are loading a 'pristine' map ( ie, not loading a saved game )
01542       if( !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & LOADING_SAVED_GAME ))
01543       {
01544             if ( !AreReloadingFromMeanwhile( ) )
01545             {
01546                   SetPendingNewScreen(GAME_SCREEN);
01547 
01548       // Make interface the team panel always...
01549                   SetCurrentInterfacePanel( (UINT8)TEAM_PANEL );
01550             }
01551 
01552 
01553             //Check to see if civilians should be added.  Always add civs to maps unless they are
01554             //in a mine that is shutdown.  
01555             if( gbWorldSectorZ )
01556             {
01557                   bMineIndex = GetIdOfMineForSector( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ );
01558                   if( bMineIndex != -1 )
01559                   {
01560                         if( !AreThereMinersInsideThisMine( (UINT8)bMineIndex ) )
01561                         {
01562                               fAddCivs = FALSE;
01563                         }
01564                   }
01565             }
01566             if( fAddCivs )
01567             {
01568                   AddSoldierInitListTeamToWorld( CIV_TEAM, 255 );
01569             }
01570 
01571             AddSoldierInitListTeamToWorld( MILITIA_TEAM, 255 );
01572             AddSoldierInitListBloodcats();
01573             //Creatures are only added if there are actually some of them.  It has to go through some
01574             //additional checking.
01575 
01576             #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION 
01577             //Override the sector with the populations specified in the AIViewer
01578             if( gfOverrideSector )
01579             {
01580                   if( gbWorldSectorZ > 0 )
01581                   {
01582                         UNDERGROUND_SECTORINFO *pSector;
01583                         pSector = FindUnderGroundSector( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ );
01584                         pSector->ubNumAdmins = (UINT8)( gsAINumAdmins > 0 ? gsAINumAdmins : 0 );
01585                         pSector->ubNumTroops = (UINT8)( gsAINumTroops > 0 ? gsAINumTroops : 0 );
01586                         pSector->ubNumElites = (UINT8)( gsAINumElites > 0 ? gsAINumElites : 0 );
01587                         pSector->ubNumCreatures = (UINT8)( gsAINumCreatures > 0 ? gsAINumCreatures : 0 );
01588                   }
01589                   else if( !gbWorldSectorZ )
01590                   {
01591                         SECTORINFO *pSector;
01592                         pSector = &SectorInfo[ SECTOR( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY ) ];
01593                         pSector->ubNumAdmins = (UINT8)( gsAINumAdmins > 0 ? gsAINumAdmins : 0 );
01594                         pSector->ubNumTroops = (UINT8)( gsAINumTroops > 0 ? gsAINumTroops : 0 );
01595                         pSector->ubNumElites = (UINT8)( gsAINumElites > 0 ? gsAINumElites : 0 );
01596                         pSector->ubNumCreatures = (UINT8)( gsAINumCreatures > 0 ? gsAINumCreatures : 0 );
01597                   }
01598             }
01599             #endif
01600 
01601             PrepareCreaturesForBattle();
01602 
01603             PrepareMilitiaForTactical();
01604 
01605             // OK, set varibles for entring this new sector...
01606             gTacticalStatus.fVirginSector = TRUE;
01607 
01608             //Inserts the enemies into the newly loaded map based on the strategic information.
01609             //Note, the flag will return TRUE only if enemies were added.  The game may wish to
01610             //do something else in a case where no enemies are present.
01611             if( !gfRestoringEnemySoldiersFromTempFile )
01612             {
01613                   //AddSoldierInitListTeamToWorld( CIV_TEAM, 255 );
01614 //                fEnemyPresenceInThisSector = PrepareEnemyForSectorBattle();
01615             }
01616             AddProfilesNotUsingProfileInsertionData();
01617             
01618             if( !AreInMeanwhile() || GetMeanwhileID() == INTERROGATION )
01619             {
01620                   fEnemyPresenceInThisSector = PrepareEnemyForSectorBattle();
01621             }
01622 
01623 
01624             //Regardless whether or not this was set, clear it now.
01625             gfRestoringEnemySoldiersFromTempFile = FALSE;
01626 
01627             //KM:  FEB 8, 99 -- This call is no longer required!  Done already when group arrives in sector.
01628             //if( ( gbWorldSectorZ == 0 ) && ( fEnemyPresenceInThisSector == FALSE ) )
01629             //{
01630             //    SetThisSectorAsPlayerControlled( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, 0 );
01631             //}
01632 
01633             if( gbWorldSectorZ > 0 )
01634             {
01635                   // we always think we control underground sectors once we've visited them
01636                   SectorInfo[ SECTOR( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY ) ].fPlayer[ gbWorldSectorZ ] = TRUE;
01637             }
01638 
01639             //@@@Evaluate
01640             //Add profiles to world using strategic info, not editor placements.
01641             AddProfilesUsingProfileInsertionData();
01642 
01643             PostSchedules();
01644       }
01645 
01646       if( gubEnemyEncounterCode == ENEMY_AMBUSH_CODE || gubEnemyEncounterCode == BLOODCAT_AMBUSH_CODE )
01647       {
01648             if( gMapInformation.sCenterGridNo != -1 )
01649             {
01650                   CallAvailableEnemiesTo( gMapInformation.sCenterGridNo );
01651             }
01652             else
01653             {
01654                   #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
01655                         ScreenMsg( FONT_RED, MSG_ERROR, L"Ambush aborted in sector %c%d -- no center point in map.  LC:1", 
01656                               gWorldSectorY + 'A' - 1, gWorldSectorX );
01657                   #endif
01658             }
01659       }
01660 
01661       EndLoadScreen( );
01662 
01663       if( !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & LOADING_SAVED_GAME ) )
01664       {
01665             // unpause game
01666             UnPauseGame( );
01667       }
01668 
01669       gpBattleGroup = NULL;
01670 
01671       if( gfTacticalTraversal )
01672       {
01673             CalculateNonPersistantPBIInfo();
01674       }
01675 
01676       ScreenMsg( FONT_YELLOW, MSG_DEBUG, L"Current Time is: %d", GetWorldTotalMin() );
01677 
01678       AllTeamsLookForAll( TRUE );
01679 }
01680 
01681 #define RANDOM_HEAD_MINERS 4
01682 void HandleQuestCodeOnSectorEntry( INT16 sNewSectorX, INT16 sNewSectorY, INT8 bNewSectorZ )
01683 {
01684       UINT8       ubRandomMiner[RANDOM_HEAD_MINERS] = { 106, 156, 157, 158 };
01685       UINT8       ubMiner, ubMinersPlaced;
01686       UINT8       ubMine, ubThisMine;
01687       UINT8       cnt;
01688       SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier;
01689 
01690       if ( CheckFact( FACT_ALL_TERRORISTS_KILLED, 0 ) )
01691       {
01692             // end terrorist quest
01693             EndQuest( QUEST_KILL_TERRORISTS, gMercProfiles[ CARMEN ].sSectorX, gMercProfiles[ CARMEN ].sSectorY );
01694             // remove Carmen
01695             gMercProfiles[ CARMEN ].sSectorX = 0;
01696             gMercProfiles[ CARMEN ].sSectorY = 0;
01697             gMercProfiles[ CARMEN ].bSectorZ = 0;
01698       }
01699 
01700       // are we in a mine sector, on the surface?
01701       if ( IsThereAMineInThisSector( sNewSectorX, sNewSectorY ) && ( bNewSectorZ == 0 ))
01702       {
01703             if ( CheckFact( FACT_MINERS_PLACED, 0 ) == FALSE )
01704             {
01705                   // SET HEAD MINER LOCATIONS
01706 
01707                   ubThisMine = GetMineIndexForSector( sNewSectorX, sNewSectorY );
01708 
01709                   if (ubThisMine != MINE_SAN_MONA) // San Mona is abandoned
01710                   {
01711                         ubMinersPlaced = 0;
01712 
01713                         if (ubThisMine != MINE_ALMA)
01714                         {
01715                               // Fred Morris is always in the first mine sector we enter, unless that's Alma (then he's randomized, too)
01716                               gMercProfiles[ 106 ].sSectorX = sNewSectorX;
01717                               gMercProfiles[ 106 ].sSectorY = sNewSectorY;
01718                               gMercProfiles[ 106 ].bSectorZ = 0;
01719                               gMercProfiles[ 106 ].bTown = gMineLocation[ ubThisMine ].bAssociatedTown;
01720 
01721                               // mark miner as placed
01722                               ubRandomMiner[ 0 ] = 0;
01723                               ubMinersPlaced++;
01724                         }
01725 
01726                         // assign the remaining (3) miners randomly
01727                         for ( ubMine = 0; ubMine < MAX_NUMBER_OF_MINES; ubMine++ )
01728                         {
01729                               if ( ubMine == ubThisMine || ubMine == MINE_ALMA || ubMine == MINE_SAN_MONA )
01730                               {
01731                                     // Alma always has Matt as a miner, and we have assigned Fred to the current mine
01732                                     // and San Mona is abandoned
01733                                     continue;
01734                               }
01735                               
01736                               do
01737                               {
01738                                     ubMiner = (UINT8) Random( RANDOM_HEAD_MINERS );
01739                               }
01740                               while( ubRandomMiner[ ubMiner ] == 0 );
01741                               
01742                               GetMineSector( ubMine, (INT16 *)&(gMercProfiles[ ubRandomMiner[ ubMiner ] ].sSectorX),
01743                                                                   (INT16 *)&(gMercProfiles[ ubRandomMiner[ ubMiner ] ].sSectorY) );
01744                               gMercProfiles[ ubRandomMiner[ ubMiner ] ].bSectorZ = 0;
01745                               gMercProfiles[ ubRandomMiner[ ubMiner ] ].bTown = gMineLocation[ ubMine ].bAssociatedTown;
01746 
01747                               // mark miner as placed
01748                               ubRandomMiner[ ubMiner ] = 0;
01749                               ubMinersPlaced++;
01750 
01751                               if (ubMinersPlaced == RANDOM_HEAD_MINERS)
01752                               {
01753                                     break;
01754                               }
01755                         }
01756 
01757                         SetFactTrue( FACT_MINERS_PLACED );
01758                   }
01759             }
01760       }
01761 
01762       if ( CheckFact( FACT_ROBOT_RECRUITED_AND_MOVED, 0 ) == FALSE )
01763       {
01764             SOLDIERTYPE * pRobot;
01765             pRobot = FindSoldierByProfileID( ROBOT, TRUE );
01766             if (pRobot)
01767             {
01768                   // robot is on our team and we have changed sectors, so we can
01769                   // replace the robot-under-construction in Madlab's sector
01770                   RemoveGraphicFromTempFile( gsRobotGridNo, SEVENTHISTRUCT1, gMercProfiles[MADLAB].sSectorX, gMercProfiles[MADLAB].sSectorY, gMercProfiles[MADLAB].bSectorZ );
01771                   SetFactTrue( FACT_ROBOT_RECRUITED_AND_MOVED );
01772             }
01773       }
01774 
01775       // Check to see if any player merc has the Chalice; if so, 
01776       // note it as stolen
01777       cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;
01778 
01779       for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; cnt++,pSoldier++)
01780       {
01781             if ( pSoldier->bActive )
01782             {
01783                   if ( FindObj( pSoldier, CHALICE ) != ITEM_NOT_FOUND )
01784                   {
01785                         SetFactTrue( FACT_CHALICE_STOLEN );
01786                   }
01787             }
01788       }
01789 
01790       if ( (gubQuest[ QUEST_KINGPIN_MONEY ] == QUESTINPROGRESS) && CheckFact( FACT_KINGPIN_CAN_SEND_ASSASSINS, 0 ) && (GetTownIdForSector( sNewSectorX, sNewSectorY ) != BLANK_SECTOR) && Random( 10 + GetNumberOfMilitiaInSector( sNewSectorX, sNewSectorY, bNewSectorZ ) ) < 3 )
01791       {
01792             DecideOnAssassin();
01793       }
01794 
01795 /*
01796       if ( sNewSectorX == 5 && sNewSectorY == MAP_ROW_C )
01797       {
01798             // reset Madame Layla counters
01799             gMercProfiles[ MADAME ].bNPCData = 0;
01800             gMercProfiles[ MADAME ].bNPCData2 = 0;
01801       }
01802       */
01803 
01804       if ( sNewSectorX == 6 && sNewSectorY == MAP_ROW_C && gubQuest[ QUEST_RESCUE_MARIA ] == QUESTDONE )
01805       {
01806             // make sure Maria and Angel are gone
01807             gMercProfiles[ MARIA ].sSectorX = 0;
01808             gMercProfiles[ ANGEL ].sSectorY = 0;
01809             gMercProfiles[ MARIA ].sSectorX = 0;
01810             gMercProfiles[ ANGEL ].sSectorY = 0;
01811       }
01812 
01813       if ( sNewSectorX == 5 && sNewSectorY == MAP_ROW_D )
01814       {
01815             gubBoxerID[ 0 ] = NOBODY;
01816             gubBoxerID[ 1 ] = NOBODY;
01817             gubBoxerID[ 2 ] = NOBODY;
01818       }
01819 
01820       if ( sNewSectorX == 3 && sNewSectorY == MAP_ROW_P )
01821       {
01822             // heal up Elliot if he's been hurt
01823             if ( gMercProfiles[ ELLIOT ].bLife < gMercProfiles[ ELLIOT ].bLifeMax )
01824             {
01825                   gMercProfiles[ ELLIOT ].bLife = gMercProfiles[ ELLIOT ].bLifeMax;
01826             }
01827       }
01828 
01829       ResetOncePerConvoRecordsForAllNPCsInLoadedSector();
01830 }
01831 
01832 void HandleQuestCodeOnSectorExit( INT16 sOldSectorX, INT16 sOldSectorY, INT8 bOldSectorZ )
01833 {
01834       if ( sOldSectorX == KINGPIN_MONEY_SECTOR_X && sOldSectorY == KINGPIN_MONEY_SECTOR_Y && bOldSectorZ == KINGPIN_MONEY_SECTOR_Z )
01835       {
01836             CheckForKingpinsMoneyMissing( TRUE );
01837       }
01838 
01839       if ( sOldSectorX == 13 && sOldSectorY == MAP_ROW_H && bOldSectorZ == 0 && CheckFact( FACT_CONRAD_SHOULD_GO, 0 ) )
01840       {
01841             // remove Conrad from the map
01842             gMercProfiles[ CONRAD ].sSectorX = 0;
01843             gMercProfiles[ CONRAD ].sSectorY = 0;
01844       }
01845 
01846       if ( sOldSectorX == HOSPITAL_SECTOR_X && sOldSectorY == HOSPITAL_SECTOR_Y && bOldSectorZ == HOSPITAL_SECTOR_Z )
01847       {
01848             CheckForMissingHospitalSupplies();
01849       }
01850 
01851       // reset the state of the museum alarm for Eldin's quotes
01852       SetFactFalse( FACT_MUSEUM_ALARM_WENT_OFF );
01853 }
01854 
01855 BOOLEAN EnterSector( INT16 sSectorX, INT16 sSectorY , INT8 bSectorZ )
01856 {
01857       INT32 i;
01858       UNDERGROUND_SECTORINFO *pNode = NULL;
01859       CHAR8 bFilename[ 50 ];
01860 
01861       // pause game
01862       PauseGame( );
01863 
01864       // stop time for this frame
01865       InterruptTime( );
01866 
01867       //Setup the tactical existance of RPCs and CIVs in the last sector before moving on to a new sector.
01868       //@@@Evaluate
01869       if( gfWorldLoaded )
01870       {
01871             for( i = gTacticalStatus.Team[ CIV_TEAM ].bFirstID; i <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ CIV_TEAM ].bLastID; i++ )
01872             {
01873                   if( MercPtrs[ i ]->bActive && MercPtrs[ i ]->bInSector )
01874                   {
01875                         SetupProfileInsertionDataForSoldier( MercPtrs[ i ] );
01876                   }
01877             }
01878       }
01879 
01880       if( !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & LOADING_SAVED_GAME ) )
01881       {
01882             // Handle NPC stuff related to changing sectors
01883             HandleQuestCodeOnSectorEntry( sSectorX, sSectorY, bSectorZ );
01884       }
01885 
01886       // Begin Load
01887       BeginLoadScreen( );
01888 
01889       // This has tobe done before loadworld, as it will remmove old gridnos if present
01890       RemoveMercsInSector( );
01891       
01892       if( AreInMeanwhile() == FALSE )
01893       {
01894             SetSectorFlag( sSectorX, sSectorY, bSectorZ, SF_ALREADY_VISITED );
01895       }
01896 
01897 
01898       GetMapFileName( sSectorX, sSectorY, bSectorZ,  bFilename, TRUE, TRUE );
01899 
01900       //Load the placeholder map if the real map doesn't exist.
01901       if( !MapExists((UINT8 *) bFilename ) )
01902       {
01903             if( !MapExists( (UINT8 *)"Placeholder1.dat" ) )
01904                   AssertMsg( 0, "Failed to find Placeholder1.dat (placeholder map)." );
01905       }
01906 
01907       CreateLoadingScreenProgressBar();
01908       #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
01909       //set the font
01910       SetProgressBarMsgAttributes( 0, FONT12ARIAL, FONT_MCOLOR_WHITE, 0 );
01911 
01912       //Set the tile so we don see the text come up
01913       SetProgressBarTextDisplayFlag( 0, TRUE, TRUE, TRUE );
01914       #endif
01915 
01916       //CreateProgressBar( 0, 160, 380, 480, 400 );
01917       //#ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
01918       //    //add more detailed progress bar
01919       //    DefineProgressBarPanel( 0, 65, 79, 94, 130, 350, 510, 430 );
01920       //    swprintf( str, L"Loading map:  %S", bFilename );
01921       //    SetProgressBarTitle( 0, str, FONT12POINT1, FONT_BLACK, FONT_BLACK );
01922       //#endif
01923       if( !LoadWorld((UINT8 *) bFilename ) )
01924       {
01925             return( FALSE );
01926       }
01927 
01928       // underground?
01929       if( bSectorZ )
01930       {
01931             pNode = FindUnderGroundSector( sSectorX, sSectorY, bSectorZ );
01932             
01933             // is there a sector?..if so set flag
01934             if( pNode )
01935             {
01936                   pNode->fVisited = TRUE;
01937             }
01938       }
01939 
01940       // if we arent loading a saved game
01941       // ATE: Moved this form above, so that we can have the benefit of
01942       // changing the world BEFORE adding guys to it...
01943       if( !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & LOADING_SAVED_GAME ) )
01944       {
01945             // Load the current sectors Information From the temporary files
01946             if( !LoadCurrentSectorsInformationFromTempItemsFile() )
01947             { //The integrity of the temp files have been compromised.  Boot out of the game after warning message.
01948                   InitExitGameDialogBecauseFileHackDetected();
01949                   return TRUE;
01950             }
01951       }
01952 
01953       RemoveLoadingScreenProgressBar();
01954       //RemoveProgressBar( 0 );
01955 
01956       if( gfEnterTacticalPlacementGUI )
01957       {
01958             SetPendingNewScreen(GAME_SCREEN);
01959             InitTacticalPlacementGUI();
01960       }
01961       else
01962       {
01963             PrepareLoadedSector();
01964       }
01965 
01966 //    UnPauseGame( );
01967 
01968       // This function will either hide or display the tree tops, depending on the game setting
01969       SetTreeTopStateForMap();
01970 
01971       return TRUE; //because the map was loaded.
01972 }
01973 
01974 
01975 void UpdateMercsInSector( INT16 sSectorX, INT16 sSectorY, INT8 bSectorZ )
01976 {
01977       INT32                         cnt;
01978       SOLDIERTYPE       *pSoldier;
01979       BOOLEAN                       fPOWSquadSet = FALSE;
01980       UINT8                         ubPOWSquad=0;
01981 
01982       // Remove from interface slot
01983       RemoveAllPlayersFromSlot( );
01984 
01985       // Remove tactical interface stuff
01986       guiPendingOverrideEvent = I_CHANGE_TO_IDLE;
01987 
01988       //If we are in this function during the loading of a sector
01989       if( !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & LOADING_SAVED_GAME ) )
01990       {
01991             //DONT set these values
01992             gusSelectedSoldier = NO_SOLDIER;    
01993             gfGameScreenLocateToSoldier = TRUE;
01994       }
01995 
01996       // Set all faces intactive
01997       SetAllAutoFacesInactive( );
01998 
01999       if ( fUsingEdgePointsForStrategicEntry )
02000       {
02001             BeginMapEdgepointSearch();
02002       }
02003 
02004       //if( !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & LOADING_SAVED_GAME ) )
02005       {
02006             for ( cnt = 0, pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt < MAX_NUM_SOLDIERS; cnt++, pSoldier++)
02007             {     
02008                   if ( gfRestoringEnemySoldiersFromTempFile && 
02009                               cnt >= gTacticalStatus.Team[ ENEMY_TEAM ].bFirstID &&
02010                               cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ CREATURE_TEAM ].bLastID )
02011                   { //Don't update enemies/creatures (consec. teams) if they were
02012                         //just restored via the temp map files...
02013                         continue;
02014                   }
02015                   // Remove old merc, if exists
02016                   RemoveMercSlot( pSoldier );
02017 
02018                   pSoldier->bInSector = FALSE;
02019 
02020                   if ( pSoldier->bActive  )
02021                   {
02022                         if( !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & LOADING_SAVED_GAME ) )
02023                         {
02024                               if( gMapInformation.sCenterGridNo != -1 && gfBlitBattleSectorLocator && 
02025                                           (gubEnemyEncounterCode == ENEMY_AMBUSH_CODE || gubEnemyEncounterCode == BLOODCAT_AMBUSH_CODE) && pSoldier->bTeam != CIV_TEAM )
02026                               {
02027                                     pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode = INSERTION_CODE_GRIDNO;
02028                                     pSoldier->usStrategicInsertionData = gMapInformation.sCenterGridNo; 
02029                               }
02030                               else if( gfOverrideInsertionWithExitGrid )
02031                               {
02032                                     pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode = INSERTION_CODE_GRIDNO;
02033                                     pSoldier->usStrategicInsertionData = gExitGrid.usGridNo;
02034                               }
02035                         }
02036 
02037                         if ( pSoldier->sSectorX == sSectorX && pSoldier->sSectorY == sSectorY && pSoldier->bSectorZ == bSectorZ && !pSoldier->fBetweenSectors )
02038                         {
02039                               gbMercIsNewInThisSector[ pSoldier->ubID ] = 1;
02040 
02041                               UpdateMercInSector( pSoldier, sSectorX, sSectorY, bSectorZ );
02042 
02043                               if( !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & LOADING_SAVED_GAME ) )
02044                               {
02045                                     if ( pSoldier->bAssignment == ASSIGNMENT_POW )
02046                                     {
02047                                           if ( !fPOWSquadSet )
02048                                           {
02049                                                 fPOWSquadSet = TRUE;
02050 
02051                                                 // ATE: If we are in i13 - pop up message!
02052                                                 if ( sSectorY == MAP_ROW_I && sSectorX == 13 )
02053                                                 {
02054                                                       DoMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, TacticalStr[ POW_MERCS_ARE_HERE ], GAME_SCREEN, ( UINT8 )MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL, NULL );    
02055                                                 }
02056                                                 else
02057                                                 {
02058                                                       AddCharacterToUniqueSquad( pSoldier );
02059                                                       ubPOWSquad = pSoldier->bAssignment;                                           
02060                                                       pSoldier->bNeutral            = FALSE;
02061                                                 }
02062                                           }
02063                                           else
02064                                           {
02065                                                 if ( sSectorY != MAP_ROW_I && sSectorX != 13 )
02066                                                 {
02067                                                       AddCharacterToSquad( pSoldier, ubPOWSquad );
02068                                                 }
02069                                           }
02070 
02071                                           // ATE: Call actions based on what POW we are on...
02072                                           if ( gubQuest[ QUEST_HELD_IN_ALMA ] == QUESTINPROGRESS )
02073                                           {
02074                                                 // Complete quest
02075                                                 EndQuest( QUEST_HELD_IN_ALMA, sSectorX, sSectorY );
02076 
02077                                                 // Do action
02078                                                 HandleNPCDoAction( 0, NPC_ACTION_GRANT_EXPERIENCE_3, 0 );
02079 
02080                                           }
02081 
02082                                     }
02083                               }
02084                         }
02085                         else
02086                         {
02087                               pSoldier->bInSector = FALSE;
02088                         }
02089                   }
02090             }
02091       }
02092 
02093       if ( fUsingEdgePointsForStrategicEntry )
02094       {
02095             EndMapEdgepointSearch();
02096 
02097             // Set to false
02098             fUsingEdgePointsForStrategicEntry = FALSE;
02099       }
02100 
02101 }
02102 
02103 void UpdateMercInSector( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sSectorX, INT16 sSectorY, INT8 bSectorZ )
02104 {
02105       BOOLEAN fError = FALSE;
02106       if( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_IS_TACTICALLY_VALID)
02107       {
02108             pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode = INSERTION_CODE_GRIDNO;
02109       }
02110       // OK, determine entrence direction and get sweetspot
02111       // Only if we are an OK guy to control....
02112       // SOME CHECKS HERE MUST BE FLESHED OUT......
02113       if ( pSoldier->bActive )            // This was in the if, removed by DEF:  pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE && 
02114       {
02115             // If we are not in transit...
02116             if ( pSoldier->bAssignment != IN_TRANSIT )
02117             {                       
02118                   // CHECK UBINSERTION CODE..
02119                   if( pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode == INSERTION_CODE_PRIMARY_EDGEINDEX || 
02120                               pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode == INSERTION_CODE_SECONDARY_EDGEINDEX )
02121                   {
02122                         if ( !fUsingEdgePointsForStrategicEntry )
02123                         {
02124                               // If we are not supposed to use this now, pick something better...
02125                               pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode = (UINT8)pSoldier->usStrategicInsertionData;
02126                         }
02127                   }
02128 
02129                   MAPEDGEPOINT_SEARCH_FAILED:
02130 
02131                   if ( pSoldier->ubProfile != NO_PROFILE && gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].ubMiscFlags3 & PROFILE_MISC_FLAG3_PERMANENT_INSERTION_CODE )
02132                   {
02133                         // override orders
02134                         pSoldier->bOrders = STATIONARY;
02135                   }
02136 
02137 
02138                   // Use insertion direction from loaded map!
02139                   switch( pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode )
02140                   {
02141                         case INSERTION_CODE_NORTH:
02142                               pSoldier->sInsertionGridNo = gMapInformation.sNorthGridNo;
02143                               if ( !gfEditMode && gMapInformation.sNorthGridNo == -1 )
02144                                     fError = TRUE;
02145                               break;
02146                         case INSERTION_CODE_SOUTH:
02147                               pSoldier->sInsertionGridNo = gMapInformation.sSouthGridNo;
02148                               if ( !gfEditMode && gMapInformation.sSouthGridNo == -1)
02149                                     fError = TRUE;
02150                               break;
02151                         case INSERTION_CODE_EAST:
02152                               pSoldier->sInsertionGridNo = gMapInformation.sEastGridNo;
02153                               if ( !gfEditMode && gMapInformation.sEastGridNo == -1)
02154                                     fError = TRUE;
02155                               break;
02156                         case INSERTION_CODE_WEST:
02157                               pSoldier->sInsertionGridNo = gMapInformation.sWestGridNo;
02158                               if ( !gfEditMode && gMapInformation.sWestGridNo == -1)
02159                                     fError = TRUE;
02160                               break;
02161                         case INSERTION_CODE_CENTER:
02162                               pSoldier->sInsertionGridNo = gMapInformation.sCenterGridNo;
02163                               if ( !gfEditMode && gMapInformation.sCenterGridNo == -1)
02164                                     fError = TRUE;
02165                               break;
02166                         case INSERTION_CODE_GRIDNO:
02167                               pSoldier->sInsertionGridNo = pSoldier->usStrategicInsertionData;
02168                               break;
02169 
02170                         case INSERTION_CODE_PRIMARY_EDGEINDEX:
02171                               pSoldier->sInsertionGridNo = SearchForClosestPrimaryMapEdgepoint( pSoldier->sPendingActionData2, (UINT8)pSoldier->usStrategicInsertionData );
02172                               #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
02173                               {
02174                                     UINT8 str[256];
02175                                     sprintf( (char *)str, "%S's primary insertion gridno is %d using %d as initial search gridno and %d insertion code.", 
02176                                                                               pSoldier->name, pSoldier->sInsertionGridNo, pSoldier->sPendingActionData2, pSoldier->usStrategicInsertionData );
02177                                     DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, str );  
02178                               }
02179                               #endif
02180                               if( pSoldier->sInsertionGridNo == NOWHERE )
02181                               {
02182                                     ScreenMsg( FONT_RED, MSG_ERROR, L"Main edgepoint search failed for %s -- substituting entrypoint.", pSoldier->name );
02183                                     pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode = (UINT8)pSoldier->usStrategicInsertionData;
02184                                     goto MAPEDGEPOINT_SEARCH_FAILED;
02185                               }
02186                               break;
02187                         case INSERTION_CODE_SECONDARY_EDGEINDEX:
02188                               pSoldier->sInsertionGridNo = SearchForClosestSecondaryMapEdgepoint( pSoldier->sPendingActionData2, (UINT8)pSoldier->usStrategicInsertionData );
02189                               #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
02190                               {
02191                                     UINT8 str[256];
02192                                     sprintf( (char *)str, "%S's isolated insertion gridno is %d using %d as initial search gridno and %d insertion code.", 
02193                                                                               pSoldier->name, pSoldier->sInsertionGridNo, pSoldier->sPendingActionData2, pSoldier->usStrategicInsertionData );
02194                                     DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, str );  
02195                               }
02196                               #endif
02197                               if( pSoldier->sInsertionGridNo == NOWHERE )
02198                               {
02199                                     ScreenMsg( FONT_RED, MSG_ERROR, L"Isolated edgepont search failed for %s -- substituting entrypoint.", pSoldier->name );
02200                                     pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode = (UINT8)pSoldier->usStrategicInsertionData;
02201                                     goto MAPEDGEPOINT_SEARCH_FAILED;
02202                               }
02203                               break;
02204 
02205                         case INSERTION_CODE_ARRIVING_GAME:
02206                               // Are we in Omerta!
02207                               if ( sSectorX == gWorldSectorX && gWorldSectorX == 9 && sSectorY == gWorldSectorY && gWorldSectorY == 1 && bSectorZ == gbWorldSectorZ && gbWorldSectorZ == 0 )
02208                               {
02209                                     // Try another location and walk into map
02210                                     pSoldier->sInsertionGridNo = 4379;
02211                               }
02212                               else
02213                               {
02214                                     pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode = INSERTION_CODE_NORTH;
02215                                     pSoldier->sInsertionGridNo                       = gMapInformation.sNorthGridNo;
02216                               }
02217                               break;
02218                         case INSERTION_CODE_CHOPPER:
02219                               // Try another location and walk into map
02220                               // Add merc to chopper....
02221                               //pSoldier->sInsertionGridNo = 4058;
02222                               AddMercToHeli( pSoldier->ubID );
02223                               return;
02224                               break;
02225                         default:
02226                               pSoldier->sInsertionGridNo = 12880;
02227                               DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String( "Improper insertion code %d given to UpdateMercsInSector", pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode ) );                                        
02228                               break;
02229                   }
02230 
02231                   if( fError )
02232                   { //strategic insertion failed because it expected to find an entry point.  This is likely 
02233                         //a missing part of the map or possible fault in strategic movement costs, traversal logic, etc.
02234                         UINT16 szEntry[10];
02235                         UINT16 szSector[10];
02236                         INT16 sGridNo;
02237                         GetLoadedSectorString( szSector );
02238                         if( gMapInformation.sNorthGridNo != -1 )
02239                         {
02240                               swprintf( szEntry, L"north" );
02241                               sGridNo = gMapInformation.sNorthGridNo;
02242                         }
02243                         else if( gMapInformation.sEastGridNo != -1 )
02244                         {
02245                               swprintf( szEntry, L"east" );
02246                               sGridNo = gMapInformation.sEastGridNo;
02247                         }
02248                         else if( gMapInformation.sSouthGridNo != -1 )
02249                         {
02250                               swprintf( szEntry, L"south" );
02251                               sGridNo = gMapInformation.sSouthGridNo;
02252                         }
02253                         else if( gMapInformation.sWestGridNo != -1 )
02254                         {
02255                               swprintf( szEntry, L"west" );
02256                               sGridNo = gMapInformation.sWestGridNo;
02257                         }
02258                         else if( gMapInformation.sCenterGridNo != -1 )
02259                         {
02260                               swprintf( szEntry, L"center" );
02261                               sGridNo = gMapInformation.sCenterGridNo;
02262                         }
02263                         else 
02264                         {
02265                               ScreenMsg( FONT_RED, MSG_BETAVERSION, L"Sector %s has NO entrypoints -- using precise center of map for %s.", szSector, pSoldier->name );
02266                               pSoldier->sInsertionGridNo = 12880;
02267                               AddSoldierToSector( pSoldier->ubID );
02268                               return;
02269                         }
02270                         pSoldier->sInsertionGridNo = sGridNo;
02271                         switch( pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode )
02272                         {
02273                               case INSERTION_CODE_NORTH:
02274                                     ScreenMsg( FONT_RED, MSG_BETAVERSION, L"Sector %s doesn't have a north entrypoint -- substituting  %s entrypoint for %s.", szSector, szEntry, pSoldier->name );
02275                                     break;
02276                               case INSERTION_CODE_EAST:
02277                                     ScreenMsg( FONT_RED, MSG_BETAVERSION, L"Sector %s doesn't have a east entrypoint -- substituting  %s entrypoint for %s.", szSector, szEntry, pSoldier->name );
02278                                     break;
02279                               case INSERTION_CODE_SOUTH:
02280                                     ScreenMsg( FONT_RED, MSG_BETAVERSION, L"Sector %s doesn't have a south entrypoint -- substituting  %s entrypoint for %s.", szSector, szEntry, pSoldier->name );
02281                                     break;
02282                               case INSERTION_CODE_WEST:
02283                                     ScreenMsg( FONT_RED, MSG_BETAVERSION, L"Sector %s doesn't have a west entrypoint -- substituting  %s entrypoint for %s.", szSector, szEntry, pSoldier->name );
02284                                     break;
02285                               case INSERTION_CODE_CENTER:
02286                                     ScreenMsg( FONT_RED, MSG_BETAVERSION, L"Sector %s doesn't have a center entrypoint -- substituting  %s entrypoint for %s.", szSector, szEntry, pSoldier->name );
02287                                     break;
02288                         }
02289                   }
02290                   // If no insertion direction exists, this is bad!
02291                   if ( pSoldier->sInsertionGridNo == -1 )
02292                   {
02293                         DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String( "Insertion gridno for direction %d not added to map sector %d %d", pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode, sSectorX, sSectorY ) );                                          
02294                         pSoldier->sInsertionGridNo = 12880;
02295                   }
02296 
02297                   AddSoldierToSector( pSoldier->ubID );
02298             }
02299       }
02300 }
02301 
02302 // Get sector ID string makes a string like 'A9 - OMERTA', or just J11 if no town....
02303 void GetSectorIDString( INT16 sSectorX, INT16 sSectorY, INT8 bSectorZ , CHAR16 * zString, BOOLEAN fDetailed )
02304 {
02305       SECTORINFO *pSector = NULL;
02306       UNDERGROUND_SECTORINFO *pUnderground;
02307       INT8        bTownNameID;      
02308       INT8        bMineIndex;
02309       UINT8 ubSectorID = 0;
02310       UINT8 ubLandType = 0;
02311 
02312       if( sSectorX <= 0 || sSectorY <= 0 || bSectorZ < 0 )
02313       {
02314             //swprintf( zString, L"%s", pErrorStrings[0] );
02315       }
02316       else if( bSectorZ != 0 )
02317       {
02318             pUnderground = FindUnderGroundSector( sSectorX, sSectorY, bSectorZ );
02319             if( pUnderground && ( pUnderground->fVisited || gfGettingNameFromSaveLoadScreen ) )
02320             {
02321                   bMineIndex = GetIdOfMineForSector( sSectorX, sSectorY, bSectorZ );
02322                   if( bMineIndex != -1 )
02323                   {
02324                         swprintf( (wchar_t *)zString, (wchar_t *)L"%c%d: %s %s", 'A' + sSectorY - 1, sSectorX, pTownNames[ GetTownAssociatedWithMine( bMineIndex ) ], pwMineStrings[ 0 ] );
02325                   }
02326                   else switch( SECTOR( sSectorX, sSectorY ) )
02327                   {
02328                         case SEC_A10:
02329                               swprintf( (wchar_t *)zString, (wchar_t *)L"A10: %s", pLandTypeStrings[ REBEL_HIDEOUT ] );
02330                               break;
02331                         case SEC_J9:
02332                               swprintf( (wchar_t *)zString,(wchar_t *) L"J9: %s", pLandTypeStrings[ TIXA_DUNGEON ] );
02333                               break;
02334                         case SEC_K4:
02335                               swprintf( (wchar_t *)zString, (wchar_t *)L"K4: %s", pLandTypeStrings[ ORTA_BASEMENT ] );
02336                               break;
02337                         case SEC_O3:
02338                               swprintf( (wchar_t *)zString,(wchar_t *) L"O3: %s", pLandTypeStrings[ TUNNEL ] );
02339                               break;
02340                         case SEC_P3:
02341                               swprintf( (wchar_t *)zString, (wchar_t *)L"P3: %s", pLandTypeStrings[ SHELTER ] );
02342                               break;
02343                         default:
02344                               swprintf( (wchar_t *)zString, (wchar_t *)L"%c%d: %s", 'A' + sSectorY - 1, sSectorX, pLandTypeStrings[ CREATURE_LAIR ] );
02345                               break;
02346                   }
02347             }
02348             else
02349             { //Display nothing
02350                   wcscpy( zString, L"" );
02351             }
02352       }
02353       else
02354       {
02355             bTownNameID = StrategicMap[ CALCULATE_STRATEGIC_INDEX( sSectorX, sSectorY ) ].bNameId;
02356             ubSectorID = (UINT8)SECTOR( sSectorX, sSectorY );
02357             pSector = &SectorInfo[ ubSectorID ];
02358             ubLandType = pSector->ubTraversability[ 4 ];
02359             swprintf( (wchar_t *)zString, (wchar_t *)L"%c%d: ", 'A' + sSectorY - 1, sSectorX );
02360 
02361             if ( bTownNameID == BLANK_SECTOR )
02362             {
02363                   // OK, build string id like J11
02364                   // are we dealing with the unfound towns?
02365                   switch( ubSectorID )
02366                   {
02367                         case SEC_D2: //Chitzena SAM
02368                               if( !fSamSiteFound[ SAM_SITE_ONE ] )
02369                                     wcscat( zString, pLandTypeStrings[ TROPICS ] );
02370                               else if( fDetailed )
02371                                     wcscat( zString, pLandTypeStrings[ TROPICS_SAM_SITE ] );
02372                               else 
02373                                     wcscat( zString, pLandTypeStrings[ SAM_SITE ] );
02374                               break;
02375                         case SEC_D15: //Drassen SAM
02376                               if( !fSamSiteFound[ SAM_SITE_TWO ] )
02377                                     wcscat( zString, pLandTypeStrings[ SPARSE ] );
02378                               else if( fDetailed )
02379                                     wcscat( zString, pLandTypeStrings[ SPARSE_SAM_SITE ] );
02380                               else 
02381                                     wcscat( zString, pLandTypeStrings[ SAM_SITE ] );
02382                               break;
02383                         case SEC_I8: //Cambria SAM
02384                               if( !fSamSiteFound[ SAM_SITE_THREE ] )
02385                                     wcscat( zString, pLandTypeStrings[ SAND ] );
02386                               else if( fDetailed )
02387                                     wcscat( zString, pLandTypeStrings[ SAND_SAM_SITE ] );
02388                               else 
02389                                     wcscat( zString, pLandTypeStrings[ SAM_SITE ] );
02390                               break;
02391                         default:
02392                               wcscat( zString, pLandTypeStrings[ ubLandType ] );
02393                               break;
02394                   }
02395             }
02396             else
02397             {
02398                   switch( ubSectorID )
02399                   {
02400                         case SEC_B13:
02401                               if( fDetailed )
02402                                     wcscat( zString, pLandTypeStrings[ DRASSEN_AIRPORT_SITE ] );
02403                               else
02404                                     wcscat( zString, pTownNames[ DRASSEN ] );
02405                               break;
02406                         case SEC_F8:
02407                               if( fDetailed )
02408                                     wcscat( zString, pLandTypeStrings[ CAMBRIA_HOSPITAL_SITE ] );
02409                               else
02410                                     wcscat( zString, pTownNames[ CAMBRIA ] );
02411                               break;
02412                         case SEC_J9: //Tixa
02413                               if( !fFoundTixa )
02414                                     wcscat( zString, pLandTypeStrings[ SAND ] );
02415                               else
02416                                     wcscat( zString, pTownNames[ TIXA ] );
02417                               break;
02418                         case SEC_K4: //Orta
02419                               if( !fFoundOrta )
02420                                     wcscat( zString, pLandTypeStrings[ SWAMP ] );
02421                               else
02422                                     wcscat( zString, pTownNames[ ORTA ] );
02423                               break;
02424                         case SEC_N3: 
02425                               if( fDetailed )
02426                                     wcscat( zString, pLandTypeStrings[ MEDUNA_AIRPORT_SITE ] );
02427                               else
02428                                     wcscat( zString, pTownNames[ MEDUNA ] );
02429                               break;
02430                         default:
02431                               if( ubSectorID == SEC_N4 && fSamSiteFound[ SAM_SITE_FOUR ] )
02432                               {     //Meduna's SAM site
02433                                     if( fDetailed )
02434                                           wcscat( zString, pLandTypeStrings[ MEDUNA_SAM_SITE ] );
02435                                     else
02436                                           wcscat( zString, pLandTypeStrings[ SAM_SITE ] );
02437                               }
02438                               else 
02439                               {     //All other towns that are known since beginning of the game.
02440                                     wcscat( zString, pTownNames[ bTownNameID ] );
02441                                     if( fDetailed )
02442                                     {
02443                                           switch( ubSectorID )
02444                                           { //Append the word, "mine" for town sectors containing a mine.
02445                                                 case SEC_B2:
02446                                                 case SEC_D4:
02447                                                 case SEC_D13:
02448                                                 case SEC_H3:
02449                                                 case SEC_H8:
02450                                                 case SEC_I14:
02451                                                       wcscat( zString, L" " ); //space
02452                                                       wcscat( zString, pwMineStrings[ 0 ] ); //then "Mine"
02453                                                       break;
02454                                           }
02455                                     }
02456                               }
02457                               break;
02458                   }
02459             }
02460       }
02461 }
02462 
02463 
02464 UINT8 SetInsertionDataFromAdjacentMoveDirection( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT8 ubTacticalDirection, INT16 sAdditionalData  )
02465 {
02466       UINT8                   ubDirection;
02467       EXITGRID          ExitGrid;
02468 
02469 
02470       // Set insertion code
02471       switch( ubTacticalDirection )
02472       {
02473             // OK, we are using an exit grid - set insertion values...
02474 
02475             case 255:
02476                   if ( !GetExitGrid( sAdditionalData, &ExitGrid ) )
02477                   {
02478                         AssertMsg( 0, String( "No valid Exit grid can be found when one was expected: SetInsertionDataFromAdjacentMoveDirection." ) );
02479                   }
02480                   ubDirection = 255;
02481                   pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode = INSERTION_CODE_GRIDNO;
02482                   pSoldier->usStrategicInsertionData = ExitGrid.usGridNo;
02483                   pSoldier->bUseExitGridForReentryDirection = TRUE;
02484                   break;            
02485 
02486             case NORTH:
02487                   ubDirection = NORTH_STRATEGIC_MOVE;
02488                   pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode = INSERTION_CODE_SOUTH;
02489                   break;
02490             case SOUTH:
02491                   ubDirection = SOUTH_STRATEGIC_MOVE;
02492                   pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode = INSERTION_CODE_NORTH;
02493                   break;
02494             case EAST:
02495                   ubDirection = EAST_STRATEGIC_MOVE;
02496                   pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode = INSERTION_CODE_WEST;
02497                   break;
02498             case WEST:
02499                   ubDirection = WEST_STRATEGIC_MOVE;
02500                   pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode = INSERTION_CODE_EAST;
02501                   break;
02502             default:
02503                   // Wrong direction given!
02504                   #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
02505                         DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String( "Improper insertion direction %d given to SetInsertionDataFromAdjacentMoveDirection", ubTacticalDirection ) );                                        
02506                         ScreenMsg( FONT_RED, MSG_ERROR, L"Improper insertion direction %d given to SetInsertionDataFromAdjacentMoveDirection", ubTacticalDirection );
02507                   #endif
02508                   ubDirection = EAST_STRATEGIC_MOVE;
02509                   pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode = INSERTION_CODE_WEST;
02510       }
02511 
02512       return( ubDirection );
02513 
02514 }
02515 
02516 UINT8 GetInsertionDataFromAdjacentMoveDirection( UINT8 ubTacticalDirection, INT16 sAdditionalData  )
02517 {
02518       UINT8                   ubDirection;
02519 
02520 
02521       // Set insertion code
02522       switch( ubTacticalDirection )
02523       {
02524             // OK, we are using an exit grid - set insertion values...
02525 
02526             case 255:
02527 
02528                   ubDirection = 255;
02529                   break;            
02530 
02531             case NORTH:
02532                   ubDirection = NORTH_STRATEGIC_MOVE;
02533                   break;
02534             case SOUTH:
02535                   ubDirection = SOUTH_STRATEGIC_MOVE;
02536                   break;
02537             case EAST:
02538                   ubDirection = EAST_STRATEGIC_MOVE;
02539                   break;
02540             case WEST:
02541                   ubDirection = WEST_STRATEGIC_MOVE;
02542                   break;
02543             default:
02544                   // Wrong direction given!
02545                   #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
02546                         DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String( "Improper insertion direction %d given to GetInsertionDataFromAdjacentMoveDirection", ubTacticalDirection ) );                                        
02547                         ScreenMsg( FONT_RED, MSG_ERROR, L"Improper insertion direction %d given to GetInsertionDataFromAdjacentMoveDirection", ubTacticalDirection );
02548                   #endif
02549                   ubDirection = EAST_STRATEGIC_MOVE;
02550       }
02551 
02552       return( ubDirection );
02553 
02554 }

02557 {
02558       UINT8                   ubDirection;
02559 
02560 
02561       // Set insertion code
02562       switch( ubTacticalDirection )
02563       {
02564             // OK, we are using an exit grid - set insertion values...
02565 
02566             case 255:
02567 
02568                   ubDirection = 255;
02569                   break;            
02570 
02571             case NORTH:
02572                   ubDirection = INSERTION_CODE_SOUTH;
02573                   break;
02574             case SOUTH:
02575                   ubDirection = INSERTION_CODE_NORTH;
02576                   break;
02577             case EAST:

02579                   break;

02582                   break;
02583             default:

02585                   #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
02586                         DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String( "Improper insertion direction %d given to SetInsertionDataFromAdjacentMoveDirection", ubTacticalDirection ) );
