02595 
02596 
02597 void JumpIntoAdjacentSector( UINT8 ubTacticalDirection, UINT8 ubJumpCode, INT16 sAdditionalData )
02598 {
02599       INT32 cnt;
02600       SOLDIERTYPE       *pSoldier;
02601       SOLDIERTYPE *pValidSoldier = NULL;
02602       GROUP *pGroup;
02603       UINT32 uiTraverseTime=0;
02604       UINT8 ubDirection;
02605       EXITGRID ExitGrid;
02606       INT8 bPrevAssignment;
02607       UINT8 ubPrevGroupID;
02608       
02609       // Set initial selected
02610       // ATE: moved this towards top...
02611       gubPreferredInitialSelectedGuy = (UINT8)gusSelectedSoldier;
02612 
02613       if ( ubJumpCode == JUMP_ALL_LOAD_NEW || ubJumpCode == JUMP_ALL_NO_LOAD )
02614       {
02615             // TODO: Check flags to see if we can jump!
02616             // Move controllable mercs!
02617             cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;
02618 
02619             // look for all mercs on the same team, 
02620             for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; cnt++,pSoldier++)
02621             {     
02622                   // If we are controllable 
02623                   if ( OK_CONTROLLABLE_MERC( pSoldier) && pSoldier->bAssignment == CurrentSquad( )  )
02624                   {
02625                         pValidSoldier = pSoldier;
02626                         //This now gets handled by strategic movement.  It is possible that the
02627                         //group won't move instantaneously.
02628                         //pSoldier->sSectorX = sNewX;
02629                         //pSoldier->sSectorY = sNewY;
02630 
02631                         ubDirection = GetInsertionDataFromAdjacentMoveDirection( ubTacticalDirection, sAdditionalData );
02632                         break;
02633                   }
02634             }
02635       }
02636       else if ( ( ubJumpCode == JUMP_SINGLE_LOAD_NEW || ubJumpCode == JUMP_SINGLE_NO_LOAD ) )
02637       {
02638             // Use selected soldier...
02639             // This guy should always be 1 ) selected and 2 ) close enough to exit sector to leave
02640             if ( gusSelectedSoldier != NOBODY )
02641             {
02642                   pValidSoldier = MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ];
02643                   ubDirection = GetInsertionDataFromAdjacentMoveDirection( ubTacticalDirection, sAdditionalData );
02644             }
02645 
02646             // save info for desired squad and and time for all single mercs leaving their squad.
02647             bPrevAssignment = pValidSoldier->bAssignment;
02648             ubPrevGroupID = pValidSoldier->ubGroupID;
02649 
02650             if( ubJumpCode == JUMP_SINGLE_NO_LOAD )
02651             { // handle soldier moving by themselves
02652                   HandleSoldierLeavingSectorByThemSelf( pValidSoldier );
02653             }
02654             else
02655             { // now add char to a squad all their own
02656                   AddCharacterToUniqueSquad( pValidSoldier );
02657             }
02658             if( !pValidSoldier->ubNumTraversalsAllowedToMerge && bPrevAssignment < ON_DUTY )
02659             {
02660                   PLAYERGROUP *pPlayer;
02661                   pValidSoldier->ubDesiredSquadAssignment = bPrevAssignment;
02662                   pValidSoldier->ubNumTraversalsAllowedToMerge = 2;
02663                   pGroup = GetGroup( ubPrevGroupID );
02664                   Assert( pGroup );
02665                   Assert( pGroup->fPlayer );
02666                   Assert( pGroup->ubGroupSize );
02667                   pPlayer = pGroup->pPlayerList;
02668                   while( pPlayer )
02669                   {
02670                         if( pPlayer->pSoldier != pValidSoldier )
02671                         {
02672                               pPlayer->pSoldier->ubNumTraversalsAllowedToMerge = 100;
02673                               pPlayer->pSoldier->ubDesiredSquadAssignment = NO_ASSIGNMENT;
02674                         }
02675                         pPlayer = pPlayer->next;
02676                   }
02677             }
02678       }
02679       else
02680       {
02681             // OK, no jump code here given...
02682             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String( "Improper jump code %d given to JumpIntoAdjacentSector", ubJumpCode ) );                                          
02683       }
02684 
02685       Assert( pValidSoldier );
02686 
02687 
02688       //Now, determine the traversal time.
02689       pGroup = GetGroup( pValidSoldier->ubGroupID );
02690       AssertMsg( pGroup, String( "%S is not in a valid group (pSoldier->ubGroupID is %d)",pValidSoldier->name, pValidSoldier->ubGroupID) );
02691 
02692       // If we are going through an exit grid, don't get traversal direction!
02693       if ( ubTacticalDirection != 255 )
02694       {
02695             if( !gbWorldSectorZ )
02696             {
02697                   uiTraverseTime = GetSectorMvtTimeForGroup( (UINT8)SECTOR( pGroup->ubSectorX, pGroup->ubSectorY ), ubDirection, pGroup );
02698             }
02699             else if( gbWorldSectorZ > 0 )
02700             { //We are attempting to traverse in an underground environment.  We need to use a complete different
02701                   //method.  When underground, all sectors are instantly adjacent.
02702                   uiTraverseTime = UndergroundTacticalTraversalTime( ubDirection );
02703             }
02704             if( uiTraverseTime == 0xffffffff )
02705                   AssertMsg( 0, "Attempting to tactically traverse to adjacent sector, despite being unable to do so.");
02706       }
02707 
02708       // Alrighty, we want to do whatever our omnipotent player asked us to do
02709       // this is what the ubJumpCode is for.
02710       // Regardless of that we were asked to do, we MUST walk OFF ( Ian loves this... )
02711       // So..... let's setup our people to walk off...
02712       // We deal with a pGroup here... if an all move or a group...
02713 
02714       // Setup some globals so our callback that deals when guys go off screen is handled....
02715       // Look in the handler function AllMercsHaveWalkedOffSector() below...
02716       gpAdjacentGroup                     = pGroup;
02717       gubAdjacentJumpCode           = ubJumpCode;
02718       guiAdjacentTraverseTime = uiTraverseTime;
02719       gubTacticalDirection  = ubTacticalDirection;
02720       gsAdditionalData              = sAdditionalData;
02721 
02722       // If normal direction, use it!
02723       if ( ubTacticalDirection != 255 )
02724       {
02725             gsAdjacentSectorX                   = (INT16)(gWorldSectorX + DirXIncrementer[ ubTacticalDirection ]);
02726             gsAdjacentSectorY                   = (INT16)(gWorldSectorY + DirYIncrementer[ ubTacticalDirection ]);
02727             gbAdjacentSectorZ                   = pValidSoldier->bSectorZ;
02728       }
02729       else
02730       {
02731             // Take directions from exit grid info!
02732             if ( !GetExitGrid( sAdditionalData, &ExitGrid ) )
02733             {
02734                   AssertMsg( 0, String( "Told to use exit grid at %d but one does not exist", sAdditionalData ) );
02735             }
02736 
02737             gsAdjacentSectorX                   = ExitGrid.ubGotoSectorX;
02738             gsAdjacentSectorY                   = ExitGrid.ubGotoSectorY;
02739             gbAdjacentSectorZ                   = ExitGrid.ubGotoSectorZ;
02740             gusDestExitGridNo                   = ExitGrid.usGridNo;
02741       }
02742 
02743       // Give guy(s) orders to walk off sector...
02744       if( pGroup->fPlayer )
02745       {     //For player groups, update the soldier information
02746             PLAYERGROUP *curr;
02747             INT16                   sGridNo;
02748             UINT8                   ubNum = 0;
02749 
02750             curr = pGroup->pPlayerList;
02751             while( curr )
02752             {     
02753                   if ( OK_CONTROLLABLE_MERC( curr->pSoldier) )
02754                   {
02755                         if ( ubTacticalDirection != 255 )
02756                         {
02757                               sGridNo = PickGridNoNearestEdge( curr->pSoldier, ubTacticalDirection );
02758 
02759                               curr->pSoldier->sPreTraversalGridNo = curr->pSoldier->sGridNo;
02760 
02761                               if ( sGridNo != NOWHERE )
02762                               {
02763                                     // Save wait code - this will make buddy walk off screen into oblivion
02764                                     curr->pSoldier->ubWaitActionToDo = 2;
02765                                     // This will set the direction so we know now to move into oblivion
02766                                     curr->pSoldier->uiPendingActionData1             = ubTacticalDirection;
02767                               }
02768                               else
02769                               {
02770                                     AssertMsg( 0, String( "Failed to get good exit location for adjacentmove" ) );
02771                               }
02772 
02773                               EVENT_GetNewSoldierPath( curr->pSoldier, sGridNo, WALKING );
02774 
02775                         }
02776                         else
02777                         {
02778                                     // Here, get closest location for exit grid....
02779                                     sGridNo = FindGridNoFromSweetSpotCloseToExitGrid( curr->pSoldier, sAdditionalData, 10, &ubDirection );
02780 
02781                                     //curr->pSoldier->
02782                                     if ( sGridNo != NOWHERE )
02783                                     {
02784                                           // Save wait code - this will make buddy walk off screen into oblivion
02785                                     //    curr->pSoldier->ubWaitActionToDo = 2;
02786                                     }
02787                                     else
02788                                     {
02789                                           AssertMsg( 0, String( "Failed to get good exit location for adjacentmove" ) );
02790                                     }
02791 
02792                                     // Don't worry about walk off screen, just stay at gridno...
02793                                     curr->pSoldier->ubWaitActionToDo = 1;
02794 
02795                                     // Set buddy go!
02796                                     gfPlotPathToExitGrid = TRUE;
02797                                     EVENT_GetNewSoldierPath( curr->pSoldier, sGridNo, WALKING );
02798                                     gfPlotPathToExitGrid = FALSE;
02799 
02800                         }
02801                         ubNum++;
02802                   }
02803                   else
02804                   {
02805                         // We will remove them later....
02806                   }
02807                   curr = curr->next;
02808             }
02809 
02810             // ATE: Do another round, removing guys from group that can't go on...
02811 BEGINNING_LOOP:
02812 
02813             curr = pGroup->pPlayerList;
02814             while( curr )
02815             {     
02816                   if ( !OK_CONTROLLABLE_MERC( curr->pSoldier ) )
02817                   {
02818                         RemoveCharacterFromSquads( curr->pSoldier );
02819                         goto BEGINNING_LOOP;
02820                   }
02821                   curr = curr->next;
02822             }
02823 
02824 
02825             // OK, setup TacticalOverhead polling system that will notify us once everybody
02826             // has made it to our destination.
02827             if ( ubTacticalDirection != 255 )
02828             {
02829                   SetActionToDoOnceMercsGetToLocation( WAIT_FOR_MERCS_TO_WALKOFF_SCREEN, ubNum, ubJumpCode, 0, 0 );
02830             }
02831             else
02832             {
02833                   // Add new wait action here...
02834                   SetActionToDoOnceMercsGetToLocation( WAIT_FOR_MERCS_TO_WALK_TO_GRIDNO, ubNum, ubJumpCode, 0, 0 );
02835             }
02836 
02837             // Lock UI!
02838             guiPendingOverrideEvent = LU_BEGINUILOCK;
02839             HandleTacticalUI( );
02840       }
02841 }
02842 
02843 
02844 void HandleSoldierLeavingSectorByThemSelf( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
02845 {
02846       // soldier leaving thier squad behind, will rejoin later
02847       // if soldier in a squad, set the fact they want to return here
02848       UINT8 ubGroupId;
02849 
02850       if( pSoldier->bAssignment < ON_DUTY )
02851       {
02852                   RemoveCharacterFromSquads( pSoldier );
02853 
02854             // are they in a group?..remove from group
02855             if( pSoldier->ubGroupID != 0 )
02856             {
02857                   // remove from group
02858                   RemovePlayerFromGroup(  pSoldier->ubGroupID, pSoldier );
02859                   pSoldier->ubGroupID = 0;
02860             }
02861       }
02862       else
02863       {
02864             // otherwise, they are on thier own, not in a squad, simply remove mvt group
02865             if( pSoldier->ubGroupID && pSoldier->bAssignment != VEHICLE )
02866             { //Can only remove groups if they aren't persistant (not in a squad or vehicle)
02867                   // delete group
02868                   RemoveGroup( pSoldier->ubGroupID );
02869                   pSoldier->ubGroupID = 0;
02870             }
02871       }
02872 
02873       // set to guard
02874       AddCharacterToUniqueSquad( pSoldier );
02875 
02876       if( pSoldier->ubGroupID == 0 )
02877       {
02878         // create independant group
02879         ubGroupId = CreateNewPlayerGroupDepartingFromSector( ( UINT8 )pSoldier->sSectorX, ( UINT8 )pSoldier->sSectorY );
02880         AddPlayerToGroup( ubGroupId , pSoldier );
02881       }
02882 
02883       return;
02884 }
02885 
02886 void AllMercsWalkedToExitGrid()
02887 {
02888       PLAYERGROUP *pPlayer;
02889       BOOLEAN fDone;
02890 
02891   HandlePotentialMoraleHitForSkimmingSectors( gpAdjacentGroup );
02892 
02893       if( gubAdjacentJumpCode == JUMP_ALL_NO_LOAD || gubAdjacentJumpCode == JUMP_SINGLE_NO_LOAD )
02894       {
02895             Assert( gpAdjacentGroup );
02896             pPlayer = gpAdjacentGroup->pPlayerList;
02897             pPlayer = gpAdjacentGroup->pPlayerList;
02898             while( pPlayer )
02899             {
02900                   SetInsertionDataFromAdjacentMoveDirection( pPlayer->pSoldier, gubTacticalDirection, gsAdditionalData );
02901 
02902                   RemoveSoldierFromTacticalSector( pPlayer->pSoldier, TRUE );
02903 
02904                   pPlayer = pPlayer->next;
02905             }
02906 
02907             SetGroupSectorValue( (UINT8)gsAdjacentSectorX, (UINT8)gsAdjacentSectorY, gbAdjacentSectorZ, gpAdjacentGroup->ubGroupID );
02908             AttemptToMergeSeparatedGroups( gpAdjacentGroup, FALSE );
02909 
02910             SetDefaultSquadOnSectorEntry( TRUE );
02911 
02912       }
02913       else
02914       {
02915             //Because we are actually loading the new map, and we are physically traversing, we don't want
02916             //to bring up the prebattle interface when we arrive if there are enemies there.  This flag
02917             //ignores the initialization of the prebattle interface and clears the flag.
02918             gfTacticalTraversal = TRUE;
02919             gpTacticalTraversalGroup = gpAdjacentGroup;
02920 
02921             //Check for any unconcious and/or dead merc and remove them from the current squad, so that they
02922             //don't get moved to the new sector.
02923             fDone = FALSE;
02924             while( !fDone )
02925             {
02926                   fDone = FALSE;
02927                   pPlayer = gpAdjacentGroup->pPlayerList;
02928                   while( pPlayer )
02929                   {
02930                         if( pPlayer->pSoldier->bLife < OKLIFE )
02931                         {
02932                               AddCharacterToUniqueSquad( pPlayer->pSoldier );
02933                               break;
02934                         }
02935                         pPlayer = pPlayer->next;
02936                   }
02937                   if( !pPlayer )
02938                   {
02939                         fDone = TRUE;
02940                   }
02941             }
02942 
02943             // OK, Set insertion direction for all these guys....
02944             Assert( gpAdjacentGroup );
02945             pPlayer = gpAdjacentGroup->pPlayerList;
02946             while( pPlayer )
02947             {
02948                   SetInsertionDataFromAdjacentMoveDirection( pPlayer->pSoldier, gubTacticalDirection, gsAdditionalData );
02949 
02950                   pPlayer = pPlayer->next;
02951             }
02952             SetGroupSectorValue( gsAdjacentSectorX, gsAdjacentSectorY, gbAdjacentSectorZ, gpAdjacentGroup->ubGroupID );
02953             AttemptToMergeSeparatedGroups( gpAdjacentGroup, FALSE );
02954 
02955             gFadeOutDoneCallback = DoneFadeOutExitGridSector;
02956             FadeOutGameScreen( );
02957       }
02958       if( !PlayerMercsInSector( (UINT8)gsAdjacentSectorX, (UINT8)gsAdjacentSectorY, (UINT8)gbAdjacentSectorZ ) )
02959       {
02960             HandleLoyaltyImplicationsOfMercRetreat( RETREAT_TACTICAL_TRAVERSAL, gsAdjacentSectorX, gsAdjacentSectorY, gbAdjacentSectorZ );
02961       }
02962       if( gubAdjacentJumpCode == JUMP_ALL_NO_LOAD || gubAdjacentJumpCode == JUMP_SINGLE_NO_LOAD )
02963       {
02964             gfTacticalTraversal = FALSE;
02965             gpTacticalTraversalGroup = NULL;
02966             gpTacticalTraversalChosenSoldier = NULL;
02967       }
02968 }
02969 
02970 /* BACKUP VERSION -- Before KM rewrote it
02971        The flaw with this version is that traversing multiple squads to an adjacent sector doesn't properly setup
02972        tactical traversal information for the first squads to traverse, only the last.  The new version supports this
02973        feature.
02974 void AllMercsHaveWalkedOffSector( )

02983       { 
02984             //Case 1:
02985             //Move the group the conventionally strategic method
02986

02988             ClearMercPathsAndWaypointsForAllInGroup( gpAdjacentGroup );
02989 
02990             AddWaypointToPGroup( gpAdjacentGroup, (UINT8)gsAdjacentSectorX, (UINT8)gsAdjacentSectorY );
02991 
02992             pPlayer = gpAdjacentGroup->pPlayerList;
02993             while( pPlayer ) 
02994             {
02995                   // NOTE: This line is different from case 2 and 3...
02996                   RemoveSoldierFromTacticalSector( pPlayer->pSoldier, TRUE );
02997 
02998                   // pass flag that this is a tactical traversal, the path built MUST go in the traversed direction even if longer!
02999                   PlotPathForCharacter( pPlayer->pSoldier, gsAdjacentSectorX, gsAdjacentSectorY, TRUE );
03000                   pPlayer = pPlayer->next;
03001             }
03002 
03003             SetDefaultSquadOnSectorEntry( TRUE );
03004       }
03005       else
03006       {
03007             // OK, Set insertion direction for all these guys....
03008             Assert( gpAdjacentGroup );
03009             pPlayer = gpAdjacentGroup->pPlayerList;
03010             while( pPlayer )
03011             {
03012                   SetInsertionDataFromAdjacentMoveDirection( pPlayer->pSoldier, gubTacticalDirection, gsAdditionalData );
03013 
03014                   pPlayer = pPlayer->next;
03015             }
03016             // OK, here we want to leave the screen
03017             // Two things can happen
03018             // 1 ) We are near a sector were there is a finite amount of time to traverse, so
03019             // we bring up mapscreen
03020             // 2 ) We can move right away so do it!
03021             if( guiAdjacentTraverseTime <= 5 )
03022             { 
03023                   INT16 sScreenX, sScreenY, sNewGridNo;
03024                   UINT32       sWorldX, sWorldY;
03025 
03026                   //Case 2:
03027                   //Because tactical travel time between town sectors is inconsequential, just warp the group and
03028                   //the time by 5 minutes.
03029 
03030                   // Loop through each guy and:
03031                   // Determine 'mirror' gridno to place him
03032                   // set that gridno in data
03033                   // change insertion code to use edgepoints....
03034                   pPlayer = gpAdjacentGroup->pPlayerList;
03035                   while( pPlayer )
03036                   {
03037                         pSoldier = pPlayer->pSoldier;
03038 
03039                         // Determine 'mirror' gridno...
03040                         // Convert to absolute xy
03041                         GetWorldXYAbsoluteScreenXY( (INT16)(pSoldier->sX / CELL_X_SIZE ), (INT16)(pSoldier->sY / CELL_Y_SIZE ), &sScreenX, &sScreenY ); 
03042                         
03043                         // Get 'mirror', depending on what direction...
03044                         switch( gubTacticalDirection )
03045                         {
03046                               case NORTH:             sScreenY = 1520;                    break;
03047                               case SOUTH:             sScreenY = 0;                                   break;
03048                               case EAST:              sScreenX = 0;                                   break;
03049                               case WEST:              sScreenX = 3160;                    break;
03050                         }
03051                         
03052                         // Convert into a gridno again.....
03053                         GetFromAbsoluteScreenXYWorldXY( &sWorldX, &sWorldY, sScreenX, sScreenY );
03054                         sNewGridNo = (INT16)GETWORLDINDEXFROMWORLDCOORDS( sWorldY, sWorldX );
03055

03060                         // Now use NEW code....
03061 
03062                         pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode = CalcMapEdgepointClassInsertionCode( pSoldier->sPreTraversalGridNo );
03063 
03064                         fUsingEdgePointsForStrategicEntry = TRUE;
03065 
03066                         pPlayer = pPlayer->next;
03067                   }
03068 
03069                   gfTacticalTraversal = TRUE;
03070                   gpTacticalTraversalGroup = gpAdjacentGroup;
03071                   
03072                   if( gbAdjacentSectorZ > 0 )
03073                   {     //Nasty strategic movement logic doesn't like underground sectors!
03074                         gfUndergroundTacticalTraversal = TRUE;
03075                   }
03076 
03077                   // clear their strategic movement (mercpaths and waypoints)
03078                   ClearMercPathsAndWaypointsForAllInGroup( gpAdjacentGroup );
03079 
03080                   AddWaypointToPGroup( gpAdjacentGroup, (UINT8)gsAdjacentSectorX, (UINT8)gsAdjacentSectorY );
03081 
03082                   pPlayer = gpAdjacentGroup->pPlayerList;
03083                   while( pPlayer )
03084                   {
03085                         // pass flag that this is a tactical traversal, the path built MUST go in the traversed direction even if longer!
03086                         PlotPathForCharacter( pPlayer->pSoldier, gsAdjacentSectorX, gsAdjacentSectorY, TRUE );
03087                         pPlayer = pPlayer->next;
03088                   }
03089 
03090                   if( gbAdjacentSectorZ > 0 )
03091                   {     //Nasty strategic movement logic doesn't like underground sectors!
03092                         gfUndergroundTacticalTraversal = FALSE;
03093                   }
03094 
03095                   //Warp the clock by 5 minutes, but ignore events until that 5 minutes is up.
03096                   //...BUT only if we are above ground (if underground, traversal is always 1 minute.
03097                   if( !gbAdjacentSectorZ )
03098                   {
03099                         UINT32 uiWarpTime;
03100                         uiWarpTime = (GetWorldTotalMin() + 5) * 60 - GetWorldTotalSeconds();

03102                         //WarpGameTime( 300, WARPTIME_NO_PROCESSING_OF_EVENTS );
03103                         //WarpGameTime( 1, WARPTIME_PROCESS_EVENTS_NORMALLY );
03104                   }
03105                   else if( gbAdjacentSectorZ > 0 )
03106                   {
03107                         UINT32 uiWarpTime;
03108                         uiWarpTime = (GetWorldTotalMin() + 1) * 60 - GetWorldTotalSeconds();
03109                         WarpGameTime( uiWarpTime, WARPTIME_PROCESS_TARGET_TIME_FIRST );
03110                         //WarpGameTime( 60, WARPTIME_NO_PROCESSING_OF_EVENTS );
03111                         //WarpGameTime( 1, WARPTIME_PROCESS_EVENTS_NORMALLY );
03112                   }

03115                   //to bring up the prebattle interface when we arrive if there are enemies there.  This flag

03117                   gFadeOutDoneCallback = DoneFadeOutAdjacentSector;
03118                   FadeOutGameScreen( );
03119             }
03120             else
03121             { //Case 3:
03122                   BOOLEAN fWarpTime = FALSE;
03123 
03124                   if( !gbAdjacentSectorZ && NumEnemiesInSector( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY ) )
03125                   { //We are retreating from a sector with enemies in it and there are no mercs left  so 
03126                         //warp the game time by 5 minutes to simulate the actual retreat.  This restricts the 
03127                         //player from immediately coming back to the same sector they left to perhaps take advantage
03128                         //of the tactical placement gui to get into better position.  Additionally, if there are any 
03129                         //enemies in this sector that are part of a movement group, reset that movement group so that they 
03130                         //are "in" the sector rather than 75% of the way to the next sector if that is the case.
03131                         fWarpTime = TRUE;
03132                         ResetMovementForEnemyGroupsInLocation( (UINT8)gWorldSectorX, (UINT8)gWorldSectorY );
03133                   }
03134                   
03135                   //Lock game into mapscreen mode, but after the fade is done.
03136                   gfEnteringMapScreen = TRUE;
03137 
03138                   // ATE; Fade FAST....
03139                   SetMusicFadeSpeed( 5 );
03140                   SetMusicMode( MUSIC_TACTICAL_NOTHING );
03141                   // clear their strategic movement (mercpaths and waypoints)
03142                   ClearMercPathsAndWaypointsForAllInGroup( gpAdjacentGroup );
03143 
03144                   AddWaypointToPGroup( gpAdjacentGroup, (UINT8)gsAdjacentSectorX, (UINT8)gsAdjacentSectorY );
03145 
03146                   pPlayer = gpAdjacentGroup->pPlayerList;
03147                   while( pPlayer )
03148                   {
03149                         // pass flag that this is a tactical traversal, the path built MUST go in the traversed direction even if longer!
03150                         PlotPathForCharacter( pPlayer->pSoldier, gsAdjacentSectorX, gsAdjacentSectorY, TRUE );
03151                         pPlayer = pPlayer->next;
03152                   }
03153                   if( fWarpTime )
03154                   {
03155                         WarpGameTime( 300, WARPTIME_NO_PROCESSING_OF_EVENTS );
03156                   }
03157             }
03158       }
03159 }
03160 */
03161 
03162 void SetupTacticalTraversalInformation()
03163 {
03164       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
03165       PLAYERGROUP *pPlayer;
03166       UINT32 sWorldX, sWorldY;
03167       INT16 sScreenX, sScreenY, sNewGridNo;
03168 
03169       Assert( gpAdjacentGroup );
03170       pPlayer = gpAdjacentGroup->pPlayerList;
03171       while( pPlayer )
03172       {
03173             pSoldier = pPlayer->pSoldier;
03174 
03175             SetInsertionDataFromAdjacentMoveDirection( pSoldier, gubTacticalDirection, gsAdditionalData );
03176 
03177             // pass flag that this is a tactical traversal, the path built MUST go in the traversed direction even if longer!
03178             PlotPathForCharacter( pSoldier, gsAdjacentSectorX, gsAdjacentSectorY, TRUE );
03179             
03180             if( guiAdjacentTraverseTime <= 5 )
03181             {
03182                   // Determine 'mirror' gridno...
03183                   // Convert to absolute xy
03184                   GetWorldXYAbsoluteScreenXY( (INT16)(pSoldier->sX / CELL_X_SIZE ), (INT16)(pSoldier->sY / CELL_Y_SIZE ), &sScreenX, &sScreenY ); 
03185                   
03186                   // Get 'mirror', depending on what direction...
03187                   switch( gubTacticalDirection )
03188                   {
03189                         case NORTH:             sScreenY = 1520;        break;
03190                         case SOUTH:             sScreenY = 0;                 break;
03191                         case EAST:              sScreenX = 0;                 break;
03192                         case WEST:              sScreenX = 3160;        break;
03193                   }
03194                   
03195                   // Convert into a gridno again.....
03196                   GetFromAbsoluteScreenXYWorldXY( (INT32 *)&sWorldX, (INT32 *)&sWorldY, sScreenX, sScreenY );
03197                   sNewGridNo = (INT16)GETWORLDINDEXFROMWORLDCOORDS( sWorldY, sWorldX );
03198                   
03199                   // Save this gridNo....
03200                   pSoldier->sPendingActionData2                   = sNewGridNo;
03201                   // Copy CODe computed earlier into data
03202                   pSoldier->usStrategicInsertionData  = pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode;
03203                   // Now use NEW code....
03204 
03205                   pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode = CalcMapEdgepointClassInsertionCode( pSoldier->sPreTraversalGridNo );
03206 
03207                   if( gubAdjacentJumpCode == JUMP_SINGLE_LOAD_NEW || gubAdjacentJumpCode == JUMP_ALL_LOAD_NEW )
03208                   {
03209                         fUsingEdgePointsForStrategicEntry = TRUE;
03210                   }
03211             }
03212 
03213             pPlayer = pPlayer->next;
03214       }
03215       if( gubAdjacentJumpCode == JUMP_ALL_NO_LOAD || gubAdjacentJumpCode == JUMP_SINGLE_NO_LOAD )
03216       {
03217             gfTacticalTraversal = FALSE;
03218             gpTacticalTraversalGroup = NULL;
03219             gpTacticalTraversalChosenSoldier = NULL;
03220       }
03221 }
03222 
03223 void AllMercsHaveWalkedOffSector( )
03224 {
03225       DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"AllMercsHaveWalkedOffSector");
03226 
03227       PLAYERGROUP *pPlayer;
03228       BOOLEAN fEnemiesInLoadedSector = FALSE;
03229 
03230       if( NumEnemiesInAnySector( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ ) )
03231       {
03232             fEnemiesInLoadedSector = TRUE;            
03233       }
03234 
03235       HandleLoyaltyImplicationsOfMercRetreat( RETREAT_TACTICAL_TRAVERSAL, gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ );
03236 
03237       //Setup strategic traversal information
03238       if( guiAdjacentTraverseTime <= 5 )
03239       {
03240             gfTacticalTraversal = TRUE;
03241             gpTacticalTraversalGroup = gpAdjacentGroup;
03242 
03243             if( gbAdjacentSectorZ > 0 && guiAdjacentTraverseTime <= 5 )
03244             {     //Nasty strategic movement logic doesn't like underground sectors!
03245                   gfUndergroundTacticalTraversal = TRUE;
03246             }
03247       }
03248       ClearMercPathsAndWaypointsForAllInGroup( gpAdjacentGroup );
03249       AddWaypointToPGroup( gpAdjacentGroup, (UINT8)gsAdjacentSectorX, (UINT8)gsAdjacentSectorY );
03250       if( gbAdjacentSectorZ > 0 && guiAdjacentTraverseTime <= 5 )
03251       {     //Nasty strategic movement logic doesn't like underground sectors!
03252             gfUndergroundTacticalTraversal = TRUE;
03253       }
03254 
03255       SetupTacticalTraversalInformation();
03256 
03257       // ATE: Added here: donot load another screen if we were told not to....
03258       if( ( gubAdjacentJumpCode == JUMP_ALL_NO_LOAD || gubAdjacentJumpCode == JUMP_SINGLE_NO_LOAD ) )
03259       { //Case 1:  Group is leaving sector, but there are other mercs in sector and player wants to stay, or 
03260             //         there are other mercs in sector while a battle is in progress.
03261             pPlayer = gpAdjacentGroup->pPlayerList;
03262             while( pPlayer ) 
03263             {
03264                   RemoveSoldierFromTacticalSector( pPlayer->pSoldier, TRUE );
03265                   pPlayer = pPlayer->next;
03266             }
03267             SetDefaultSquadOnSectorEntry( TRUE );
03268       }
03269       else
03270       {
03271             if( fEnemiesInLoadedSector )
03272             { //We are retreating from a sector with enemies in it and there are no mercs left  so 
03273                   //warp the game time by 5 minutes to simulate the actual retreat.  This restricts the 
03274                   //player from immediately coming back to the same sector they left to perhaps take advantage
03275                   //of the tactical placement gui to get into better position.  Additionally, if there are any 
03276                   //enemies in this sector that are part of a movement group, reset that movement group so that they 
03277                   //are "in" the sector rather than 75% of the way to the next sector if that is the case.
03278                   ResetMovementForEnemyGroupsInLocation( (UINT8)gWorldSectorX, (UINT8)gWorldSectorY );
03279 
03280                   if( guiAdjacentTraverseTime > 5 )
03281                   {
03282                         //Because this final group is retreating, simulate extra time to retreat, so they can't immediately come back.
03283                         WarpGameTime( 300, WARPTIME_NO_PROCESSING_OF_EVENTS );
03284                   }
03285             }
03286             if( guiAdjacentTraverseTime <= 5 )
03287             {
03288                   //Case 2:  Immediatly loading the next sector
03289                   if( !gbAdjacentSectorZ )
03290                   {
03291                         UINT32 uiWarpTime;
03292                         uiWarpTime = (GetWorldTotalMin() + 5) * 60 - GetWorldTotalSeconds();
03293                         WarpGameTime( uiWarpTime, WARPTIME_PROCESS_TARGET_TIME_FIRST );
03294                   }
03295                   else if( gbAdjacentSectorZ > 0 )
03296                   {
03297                         UINT32 uiWarpTime;
03298                         uiWarpTime = (GetWorldTotalMin() + 1) * 60 - GetWorldTotalSeconds();
03299                         WarpGameTime( uiWarpTime, WARPTIME_PROCESS_TARGET_TIME_FIRST );
03300                   }
03301 
03302                   //Because we are actually loading the new map, and we are physically traversing, we don't want
03303                   //to bring up the prebattle interface when we arrive if there are enemies there.  This flag
03304                   //ignores the initialization of the prebattle interface and clears the flag.
03305                   gFadeOutDoneCallback = DoneFadeOutAdjacentSector;
03306                   FadeOutGameScreen( );
03307             }
03308             else
03309             { //Case 3:  Going directly to mapscreen
03310             
03311                   //Lock game into mapscreen mode, but after the fade is done.
03312                   gfEnteringMapScreen = TRUE;
03313 
03314                   // ATE; Fade FAST....
03315                   SetMusicFadeSpeed( 5 );
03316                   SetMusicMode( MUSIC_TACTICAL_NOTHING );
03317             }
03318       }
03319       DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"AllMercsHaveWalkedOffSector done");
03320 }
03321 
03322 void DoneFadeOutExitGridSector( )
03323 {
03324       SetCurrentWorldSector( gsAdjacentSectorX, gsAdjacentSectorY, gbAdjacentSectorZ );
03325       if( gfTacticalTraversal && gpTacticalTraversalGroup && gpTacticalTraversalChosenSoldier )
03326       {
03327             if( gTacticalStatus.fEnemyInSector )
03328             {
03329                   TacticalCharacterDialogueWithSpecialEvent( gpTacticalTraversalChosenSoldier, QUOTE_ENEMY_PRESENCE, 0, 0, 0 );
03330             }
03331       }
03332       gfTacticalTraversal = FALSE;
03333       gpTacticalTraversalGroup = NULL;
03334       gpTacticalTraversalChosenSoldier = NULL;
03335       FadeInGameScreen( );
03336 }
03337 
03338 void DoneFadeOutAdjacentSector( )
03339 {
03340       UINT8 ubDirection;
03341       SetCurrentWorldSector( gsAdjacentSectorX, gsAdjacentSectorY, gbAdjacentSectorZ );
03342 
03343       ubDirection = GetStrategicInsertionDataFromAdjacentMoveDirection( gubTacticalDirection, gsAdditionalData );
03344       if( gfTacticalTraversal && gpTacticalTraversalGroup && gpTacticalTraversalChosenSoldier )
03345       {
03346             if( gTacticalStatus.fEnemyInSector )
03347             {
03348                   TacticalCharacterDialogueWithSpecialEvent( gpTacticalTraversalChosenSoldier, QUOTE_ENEMY_PRESENCE, 0, 0, 0 );
03349             }
03350       }
03351       gfTacticalTraversal = FALSE;
03352       gpTacticalTraversalGroup = NULL;
03353       gpTacticalTraversalChosenSoldier = NULL;
03354 
03355       if ( gfCaves )
03356       {
03357             // ATE; Set tactical status flag...
03358             gTacticalStatus.uiFlags |= IGNORE_ALL_OBSTACLES;
03359             // Set pathing flag to path through anything....
03360             gfPathAroundObstacles = FALSE;
03361       }
03362       
03363       // OK, give our guys new orders...
03364       if( gpAdjacentGroup->fPlayer )
03365       {     
03366             //For player groups, update the soldier information
03367             PLAYERGROUP *curr;
03368             UINT32 uiAttempts;
03369             INT16                   sGridNo, sOldGridNo;
03370             UINT8                   ubNum = 0;
03371             INT16 sWorldX, sWorldY;
03372             curr = gpAdjacentGroup->pPlayerList;
03373             while( curr )
03374             {     
03375                   if( !(curr->pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_IS_TACTICALLY_VALID) )
03376                   {
03377                         if( curr->pSoldier->sGridNo != NOWHERE )
03378                         {
03379                               sGridNo = PickGridNoToWalkIn( curr->pSoldier, ubDirection, &uiAttempts );
03380 
03381                               //If the search algorithm failed due to too many attempts, simply reset the
03382                               //the gridno as the destination is a reserved gridno and we will place the
03383                               //merc there without walking into the sector.
03384                               if( sGridNo == NOWHERE && uiAttempts == MAX_ATTEMPTS )
03385                               {
03386                                     sGridNo = curr->pSoldier->sGridNo;
03387                               }
03388 
03389                               if( sGridNo != NOWHERE )
03390                               {
03391                                     curr->pSoldier->ubWaitActionToDo = 1;
03392                                     // OK, here we have been given a position, a gridno has been given to use as well....
03393                                     sOldGridNo = curr->pSoldier->sGridNo;
03394                                     sWorldX = CenterX( sGridNo );
03395                                     sWorldY = CenterY( sGridNo );
03396                                     EVENT_SetSoldierPosition( curr->pSoldier, sWorldX, sWorldY );
03397                                     if( sGridNo != sOldGridNo )
03398                                     {
03399                                           EVENT_GetNewSoldierPath( curr->pSoldier, sOldGridNo, WALKING );
03400                                     }
03401                                     ubNum++;
03402                               }
03403                         }
03404                         else
03405                         {
03406                               #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
03407                                     UINT8 str[256];
03408                                     sprintf( (char *)str, "%S's gridno is NOWHERE, and is attempting to walk into sector.", curr->pSoldier->name );
03409                                     DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, str );  
03410                               #endif
03411                         }
03412                   }
03413                   curr = curr->next;
03414             }
03415             SetActionToDoOnceMercsGetToLocation( WAIT_FOR_MERCS_TO_WALKON_SCREEN, ubNum, 0, 0, 0 );
03416             guiPendingOverrideEvent = LU_BEGINUILOCK;
03417             HandleTacticalUI( );
03418 
03419             // Unset flag here.....
03420             gfPathAroundObstacles = TRUE;
03421 
03422       }
03423       FadeInGameScreen( );
03424 }
03425 
03426 
03427 
03428 BOOLEAN SoldierOKForSectorExit( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, INT8 bExitDirection, UINT16 usAdditionalData )
03429 {
03430       INT16 sXMapPos;
03431       INT16 sYMapPos;
03432       INT16 sWorldX;
03433       INT16 sWorldY;
03434       UINT8 ubDirection;
03435       INT16 sGridNo;
03436       INT16 sAPs;
03437 
03438       // if the soldiers gridno is not NOWHERE
03439       if( pSoldier->sGridNo == NOWHERE )
03440             return( FALSE );
03441 
03442       // OK, anyone on roofs cannot!
03443       if ( pSoldier->bLevel > 0 )
03444             return( FALSE );
03445 
03446       // get world absolute XY
03447       ConvertGridNoToXY( pSoldier->sGridNo, &sXMapPos, &sYMapPos );
03448 
03449       // Get screen coordinates for current position of soldier
03450       GetWorldXYAbsoluteScreenXY( sXMapPos, sYMapPos, &sWorldX, &sWorldY);
03451 
03452       // Check direction
03453       switch( bExitDirection )
03454       {     
03455             case EAST_STRATEGIC_MOVE:
03456 
03457                   if ( sWorldX < ( ( gsTRX - gsTLX ) - CHECK_DIR_X_DELTA ) )
03458                   {
03459                         // NOT OK, return FALSE
03460                         return( FALSE );
03461                   }
03462                   break;
03463 
03464             case WEST_STRATEGIC_MOVE:
03465 
03466                   if ( sWorldX > CHECK_DIR_X_DELTA )
03467                   {
03468                         // NOT OK, return FALSE
03469                         return( FALSE );
03470                   }
03471                   break;
03472 
03473             case SOUTH_STRATEGIC_MOVE:
03474 
03475                   if ( sWorldY < ( ( gsBLY - gsTRY ) - CHECK_DIR_Y_DELTA ) )
03476                   {
03477                         // NOT OK, return FALSE
03478                         return( FALSE );
03479                   }
03480                   break;
03481 
03482             case NORTH_STRATEGIC_MOVE:
03483 
03484                   if ( sWorldY > CHECK_DIR_Y_DELTA )
03485                   {
03486                         // NOT OK, return FALSE
03487                         return( FALSE );
03488                   }
03489                   break;
03490 
03491                   // This case is for an exit grid....
03492                   // check if we are close enough.....
03493 
03494             case -1:
03495 
03496 
03497                   // FOR REALTIME - DO MOVEMENT BASED ON STANCE!
03498                   if ( ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & REALTIME ) || !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
03499                   {
03500                         pSoldier->usUIMovementMode =  GetMoveStateBasedOnStance( pSoldier, gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight );
03501                   }
03502 
03503                   sGridNo = FindGridNoFromSweetSpotCloseToExitGrid( pSoldier, usAdditionalData, 10, &ubDirection );
03504 
03505                   if ( sGridNo == NOWHERE )
03506                   {
03507                         return( FALSE );
03508                   }
03509 
03510                   // ATE: if we are in combat, get cost to move here....
03511                   if ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT )
03512                   {
03513                         // Turn off at end of function...
03514                         sAPs = PlotPath( pSoldier, sGridNo, NO_COPYROUTE, NO_PLOT, TEMPORARY, (UINT16)pSoldier->usUIMovementMode, NOT_STEALTH, FORWARD, pSoldier->bActionPoints );
03515 
03516                         if ( !EnoughPoints( pSoldier, sAPs, 0, FALSE ) )
03517                         {
03518                               return( FALSE );
03519                         }
03520                   }
03521                   break;
03522 
03523       }
03524       return( TRUE );
03525 }
03526 
03527 //ATE: Returns FALSE if NOBODY is close enough, 1 if ONLY selected guy is and 2 if all on squad are...
03528 BOOLEAN OKForSectorExit( INT8 bExitDirection, UINT16 usAdditionalData, UINT32 *puiTraverseTimeInMinutes )
03529 {
03530       INT32 cnt;
03531       SOLDIERTYPE       *pSoldier;
03532       BOOLEAN           fAtLeastOneMercControllable = FALSE;
03533       BOOLEAN           fOnlySelectedGuy = FALSE;
03534       SOLDIERTYPE *pValidSoldier = NULL;
03535       UINT8             ubReturnVal = FALSE;
03536       UINT8             ubNumControllableMercs = 0;
03537       UINT8         ubNumMercs = 0, ubNumEPCs = 0;
03538       UINT8     ubPlayerControllableMercsInSquad = 0;
03539 
03540       if( gusSelectedSoldier == NOBODY )
03541       { //must have a selected soldier to be allowed to tactically traverse.
03542             return FALSE;
03543       }
03544 
03545       /*
03546       //Exception code for the two sectors in San Mona that are separated by a cliff.  We want to allow strategic
03547       //traversal, but NOT tactical traversal.  The only way to tactically go from D4 to D5 (or viceversa) is to enter
03548       //the cave entrance.
03549       if( gWorldSectorX == 4 && gWorldSectorY == 4 && !gbWorldSectorZ && bExitDirection == EAST_STRATEGIC_MOVE )
03550       {
03551             gfInvalidTraversal = TRUE;
03552             return FALSE;
03553       }
03554       if( gWorldSectorX == 5 && gWorldSectorY == 4 && !gbWorldSectorZ && bExitDirection == WEST_STRATEGIC_MOVE )
03555       {
03556             gfInvalidTraversal = TRUE;
03557             return FALSE;
03558       }
03559       */
03560             
03561       gfInvalidTraversal = FALSE;
03562       gfLoneEPCAttemptingTraversal = FALSE;
03563       gubLoneMercAttemptingToAbandonEPCs = 0;
03564       gbPotentiallyAbandonedEPCSlotID = -1;
03565 
03566       // Look through all mercs and check if they are within range of east end....
03567       cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;
03568 
03569   // look for all mercs on the same team, 
03570   for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; cnt++,pSoldier++)
03571       {     
03572             // If we are controllable 
03573             if ( OK_CONTROLLABLE_MERC( pSoldier) && pSoldier->bAssignment == CurrentSquad( ) )
03574             {
03575                   //Need to keep a copy of a good soldier, so we can access it later, and
03576                   //not more than once.
03577                   pValidSoldier = pSoldier;
03578 
03579                   ubNumControllableMercs++;
03580 
03581                   //We need to keep track of the number of EPCs and mercs in this squad.  If we have
03582                   //only one merc and one or more EPCs, then we can't allow the merc to tactically traverse,
03583                   //if he is the only merc near enough to traverse.
03584                   if( AM_AN_EPC( pSoldier ) )
03585                   {
03586                         ubNumEPCs++;
03587                         //Also record the EPC's slot ID incase we later build a string using the EPC's name.
03588                         gbPotentiallyAbandonedEPCSlotID = (INT8)cnt;
03589                         if( AM_A_ROBOT( pSoldier ) && !CanRobotBeControlled( pSoldier ) )
03590                         {
03591                               gfRobotWithoutControllerAttemptingTraversal = TRUE;
03592                               ubNumControllableMercs--;
03593                               continue;
03594                         }
03595                   }
03596                   else
03597                   {
03598                         ubNumMercs++;
03599                   }
03600 
03601                   if ( SoldierOKForSectorExit( pSoldier, bExitDirection, usAdditionalData ) )
03602                   {
03603                         fAtLeastOneMercControllable++;
03604 
03605                         if ( cnt == gusSelectedSoldier )
03606                         {
03607                               fOnlySelectedGuy = TRUE;
03608                         }
03609                   }
03610                   else
03611                   {
03612                         GROUP *pGroup;
03613 
03614                         // ATE: Dont's assume exit grids here...
03615                         if ( bExitDirection != -1 )
03616                         {
03617                               //Now, determine if this is a valid path.
03618                               pGroup = GetGroup( pValidSoldier->ubGroupID );
03619                               AssertMsg( pGroup, String( "%S is not in a valid group (pSoldier->ubGroupID is %d)",pValidSoldier->name, pValidSoldier->ubGroupID) );
03620                               if( !gbWorldSectorZ )
03621                               {
03622                                     *puiTraverseTimeInMinutes = GetSectorMvtTimeForGroup( (UINT8)SECTOR( pGroup->ubSectorX, pGroup->ubSectorY ), bExitDirection, pGroup );
03623                               }
03624                               else if( gbWorldSectorZ > 1 )
03625                               { //We are attempting to traverse in an underground environment.  We need to use a complete different
03626                                     //method.  When underground, all sectors are instantly adjacent.
03627                                     *puiTraverseTimeInMinutes = UndergroundTacticalTraversalTime( bExitDirection );
03628                               }
03629                               if( *puiTraverseTimeInMinutes == 0xffffffff )
03630                               {
03631                                     gfInvalidTraversal = TRUE;
03632                                     return FALSE;
03633                               }
03634                         }
03635                         else
03636                         {
03637                               *puiTraverseTimeInMinutes = 0; //exit grid travel is instantaneous
03638                         }
03639                   }
03640             }
03641       }
03642 
03643       // If we are here, at least one guy is controllable in this sector, at least he can go!
03644       if( fAtLeastOneMercControllable )
03645       {
03646             ubPlayerControllableMercsInSquad = (UINT8)NumberOfPlayerControllableMercsInSquad( MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ]->bAssignment );
03647             if( fAtLeastOneMercControllable <= ubPlayerControllableMercsInSquad )
03648             { //if the selected merc is an EPC and we can only leave with that merc, then prevent it
03649                   //as EPCs aren't allowed to leave by themselves.  Instead of restricting this in the 
03650                   //exiting sector gui, we restrict it by explaining it with a message box.
03651                   if ( AM_AN_EPC( MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ] ) )
03652                   {
03653                         if( AM_A_ROBOT( pSoldier ) && !CanRobotBeControlled( pSoldier ) )
03654                         {
03655                               //gfRobotWithoutControllerAttemptingTraversal = TRUE;
03656                               return FALSE;
03657                         }
03658                         else if( fAtLeastOneMercControllable < ubPlayerControllableMercsInSquad || fAtLeastOneMercControllable == 1 )
03659                         {
03660                               gfLoneEPCAttemptingTraversal = TRUE;
03661                               return FALSE;
03662                         }
03663                   }
03664                   else
03665                   {     //We previously counted the number of EPCs and mercs, and if the selected merc is not an EPC and there are no
03666                         //other mercs in the squad able to escort the EPCs, we will prohibit this merc from tactically traversing.
03667                         if( ubNumEPCs && ubNumMercs == 1 && fAtLeastOneMercControllable < ubPlayerControllableMercsInSquad )
03668                         {
03669                               gubLoneMercAttemptingToAbandonEPCs = ubNumEPCs;
03670                               return FALSE;
03671                         }
03672                   }
03673             }
03674             if ( bExitDirection != -1 )
03675             {
03676                   GROUP *pGroup;
03677                   //Now, determine if this is a valid path.
03678                   pGroup = GetGroup( pValidSoldier->ubGroupID );
03679                   AssertMsg( pGroup, String( "%S is not in a valid group (pSoldier->ubGroupID is %d)",pValidSoldier->name, pValidSoldier->ubGroupID) );
03680                   if( !gbWorldSectorZ )
03681                   {
03682                         *puiTraverseTimeInMinutes = GetSectorMvtTimeForGroup( (UINT8)SECTOR( pGroup->ubSectorX, pGroup->ubSectorY ), bExitDirection, pGroup );
03683                   }
03684                   else if( gbWorldSectorZ > 0 )
03685                   { //We are attempting to traverse in an underground environment.  We need to use a complete different
03686                         //method.  When underground, all sectors are instantly adjacent.
03687                         *puiTraverseTimeInMinutes = UndergroundTacticalTraversalTime( bExitDirection );
03688                   }
03689                   if( *puiTraverseTimeInMinutes == 0xffffffff )
03690                   {
03691                         gfInvalidTraversal = TRUE;
03692                         ubReturnVal = FALSE;
03693                   }
03694                   else
03695                   {
03696                         ubReturnVal = TRUE;
03697                   }
03698             }
03699             else
03700             {
03701                   ubReturnVal = TRUE;
03702                   *puiTraverseTimeInMinutes = 0; //exit grid travel is instantaneous
03703             }
03704       }
03705 
03706       if ( ubReturnVal )
03707       {
03708             // Default to FALSE again, until we see that we have
03709             ubReturnVal = FALSE;
03710 
03711             if ( fAtLeastOneMercControllable )
03712             {
03713                   // Do we contain the selected guy?
03714                   if ( fOnlySelectedGuy )
03715                   {
03716                         ubReturnVal = 1;
03717                   }
03718                   // Is the whole squad able to go here?
03719                   if ( fAtLeastOneMercControllable == ubPlayerControllableMercsInSquad )
03720                   {
03721                         ubReturnVal = 2;
03722                   }
03723             }
03724       }
03725 
03726       return( ubReturnVal );
03727 }
03728 
03729 
03730 void SetupNewStrategicGame( )
03731 {
03732       INT16 sSectorX, sSectorY;
03733 
03734       // Set all sectors as enemy controlled
03735       for ( sSectorX = 0; sSectorX < MAP_WORLD_X; sSectorX++ )
03736       {
03737             for ( sSectorY = 0; sSectorY < MAP_WORLD_Y; sSectorY++ )
03738             {
03739                   StrategicMap[ CALCULATE_STRATEGIC_INDEX( sSectorX, sSectorY ) ].fEnemyControlled = TRUE;
03740             }
03741       }
03742 
03743       //Initialize the game time
03744       InitNewGameClock();
03745       //Remove all events
03746       DeleteAllStrategicEvents();
03747 
03748       //Set up all events that get processed daily...
03749       //.............................................
03750       BuildDayLightLevels();
03751       // Check for quests each morning
03752       AddEveryDayStrategicEvent( EVENT_CHECKFORQUESTS, QUEST_CHECK_EVENT_TIME, 0 );
03753       // Some things get updated in the very early morning
03754       AddEveryDayStrategicEvent( EVENT_DAILY_EARLY_MORNING_EVENTS, EARLY_MORNING_TIME, 0 );
03755       //Daily Update BobbyRay Inventory
03756       AddEveryDayStrategicEvent( EVENT_DAILY_UPDATE_BOBBY_RAY_INVENTORY, BOBBYRAY_UPDATE_TIME, 0 );
03757       //Daily Update of the M.E.R.C. site.
03758       AddEveryDayStrategicEvent( EVENT_DAILY_UPDATE_OF_MERC_SITE, 0, 0 );
03759       //Daily update of insured mercs
03760       AddEveryDayStrategicEvent( EVENT_HANDLE_INSURED_MERCS, INSURANCE_UPDATE_TIME, 0 );
03761       //Daily update of mercs
03762       AddEveryDayStrategicEvent( EVENT_MERC_DAILY_UPDATE, 0, 0 );
03763       // Daily mine production processing events
03764       AddEveryDayStrategicEvent( EVENT_SETUP_MINE_INCOME, 0, 0 );
03765       // Daily merc reputation processing events
03766       AddEveryDayStrategicEvent( EVENT_SETUP_TOWN_OPINION, 0, 0 );
03767       // Daily checks for E-mail from Enrico
03768       AddEveryDayStrategicEvent( EVENT_ENRICO_MAIL, ENRICO_MAIL_TIME , 0 );
03769 
03770 //    if ( gGameOptions.fAirStrikes )
03771 //    {
03772 //          //Daily check for an air raid
03773 //          AddEveryDayStrategicEvent( EVENT_CHECK_FOR_AIR_RAID, 360, 0 );
03774 //    }
03775 //
03776       // Hourly update of all sorts of things
03777       AddPeriodStrategicEvent( EVENT_HOURLY_UPDATE, 60, 0 );
03778       AddPeriodStrategicEvent( EVENT_QUARTER_HOUR_UPDATE, 15, 0 );
03779 
03780       //Clear any possible battle locator
03781       gfBlitBattleSectorLocator = FALSE;
03782 
03783 
03784 
03785 
03786       StrategicTurnsNewGame( );
03787 }
03788 
03789 
03790 // a -1 will be returned upon failure
03791 INT8 GetSAMIdFromSector( INT16 sSectorX, INT16 sSectorY, INT8 bSectorZ )
03792 {
03793       INT8 bCounter = 0;
03794       INT16 sSectorValue = 0;
03795             
03796       // check if valid sector
03797       if( bSectorZ != 0 )
03798       {
03799             return( -1 );
03800       }
03801 
03802       // get the sector value
03803       sSectorValue = SECTOR( sSectorX, sSectorY );
03804 
03805       // run through list of sam sites
03806       for( bCounter = 0; bCounter < 4; bCounter++ )
03807       {
03808             if( pSamList[ bCounter ] == sSectorValue )
03809             {
03810                   return( bCounter );
03811             }
03812       }
03813 
03814 
03815       return( -1 );
03816 }
03817 
03818 
03819 BOOLEAN CanGoToTacticalInSector( INT16 sX, INT16 sY, UINT8 ubZ )
03820 {
03821       //INT32 cnt;
03822       //SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
03823 
03824       // if not a valid sector
03825       if( ( sX < 1 ) || ( sX > 16 ) || ( sY < 1 ) || ( sY > 16 ) || ( ubZ > 3 ) )
03826       {
03827             return( FALSE );
03828       }
03829 
03830 
03831       //cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;
03832 
03833       // look for all living, fighting mercs on player's team.  Robot and EPCs qualify!
03834       //for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; cnt++, pSoldier++)
03835       {
03836             // ARM: now allows loading of sector with all mercs below OKLIFE as long as they're alive
03837             //if( ( pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->bLife ) && !( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) &&
03838             //    ( pSoldier->bAssignment != IN_TRANSIT ) && ( pSoldier->bAssignment != ASSIGNMENT_POW ) &&
03839             //    ( pSoldier->bAssignment != ASSIGNMENT_DEAD ) && !SoldierAboardAirborneHeli( pSoldier ) 
03840             //    )
03841 
03842             //if( (SectorInfo[ SECTOR( gWorldSectorX,gWorldSectorY) ].uiFlags & SF_ALREADY_VISITED) )
03843             if( GetSectorFlagStatus( sSelMapX, sSelMapY, ( UINT8 )iCurrentMapSectorZ, SF_ALREADY_VISITED ) == TRUE )
03844             {
03845                   //if ( !pSoldier->fBetweenSectors && pSoldier->sSectorX == sX && pSoldier->sSectorY == sY && pSoldier->bSectorZ == ubZ )
03846                   {
03847                         return( TRUE );
03848                   }
03849             }
03850       }
03851 
03852       return( FALSE );
03853 }
03854 
03855 
03856 INT32 GetNumberOfSAMSitesUnderPlayerControl( void )
03857 {
03858       INT32 iNumber = 0, iCounter = 0;
03859 
03860       // if the sam site is under player control, up the number
03861       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < NUMBER_OF_SAMS; iCounter++ )
03862       {
03863             if( StrategicMap[ SECTOR_INFO_TO_STRATEGIC_INDEX( pSamList[ iCounter ] ) ].fEnemyControlled == FALSE )
03864             {
03865                   iNumber++;
03866             }
03867       }
03868 
03869       return( iNumber );
03870 }
03871 
03872 INT32 SAMSitesUnderPlayerControl( INT16 sX, INT16 sY )
03873 {
03874       BOOLEAN fSamSiteUnderControl = FALSE;
03875 
03876 
03877       // is this sector a SAM sector?
03878       if( IsThisSectorASAMSector( sX, sY, 0 ) == TRUE )
03879       {
03880             // is it under control by the player
03881             if( StrategicMap[ CALCULATE_STRATEGIC_INDEX( sX , sY ) ].fEnemyControlled == FALSE )
03882             {
03883                   // yes
03884                   fSamSiteUnderControl = TRUE;
03885             }
03886       }     
03887             
03888       return( fSamSiteUnderControl );
03889 }
03890 
03891 
03892 void UpdateAirspaceControl( void )
03893 {
03894       INT32 iCounterA = 0, iCounterB = 0;
03895       UINT8 ubControllingSAM;
03896       StrategicMapElement *pSAMStrategicMap = NULL;
03897       BOOLEAN fEnemyControlsAir;
03898 
03899 
03900       for( iCounterA = 1; iCounterA < ( INT32 )( MAP_WORLD_X - 1 ); iCounterA++ )
03901       {
03902             for( iCounterB = 1; iCounterB < ( INT32 )( MAP_WORLD_Y - 1 ); iCounterB++ )
03903             {
03904                   // IMPORTANT: B and A are reverse here, since the table is stored transposed
03905                   ubControllingSAM = ubSAMControlledSectors[ iCounterB ][ iCounterA ];
03906 
03907                   if ( ( ubControllingSAM >= 1 ) && ( ubControllingSAM <= NUMBER_OF_SAMS ) )
03908                   {
03909                         pSAMStrategicMap = &( StrategicMap[ SECTOR_INFO_TO_STRATEGIC_INDEX( pSamList[ ubControllingSAM - 1 ] ) ] );
03910 
03911                         // if the enemies own the controlling SAM site, and it's in working condition
03912                         if( ( pSAMStrategicMap->fEnemyControlled ) && ( pSAMStrategicMap->bSAMCondition >= MIN_CONDITION_FOR_SAM_SITE_TO_WORK ) )
03913                         {
03914                               fEnemyControlsAir = TRUE;
03915                         }
03916                         else
03917                         {
03918                               fEnemyControlsAir = FALSE;
03919                         }
03920                   }
03921                   else
03922                   {
03923                         // no controlling SAM site
03924                         fEnemyControlsAir = FALSE;
03925                   }
03926 
03927                   StrategicMap[ CALCULATE_STRATEGIC_INDEX( iCounterA, iCounterB ) ].fEnemyAirControlled = fEnemyControlsAir;
03928             }
03929       }
03930 
03931 
03932       // check if currently selected arrival sector still has secure airspace
03933 
03934       // if it's not enemy air controlled
03935       if ( StrategicMap[ CALCULATE_STRATEGIC_INDEX( gsMercArriveSectorX, gsMercArriveSectorY ) ].fEnemyAirControlled == TRUE )
03936       {
03937             // NOPE!
03938             CHAR16 sMsgString[ 256 ], sMsgSubString1[ 64 ], sMsgSubString2[ 64 ];
03939 
03940             // get the name of the old sector
03941             GetSectorIDString( gsMercArriveSectorX, gsMercArriveSectorY, 0, sMsgSubString1, FALSE );
03942 
03943             // move the landing zone over to Omerta
03944             gsMercArriveSectorX = 9;
03945             gsMercArriveSectorY = 1;
03946 
03947             // get the name of the new sector
03948             GetSectorIDString( gsMercArriveSectorX, gsMercArriveSectorY, 0, sMsgSubString2, FALSE );
03949 
03950             // now build the string
03951             swprintf( sMsgString, pBullseyeStrings[ 4 ], sMsgSubString1, sMsgSubString2 );
03952 
03953             // confirm the change with overlay message
03954             DoScreenIndependantMessageBox( sMsgString, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL );
03955 
03956             // update position of bullseye
03957             fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
03958 
03959             // update destination column for any mercs in transit
03960             fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
03961       }
03962 
03963 
03964       // ARM: airspace control now affects refueling site availability, so update that too with every change!
03965       UpdateRefuelSiteAvailability( );
03966 }
03967 
03968 
03969 BOOLEAN IsThereAFunctionalSAMSiteInSector( INT16 sSectorX, INT16 sSectorY, INT8 bSectorZ )
03970 {
03971       if( IsThisSectorASAMSector( sSectorX, sSectorY, bSectorZ ) == FALSE )
03972       {
03973             return( FALSE );
03974       }
03975 
03976       if( StrategicMap[ CALCULATE_STRATEGIC_INDEX( sSectorX, sSectorY ) ].bSAMCondition < MIN_CONDITION_FOR_SAM_SITE_TO_WORK )
03977       {
03978             return( FALSE );
03979       }
03980 
03981       return( TRUE );
03982 }
03983 
03984 BOOLEAN IsThisSectorASAMSector( INT16 sSectorX, INT16 sSectorY, INT8 bSectorZ )
03985 {
03986 
03987       // is the sector above ground?
03988       if( bSectorZ != 0 )
03989       {
03990             return( FALSE );
03991       }
03992 
03993       if( ( SAM_1_X == sSectorX ) && ( SAM_1_Y == sSectorY ) )
03994       {
03995             return( TRUE );
03996       }
03997       else  if( ( SAM_2_X == sSectorX ) && ( SAM_2_Y == sSectorY ) )
03998       {
03999             return( TRUE );
04000       }
04001       else  if( ( SAM_3_X == sSectorX ) && ( SAM_3_Y == sSectorY ) )
04002       {
04003             return( TRUE );
04004       }
04005       else  if( ( SAM_4_X == sSectorX ) && ( SAM_4_Y == sSectorY ) )
04006       {
04007             return( TRUE );
04008       }
04009 
04010       return ( FALSE );
04011 }
04012 
04013 
04014 // is this sector part of the town?
04015 BOOLEAN SectorIsPartOfTown( INT8 bTownId, INT16 sSectorX, INT16 sSectorY ) 
04016 {
04017       if( StrategicMap[CALCULATE_STRATEGIC_INDEX( sSectorX, sSectorY ) ].bNameId == bTownId )
04018       {
04019             // is in the town
04020             return ( TRUE );
04021       }
04022 
04023       // not in the town
04024       return ( FALSE );
04025 }

04027 
04028 BOOLEAN SaveStrategicInfoToSavedFile( HWFILE hFile )
04029 {
04030       UINT32            uiNumBytesWritten=0;
04031       UINT32            uiSize = sizeof( StrategicMapElement ) * ( MAP_WORLD_X * MAP_WORLD_Y );
04032 
04033       
04034       // Save the strategic map information
04035       FileWrite( hFile, StrategicMap, uiSize, &uiNumBytesWritten );
04036       if( uiNumBytesWritten != uiSize)
04037       {
04038             return(FALSE);
04039       }
04040 
04041       // Save the Sector Info
04042       uiSize = sizeof( SECTORINFO ) * 256;
04043       FileWrite( hFile, SectorInfo, uiSize, &uiNumBytesWritten );
04044       if( uiNumBytesWritten != uiSize)
04045       {
04046             return(FALSE);
04047       }
04048 
04049       // Save the SAM Controlled Sector Information
04050       uiSize = MAP_WORLD_X * MAP_WORLD_Y;
04051 /*
04052       FileWrite( hFile, ubSAMControlledSectors, uiSize, &uiNumBytesWritten );
04053       if( uiNumBytesWritten != uiSize)
04054       {
04055             return(FALSE);
04056       }
04057 */
04058       FileSeek( hFile, uiSize, FILE_SEEK_FROM_CURRENT );
04059 
04060       // Save the fFoundOrta
04061       FileWrite( hFile, &fFoundOrta, sizeof( BOOLEAN ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
04062       if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( BOOLEAN ) )
04063       {
04064             return(FALSE);
04065       }
04066 
04067 
04068 
04069       return( TRUE );
04070 }
04071

04091       {
04092             return(FALSE);

04099       if( uiNumBytesRead != uiSize)
04100       {

04102       }
04103 */
