04117 
04118 INT16 PickGridNoNearestEdge( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT8 ubTacticalDirection )
04119 {
04120       INT16             sGridNo, sStartGridNo, sOldGridNo;
04121       INT8              bOdd = 1, bOdd2 = 1;
04122       UINT8             bAdjustedDist = 0;
04123       UINT32            cnt;
04124 
04125       switch( ubTacticalDirection )
04126       {
04127 
04128             case EAST:
04129 
04130                   sGridNo                        = pSoldier->sGridNo;
04131                   sStartGridNo       = pSoldier->sGridNo;
04132                   sOldGridNo     = pSoldier->sGridNo;
04133 
04134                   // Move directly to the right!
04135                   while( GridNoOnVisibleWorldTile( sGridNo ) )
04136                   {
04137                         sOldGridNo = sGridNo;
04138 
04139                         if ( bOdd )
04140                         {
04141                               sGridNo -= WORLD_COLS;
04142                         }
04143                         else
04144                         {
04145                               sGridNo++;
04146                         }
04147                         
04148                         bOdd = (INT8)!bOdd;
04149                   }
04150 
04151                   sGridNo                  = sOldGridNo;
04152                   sStartGridNo = sOldGridNo;
04153 
04154                   do
04155                   {
04156                         // OK, here we go back one, check for OK destination...
04157                         if ( NewOKDestination( pSoldier, sGridNo, TRUE, pSoldier->bLevel ) && FindBestPath( pSoldier, sGridNo, pSoldier->bLevel, WALKING, NO_COPYROUTE, PATH_THROUGH_PEOPLE ) )
04158                         {
04159                               return( sGridNo );
04160                         }
04161 
04162                         // If here, try another place!
04163                         // ( alternate up/down )
04164                         if ( bOdd2 ) 
04165                         {
04166                               bAdjustedDist++;        
04167                               
04168                               sGridNo = sStartGridNo;
04169 
04170                               for ( cnt = 0; cnt < bAdjustedDist; cnt++ )
04171                               {
04172                                     sGridNo = (INT16)(sGridNo - WORLD_COLS - 1);
04173                               }
04174                         }
04175                         else
04176                         {
04177                               sGridNo = sStartGridNo;
04178 
04179                               for ( cnt = 0; cnt < bAdjustedDist; cnt++ )
04180                               {
04181                                     sGridNo = (INT16)(sGridNo + WORLD_COLS + 1);
04182                               }
04183                         }
04184 
04185                         bOdd2 = (INT8)(!bOdd2);
04186 
04187                   } while( TRUE );
04188 
04189                   break;
04190 
04191             case WEST:
04192 
04193                   sGridNo                        = pSoldier->sGridNo;
04194                   sStartGridNo       = pSoldier->sGridNo;
04195                   sOldGridNo     = pSoldier->sGridNo;
04196 
04197                   // Move directly to the left!
04198                   while( GridNoOnVisibleWorldTile( sGridNo ) )
04199                   {
04200                         sOldGridNo = sGridNo;
04201 
04202                         if ( bOdd )
04203                         {
04204                               sGridNo += WORLD_COLS;
04205                         }
04206                         else
04207                         {
04208                               sGridNo--;
04209                         }
04210                         
04211                         bOdd = (INT8)!bOdd;
04212                   }
04213 
04214                   sGridNo                  = sOldGridNo;
04215                   sStartGridNo = sOldGridNo;
04216 
04217                   do
04218                   {
04219                         // OK, here we go back one, check for OK destination...
04220                         if ( NewOKDestination( pSoldier, sGridNo, TRUE, pSoldier->bLevel ) && FindBestPath( pSoldier, sGridNo, pSoldier->bLevel, WALKING, NO_COPYROUTE, PATH_THROUGH_PEOPLE ) )
04221                         {
04222                               return( sGridNo );
04223                         }
04224 
04225                         // If here, try another place!
04226                         // ( alternate up/down )
04227                         if ( bOdd2 ) 
04228                         {
04229                               bAdjustedDist++;        
04230                               
04231                               sGridNo = sStartGridNo;
04232 
04233                               for ( cnt = 0; cnt < bAdjustedDist; cnt++ )
04234                               {
04235                                     sGridNo = (INT16)(sGridNo - WORLD_COLS - 1);
04236                               }
04237                         }
04238                         else
04239                         {
04240                               sGridNo = sStartGridNo;
04241 
04242                               for ( cnt = 0; cnt < bAdjustedDist; cnt++ )
04243                               {
04244                                     sGridNo = (INT16)(sGridNo + WORLD_COLS + 1);
04245                               }
04246                         }
04247 
04248                         bOdd2 = (INT8)(!bOdd2);
04249 
04250                   } while( TRUE );
04251 
04252                   break;
04253 
04254             case NORTH:
04255 
04256                   sGridNo                        = pSoldier->sGridNo;
04257                   sStartGridNo       = pSoldier->sGridNo;
04258                   sOldGridNo     = pSoldier->sGridNo;
04259 
04260                   // Move directly to the left!
04261                   while( GridNoOnVisibleWorldTile( sGridNo ) )
04262                   {
04263                         sOldGridNo = sGridNo;
04264 
04265                         if ( bOdd )
04266                         {
04267                               sGridNo -= WORLD_COLS;
04268                         }
04269                         else
04270                         {
04271                               sGridNo--;
04272                         }
04273                         
04274                         bOdd = (INT8)(!bOdd);
04275                   }
04276 
04277                   sGridNo                  = sOldGridNo;
04278                   sStartGridNo = sOldGridNo;
04279 
04280                   do
04281                   {
04282                         // OK, here we go back one, check for OK destination...
04283                         if ( NewOKDestination( pSoldier, sGridNo, TRUE, pSoldier->bLevel ) && FindBestPath( pSoldier, sGridNo, pSoldier->bLevel, WALKING, NO_COPYROUTE, PATH_THROUGH_PEOPLE ) )
04284                         {
04285                               return( sGridNo );
04286                         }
04287 
04288                         // If here, try another place!
04289                         // ( alternate left/right )
04290                         if ( bOdd2 ) 
04291                         {
04292                               bAdjustedDist++;        
04293                               
04294                               sGridNo = sStartGridNo;
04295 
04296                               for ( cnt = 0; cnt < bAdjustedDist; cnt++ )
04297                               {
04298                                     sGridNo = (INT16)(sGridNo + WORLD_COLS - 1);
04299                               }
04300                         }
04301                         else
04302                         {
04303                               sGridNo = sStartGridNo;
04304 
04305                               for ( cnt = 0; cnt < bAdjustedDist; cnt++ )
04306                               {
04307                                     sGridNo = (INT16)(sGridNo - WORLD_COLS + 1);
04308                               }
04309                         }
04310 
04311                         bOdd2 = (INT8)(!bOdd2);
04312 
04313                   } while( TRUE );
04314 
04315                   break;
04316 
04317             case SOUTH:
04318 
04319                   sGridNo                        = pSoldier->sGridNo;
04320                   sStartGridNo       = pSoldier->sGridNo;
04321                   sOldGridNo     = pSoldier->sGridNo;
04322 
04323                   // Move directly to the left!
04324                   while( GridNoOnVisibleWorldTile( sGridNo ) )
04325                   {
04326                         sOldGridNo = sGridNo;
04327 
04328                         if ( bOdd )
04329                         {
04330                               sGridNo += WORLD_COLS;
04331                         }
04332                         else
04333                         {
04334                               sGridNo++;
04335                         }
04336                         
04337                         bOdd = (INT8)(!bOdd);
04338                   }
04339 
04340                   sGridNo                  = sOldGridNo;
04341                   sStartGridNo = sOldGridNo;
04342 
04343                   do
04344                   {
04345                         // OK, here we go back one, check for OK destination...
04346                         if ( NewOKDestination( pSoldier, sGridNo, TRUE, pSoldier->bLevel ) && FindBestPath( pSoldier, sGridNo, pSoldier->bLevel, WALKING, NO_COPYROUTE, PATH_THROUGH_PEOPLE ) )
04347                         {
04348                               return( sGridNo );
04349                         }
04350 
04351                         // If here, try another place!
04352                         // ( alternate left/right )
04353                         if ( bOdd2 ) 
04354                         {
04355                               bAdjustedDist++;        
04356                               
04357                               sGridNo = sStartGridNo;
04358 
04359                               for ( cnt = 0; cnt < bAdjustedDist; cnt++ )
04360                               {
04361                                     sGridNo = (INT16)(sGridNo + WORLD_COLS - 1);
04362                               }
04363                         }
04364                         else
04365                         {
04366                               sGridNo = sStartGridNo;
04367 
04368                               for ( cnt = 0; cnt < bAdjustedDist; cnt++ )
04369                               {
04370                                     sGridNo = (INT16)(sGridNo - WORLD_COLS + 1);
04371                               }
04372                         }
04373 
04374                         bOdd2 = (INT8)(!bOdd2);
04375 
04376                   } while( TRUE );
04377 
04378                   break;
04379 
04380       }
04381 
04382       return( NOWHERE );
04383 }

04385 
04386 void AdjustSoldierPathToGoOffEdge( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sEndGridNo, UINT8 ubTacticalDirection )
04387 {
04388       INT16 sNewGridNo, sTempGridNo;
04389       INT32 iLoop;
04390 
04391       // will this path segment actually take us to our desired destination in the first place?
04392       if (pSoldier->usPathDataSize + 2 > MAX_PATH_LIST_SIZE)
04393       {
04394 
04395             sTempGridNo = pSoldier->sGridNo;
04396 
04397             for (iLoop = 0; iLoop < pSoldier->usPathDataSize; iLoop++)
04398             {
04399                   sTempGridNo += (INT16)DirectionInc( pSoldier->usPathingData[ iLoop ] );
04400             }
04401 
04402             if (sTempGridNo == sEndGridNo)
04403             {
04404                   // we can make it, but there isn't enough path room for the two steps required.
04405                   // truncate our path so there's guaranteed the merc will have to generate another
04406                   // path later on...     
04407                   pSoldier->usPathDataSize -= 4;
04408                   return;
04409             }
04410             else
04411             {
04412                   // can't even make it there with these 30 tiles of path, abort...
04413                   return;
04414             }
04415       }
04416 
04417       switch( ubTacticalDirection )
04418       {
04419             case EAST:
04420 
04421                   sNewGridNo = NewGridNo( (UINT16)sEndGridNo, (UINT16)DirectionInc( (UINT8)NORTHEAST ) );
04422 
04423                   if ( OutOfBounds( sEndGridNo, sNewGridNo ) )
04424                   {
04425                         return;
04426                   }
04427 
04428                   pSoldier->usPathingData[ pSoldier->usPathDataSize ] = NORTHEAST;
04429                   pSoldier->usPathDataSize++;
04430                   pSoldier->sFinalDestination = sNewGridNo;
04431                   pSoldier->usActionData = sNewGridNo;
04432 
04433                   sTempGridNo = NewGridNo( (UINT16)sNewGridNo, (UINT16)DirectionInc( (UINT8)NORTHEAST ) );
04434 
04435                   if ( OutOfBounds( sNewGridNo, sTempGridNo ) )
04436                   {
04437                         return;
04438                   }
04439                   sNewGridNo = sTempGridNo;
04440 
04441                   pSoldier->usPathingData[ pSoldier->usPathDataSize ] = NORTHEAST;
04442                   pSoldier->usPathDataSize++;
04443                   pSoldier->sFinalDestination = sNewGridNo;
04444                   pSoldier->usActionData = sNewGridNo;
04445 
04446                   break;
04447 
04448             case WEST:
04449 
04450                   sNewGridNo = NewGridNo( (UINT16)sEndGridNo, (UINT16)DirectionInc( (UINT8)SOUTHWEST ) );
04451 
04452                   if ( OutOfBounds( sEndGridNo, sNewGridNo ) )
04453                   {
04454                         return;
04455                   }
04456 
04457                   pSoldier->usPathingData[ pSoldier->usPathDataSize ] = SOUTHWEST;
04458                   pSoldier->usPathDataSize++;
04459                   pSoldier->sFinalDestination = sNewGridNo;
04460                   pSoldier->usActionData = sNewGridNo;
04461 
04462                   sTempGridNo = NewGridNo( (UINT16)sNewGridNo, (UINT16)DirectionInc( (UINT8)SOUTHWEST ) );
04463 
04464                   if ( OutOfBounds( sNewGridNo, sTempGridNo ) )
04465                   {
04466                         return;
04467                   }
04468                   sNewGridNo = sTempGridNo;
04469 
04470                   pSoldier->usPathingData[ pSoldier->usPathDataSize ] = SOUTHWEST;
04471                   pSoldier->usPathDataSize++;
04472                   pSoldier->sFinalDestination = sNewGridNo;
04473                   pSoldier->usActionData = sNewGridNo;
04474                   break;
04475 
04476             case NORTH:
04477 
04478                   sNewGridNo = NewGridNo( (UINT16)sEndGridNo, (UINT16)DirectionInc( (UINT8)NORTHWEST ) );
04479 
04480                   if ( OutOfBounds( sEndGridNo, sNewGridNo ) )
04481                   {
04482                         return;
04483                   }
04484 
04485                   pSoldier->usPathingData[ pSoldier->usPathDataSize ] = NORTHWEST;
04486                   pSoldier->usPathDataSize++;
04487                   pSoldier->sFinalDestination = sNewGridNo;
04488                   pSoldier->usActionData = sNewGridNo;
04489 
04490                   sTempGridNo = NewGridNo( (UINT16)sNewGridNo, (UINT16)DirectionInc( (UINT8)NORTHWEST ) );
04491 
04492                   if ( OutOfBounds( sNewGridNo, sTempGridNo ) )
04493                   {
04494                         return;
04495                   }
04496                   sNewGridNo = sTempGridNo;
04497 
04498                   pSoldier->usPathingData[ pSoldier->usPathDataSize ] = NORTHWEST;
04499                   pSoldier->usPathDataSize++;
04500                   pSoldier->sFinalDestination = sNewGridNo;
04501                   pSoldier->usActionData = sNewGridNo;
04502 
04503                   break;
04504 
04505             case SOUTH:
04506 
04507                   sNewGridNo = NewGridNo( (UINT16)sEndGridNo, (UINT16)DirectionInc( (UINT8)SOUTHEAST ) );
04508 
04509                   if ( OutOfBounds( sEndGridNo, sNewGridNo ) )
04510                   {
04511                         return;
04512                   }
04513 
04514                   pSoldier->usPathingData[ pSoldier->usPathDataSize ] = SOUTHEAST;
04515                   pSoldier->usPathDataSize++;
04516                   pSoldier->sFinalDestination = sNewGridNo;
04517                   pSoldier->usActionData = sNewGridNo;
04518 
04519                   sTempGridNo = NewGridNo( (UINT16)sNewGridNo, (UINT16)DirectionInc( (UINT8)SOUTHEAST ) );
04520 
04521                   if ( OutOfBounds( sNewGridNo, sTempGridNo ) )
04522                   {
04523                         return;
04524                   }
04525                   sNewGridNo = sTempGridNo;
04526 
04527                   pSoldier->usPathingData[ pSoldier->usPathDataSize ] = SOUTHEAST;
04528                   pSoldier->usPathDataSize++;
04529                   pSoldier->sFinalDestination = sNewGridNo;
04530                   pSoldier->usActionData = sNewGridNo;
04531                   break;
04532 
04533       }
04534 }
04535 
04536 INT16 PickGridNoToWalkIn( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT8 ubInsertionDirection, UINT32 *puiNumAttempts )
04537 {
04538       INT16             sGridNo, sStartGridNo, sOldGridNo;
04539       INT8              bOdd = 1, bOdd2 = 1;
04540       UINT8             bAdjustedDist = 0;
04541       UINT32            cnt;
04542 
04543       *puiNumAttempts = 0;
04544 
04545       switch( ubInsertionDirection )
04546       {
04547             // OK, we're given a direction on visible map, let's look for the first oone
04548             // we find that is just on the start of visible map...
04549             case INSERTION_CODE_WEST:
04550 
04551                   sGridNo                        = (INT16)pSoldier->sGridNo;
04552                   sStartGridNo       = (INT16)pSoldier->sGridNo;
04553                   sOldGridNo     = (INT16)pSoldier->sGridNo;
04554 
04555                   // Move directly to the left!
04556                   while( GridNoOnVisibleWorldTile( sGridNo ) )
04557                   {
04558                         sOldGridNo = sGridNo;
04559 
04560                         if ( bOdd )
04561                         {
04562                               sGridNo += WORLD_COLS;
04563                         }
04564                         else
04565                         {
04566                               sGridNo--;
04567                         }
04568                         
04569                         bOdd = (INT8)(!bOdd);
04570                   }
04571 
04572                   sGridNo                  = sOldGridNo;
04573                   sStartGridNo = sOldGridNo;
04574 
04575                   while( *puiNumAttempts < MAX_ATTEMPTS )
04576                   {
04577                         (*puiNumAttempts)++;
04578                         // OK, here we go back one, check for OK destination...
04579                         if ( ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & IGNORE_ALL_OBSTACLES ) || ( NewOKDestination( pSoldier, sGridNo, TRUE, pSoldier->bLevel ) && FindBestPath( pSoldier, sGridNo, pSoldier->bLevel, WALKING, NO_COPYROUTE, PATH_THROUGH_PEOPLE ) ) )
04580                         {
04581                               return( sGridNo );
04582                         }
04583 
04584                         // If here, try another place!
04585                         // ( alternate up/down )
04586                         if ( bOdd2 ) 
04587                         {
04588                               bAdjustedDist++;        
04589                               
04590                               sGridNo = sStartGridNo;
04591 
04592                               for ( cnt = 0; cnt < bAdjustedDist; cnt++ )
04593                               {
04594                                     sGridNo = (INT16)(sGridNo - WORLD_COLS - 1);
04595                               }
04596                         }
04597                         else
04598                         {
04599                               sGridNo = sStartGridNo;
04600 
04601                               for ( cnt = 0; cnt < bAdjustedDist; cnt++ )
04602                               {
04603                                     sGridNo = (INT16)(sGridNo + WORLD_COLS + 1);
04604                               }
04605                         }
04606 
04607                         bOdd2 = (INT8)(!bOdd2);
04608 
04609                   }
04610                   return NOWHERE;
04611 
04612             case INSERTION_CODE_EAST:
04613 
04614                   sGridNo                        = (INT16)pSoldier->sGridNo;
04615                   sStartGridNo       = (INT16)pSoldier->sGridNo;
04616                   sOldGridNo     = (INT16)pSoldier->sGridNo;
04617 
04618                   // Move directly to the right!
04619                   while( GridNoOnVisibleWorldTile( sGridNo ) )
04620                   {
04621                         sOldGridNo = sGridNo;
04622 
04623                         if ( bOdd )
04624                         {
04625                               sGridNo -= WORLD_COLS;
04626                         }
04627                         else
04628                         {
04629                               sGridNo++;
04630                         }
04631                         
04632                         bOdd = (INT8)(!bOdd);
04633                   }
04634 
04635                   sGridNo                  = sOldGridNo;
04636                   sStartGridNo = sOldGridNo;
04637 
04638                   while( *puiNumAttempts < MAX_ATTEMPTS )
04639                   {
04640                         (*puiNumAttempts)++;
04641                         // OK, here we go back one, check for OK destination...
04642                         if ( ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & IGNORE_ALL_OBSTACLES ) || ( NewOKDestination( pSoldier, sGridNo, TRUE, pSoldier->bLevel ) && FindBestPath( pSoldier, sGridNo, pSoldier->bLevel, WALKING, NO_COPYROUTE, PATH_THROUGH_PEOPLE ) ) )
04643                         {
04644                               return( sGridNo );
04645                         }
04646 
04647                         // If here, try another place!
04648                         // ( alternate up/down )
04649                         if ( bOdd2 ) 
04650                         {
04651                               bAdjustedDist++;        
04652                               
04653                               sGridNo = sStartGridNo;
04654 
04655                               for ( cnt = 0; cnt < bAdjustedDist; cnt++ )
04656                               {
04657                                     sGridNo = (INT16)(sGridNo - WORLD_COLS - 1);
04658                               }
04659                         }
04660                         else
04661                         {
04662                               sGridNo = sStartGridNo;
04663 
04664                               for ( cnt = 0; cnt < bAdjustedDist; cnt++ )
04665                               {
04666                                     sGridNo = (INT16)(sGridNo + WORLD_COLS + 1);
04667                               }
04668                         }
04669 
04670                         bOdd2 = (INT8)(!bOdd2);
04671 
04672                   }
04673                   return NOWHERE;
04674 
04675             case INSERTION_CODE_NORTH:
04676 
04677                   sGridNo                        = (INT16)pSoldier->sGridNo;
04678                   sStartGridNo       = (INT16)pSoldier->sGridNo;
04679                   sOldGridNo     = (INT16)pSoldier->sGridNo;
04680 
04681                   // Move directly to the up!
04682                   while( GridNoOnVisibleWorldTile( sGridNo ) )
04683                   {
04684                         sOldGridNo = sGridNo;
04685 
04686                         if ( bOdd )
04687                         {
04688                               sGridNo -= WORLD_COLS;
04689                         }
04690                         else
04691                         {
04692                               sGridNo--;
04693                         }
04694                         
04695                         bOdd = (INT8)(!bOdd);
04696                   }
04697 
04698                   sGridNo                  = sOldGridNo;
04699                   sStartGridNo = sOldGridNo;
04700 
04701                   while( *puiNumAttempts < MAX_ATTEMPTS )
04702                   {
04703                         (*puiNumAttempts)++;
04704                         // OK, here we go back one, check for OK destination...
04705                         if ( ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & IGNORE_ALL_OBSTACLES ) || ( NewOKDestination( pSoldier, sGridNo, TRUE, pSoldier->bLevel ) && FindBestPath( pSoldier, sGridNo, pSoldier->bLevel, WALKING, NO_COPYROUTE, PATH_THROUGH_PEOPLE ) ) )
04706                         {
04707                               return( sGridNo );
04708                         }
04709 
04710                         // If here, try another place!
04711                         // ( alternate left/right )
04712                         if ( bOdd2 ) 
04713                         {
04714                               bAdjustedDist++;        
04715                               
04716                               sGridNo = sStartGridNo;
04717 
04718                               for ( cnt = 0; cnt < bAdjustedDist; cnt++ )
04719                               {
04720                                     sGridNo = (INT16)(sGridNo - WORLD_COLS + 1);
04721                               }
04722                         }
04723                         else
04724                         {
04725                               sGridNo = sStartGridNo;
04726 
04727                               for ( cnt = 0; cnt < bAdjustedDist; cnt++ )
04728                               {
04729                                     sGridNo = (INT16)(sGridNo + WORLD_COLS - 1);
04730                               }
04731                         }
04732 
04733                         bOdd2 = (INT8)(!bOdd2);
04734 
04735                   }
04736                   return NOWHERE;
04737 
04738             case INSERTION_CODE_SOUTH:
04739 
04740                   sGridNo                        = (INT16)pSoldier->sGridNo;
04741                   sStartGridNo       = (INT16)pSoldier->sGridNo;
04742                   sOldGridNo     = (INT16)pSoldier->sGridNo;
04743 
04744                   // Move directly to the down!
04745                   while( GridNoOnVisibleWorldTile( sGridNo ) )
04746                   {
04747                         sOldGridNo = sGridNo;
04748 
04749                         if ( bOdd )
04750                         {
04751                               sGridNo += WORLD_COLS;
04752                         }
04753                         else
04754                         {
04755                               sGridNo++;
04756                         }
04757                         
04758                         bOdd = (INT8)(!bOdd);
04759                   }
04760 
04761                   sGridNo                  = sOldGridNo;
04762                   sStartGridNo = sOldGridNo;
04763 
04764                   while( *puiNumAttempts < MAX_ATTEMPTS )
04765                   {
04766                         (*puiNumAttempts)++;
04767                         // OK, here we go back one, check for OK destination...
04768                         if ( ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & IGNORE_ALL_OBSTACLES ) || ( NewOKDestination( pSoldier, sGridNo, TRUE, pSoldier->bLevel ) && FindBestPath( pSoldier, sGridNo, pSoldier->bLevel, WALKING, NO_COPYROUTE, PATH_THROUGH_PEOPLE ) ) )
04769                         {
04770                               return( sGridNo );
04771                         }
04772 
04773                         // If here, try another place!
04774                         // ( alternate left/right )
04775                         if ( bOdd2 ) 
04776                         {
04777                               bAdjustedDist++;        
04778                               
04779                               sGridNo = sStartGridNo;
04780 
04781                               for ( cnt = 0; cnt < bAdjustedDist; cnt++ )
04782                               {
04783                                     sGridNo = (INT16)(sGridNo - WORLD_COLS + 1);
04784                               }
04785                         }
04786                         else
04787                         {
04788                               sGridNo = sStartGridNo;
04789 
04790                               for ( cnt = 0; cnt < bAdjustedDist; cnt++ )
04791                               {
04792                                     sGridNo = (INT16)(sGridNo + WORLD_COLS - 1);
04793                               }
04794                         }
04795 
04796                         bOdd2 = (INT8)(!bOdd2);
04797 
04798                   }
04799                   return NOWHERE;
04800 
04801       }
04802 
04803       //Unhandled exit
04804       *puiNumAttempts = 0;
04805 
04806       return( NOWHERE );
04807 }

04809 
04810 void GetLoadedSectorString( UINT16 *pString )
04811 {
04812       if( !gfWorldLoaded )
04813       {
04814             swprintf( pString, L"" );
04815             return;
04816       }
04817       if( gbWorldSectorZ )
04818       {
04819             swprintf( pString, L"%c%d_b%d", gWorldSectorY + 'A' - 1, gWorldSectorX, gbWorldSectorZ );
04820       }
04821       else if( !gbWorldSectorZ )
04822       {
04823             swprintf( pString, L"%c%d", gWorldSectorY + 'A' - 1, gWorldSectorX );
04824       }
04825 }

04827 
04828 void HandleSlayDailyEvent( void )
04829 {
04830       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
04831 
04832       // grab slay
04833       pSoldier = FindSoldierByProfileID( 64, TRUE );
04834 
04835       if( pSoldier == NULL )
04836       {
04837             return;
04838       }
04839 
04840       // valid soldier?
04841       if( ( pSoldier->bActive == FALSE ) || ( pSoldier->bLife == 0 ) || ( pSoldier->bAssignment == IN_TRANSIT ) ||( pSoldier->bAssignment == ASSIGNMENT_POW ) )
04842       {
04843             // no
04844             return;
04845       }
04846 
04847       // ATE: This function is used to check for the ultimate last day SLAY can stay for
04848       // he may decide to leave randomly while asleep...
04849       //if the user hasnt renewed yet, and is still leaving today
04850       if( ( pSoldier->iEndofContractTime /1440 ) <= (INT32)GetWorldDay( ) )
04851       {
04852             pSoldier->ubLeaveHistoryCode = HISTORY_SLAY_MYSTERIOUSLY_LEFT;
04853             TacticalCharacterDialogueWithSpecialEvent( pSoldier, 0, DIALOGUE_SPECIAL_EVENT_CONTRACT_ENDING_NO_ASK_EQUIP, 0, 0 );
04854       }
04855 }

04859 BOOLEAN IsSectorDesert( INT16 sSectorX, INT16 sSectorY )
04860 {
04861       if ( SectorInfo[ SECTOR(sSectorX, sSectorY) ].ubTraversability[ THROUGH_STRATEGIC_MOVE ] == SAND )
04862       {
04863             // desert
04864             return( TRUE );
04865       }
04866       else
04867       {
04868             return( FALSE );
04869       }
04870 }

04873 
04874 BOOLEAN HandleDefiniteUnloadingOfWorld( UINT8 ubUnloadCode )
04875 {
04876       INT32 i;
04877 
04878       // clear tactical queue
04879       ClearEventQueue();      
04880 
04881       // ATE: End all bullets....
04882       DeleteAllBullets();     
04883 
04884       // End all physics objects...
04885       RemoveAllPhysicsObjects();    
04886 
04887       RemoveAllActiveTimedBombs(); 
04888 
04889       // handle any quest stuff here so world items can be affected
04890       HandleQuestCodeOnSectorExit( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ );  
04891 
04892       //if we arent loading a saved game
04893       if( !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & LOADING_SAVED_GAME ) )
04894       {
04895             //Clear any potential battle flags.  They will be set if necessary.
04896             gTacticalStatus.fEnemyInSector = FALSE; 
04897             gTacticalStatus.uiFlags &= ~INCOMBAT;           
04898       }
04899 
04900       if ( ubUnloadCode == ABOUT_TO_LOAD_NEW_MAP )
04901       {     
04902             //if we arent loading a saved game
04903             if( !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & LOADING_SAVED_GAME ) )
04904             {
04905 
04906                   // Save the current sectors Item list to a temporary file, if its not the first time in
04907                   SaveCurrentSectorsInformationToTempItemFile();  
04908 
04909                   // Update any mercs currently in sector, their profile info...
04910                   UpdateSoldierPointerDataIntoProfile( FALSE );   
04911             }
04912       }
04913       else if( ubUnloadCode == ABOUT_TO_TRASH_WORLD )
04914       {
04915             //Save the current sectors open temp files to the disk
04916             if( !SaveCurrentSectorsInformationToTempItemFile() )
04917             {
04918                   ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_WHITE, MSG_TESTVERSION, L"ERROR in SaveCurrentSectorsInformationToTempItemFile()");
04919                   return FALSE;
04920             }
04921 
04922             //Setup the tactical existance of the current soldier.
04923             //@@@Evaluate
04924             for( i = gTacticalStatus.Team[ CIV_TEAM ].bFirstID; i <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ CIV_TEAM ].bLastID; i++ )
04925             {
04926                   if( MercPtrs[ i ]->bActive && MercPtrs[ i ]->bInSector )
04927                   {
04928                         SetupProfileInsertionDataForSoldier( MercPtrs[ i ] );
04929                   }
04930             }
04931 
04932             gfBlitBattleSectorLocator = FALSE;
04933       }
04934 
04935       //Handle cases for both types of unloading
04936       HandleMilitiaStatusInCurrentMapBeforeLoadingNewMap(); 
04937       return TRUE;
04938 }
04939 
04940 BOOLEAN HandlePotentialBringUpAutoresolveToFinishBattle( )
04941 {
04942       INT32 i;
04943 
04944       //We don't have mercs in the sector.  Now, we check to see if there are BOTH enemies and militia.  If both 
04945       //co-exist in the sector, then make them fight for control of the sector via autoresolve.
04946       for( i = gTacticalStatus.Team[ ENEMY_TEAM ].bFirstID; i <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ CREATURE_TEAM ].bLastID; i++ )
04947       {
04948             if( MercPtrs[ i ]->bActive && MercPtrs[ i ]->bLife )
04949             {
04950                   if( MercPtrs[ i ]->sSectorX == gWorldSectorX && 
04951                               MercPtrs[ i ]->sSectorY == gWorldSectorY && 
04952                               MercPtrs[ i ]->bSectorZ == gbWorldSectorZ )
04953                   { //We have enemies, now look for militia!
04954                         for( i = gTacticalStatus.Team[ MILITIA_TEAM ].bFirstID; i <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ MILITIA_TEAM ].bLastID; i++ )
04955                         {
04956                               if( MercPtrs[ i ]->bActive && MercPtrs[ i ]->bLife && MercPtrs[ i ]->bSide == OUR_TEAM )
04957                               {
04958                                     if( MercPtrs[ i ]->sSectorX == gWorldSectorX && 
04959                                                 MercPtrs[ i ]->sSectorY == gWorldSectorY && 
04960                                                 MercPtrs[ i ]->bSectorZ == gbWorldSectorZ )
04961                                     { //We have militia and enemies and no mercs!  Let's finish this battle in autoresolve.
04962                                           gfEnteringMapScreen = TRUE;
04963                                           gfEnteringMapScreenToEnterPreBattleInterface = TRUE;
04964                                           gfAutomaticallyStartAutoResolve = TRUE;
04965                                           gfUsePersistantPBI = FALSE;
04966                                           gubPBSectorX = (UINT8)gWorldSectorX;
04967                                           gubPBSectorY = (UINT8)gWorldSectorY;
04968                                           gubPBSectorZ = (UINT8)gbWorldSectorZ;
04969                                           gfBlitBattleSectorLocator = TRUE;
04970                                           gfTransferTacticalOppositionToAutoResolve = TRUE;
04971                                           if( gubEnemyEncounterCode != CREATURE_ATTACK_CODE )
04972                                           {
04973                                                 gubEnemyEncounterCode = ENEMY_INVASION_CODE; //has to be, if militia are here.
04974                                           }
04975                                           else
04976                                           {
04977                                                 //DoScreenIndependantMessageBox( gzLateLocalizedString[ 39 ], MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, MapScreenDefaultOkBoxCallback );
04978                                           }
04979 
04980               return( TRUE );
04981                                     }
04982                               }
04983                         }
04984                   }
04985             }
04986   }
04987 
04988   return( FALSE );
04989 }
04990 
04991 
04992 BOOLEAN CheckAndHandleUnloadingOfCurrentWorld()
04993 {
04994       INT32 i;
04995       INT16 sBattleSectorX, sBattleSectorY, sBattleSectorZ;
04996 
04997       //Don't bother checking this if we don't have a world loaded.
04998       if( !gfWorldLoaded )
04999       {
05000             return FALSE;
05001       }
05002 
05003       if( gTacticalStatus.fDidGameJustStart && gWorldSectorX == 9 && gWorldSectorY == 1 && !gbWorldSectorZ )
05004       { 
05005             return FALSE;
05006       }
05007 
05008       GetCurrentBattleSectorXYZ( &sBattleSectorX, &sBattleSectorY, &sBattleSectorZ );
05009 
05010       if( guiCurrentScreen == AUTORESOLVE_SCREEN )
05011       { //The user has decided to let the game autoresolve the current battle.
05012             if( gWorldSectorX == sBattleSectorX && gWorldSectorY == sBattleSectorY && gbWorldSectorZ == sBattleSectorZ )
05013             {
05014                   for( i = gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bFirstID; i <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bLastID; i++ )
05015                   { //If we have a live and valid soldier
05016                         if( MercPtrs[ i ]->bActive && MercPtrs[ i ]->bLife && !MercPtrs[ i ]->fBetweenSectors && !(MercPtrs[ i ]->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) && !AM_A_ROBOT( MercPtrs[ i ] ) && !AM_AN_EPC(  MercPtrs[ i ] ) )
05017                         {
05018                               if( MercPtrs[ i ]->sSectorX == gWorldSectorX && 
05019                                           MercPtrs[ i ]->sSectorY == gWorldSectorY && 
05020                                           MercPtrs[ i ]->bSectorZ == gbWorldSectorZ )
05021                               {
05022                                     RemoveSoldierFromGridNo( MercPtrs[ i ] );
05023                                     InitSoldierOppList( MercPtrs[ i ] );
05024                               }
05025                         }
05026                   }
05027             }
05028       }
05029       else
05030       {     //Check and see if we have any live mercs in the sector.  
05031             for( i = gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bFirstID; i <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bLastID; i++ )
05032             { //If we have a live and valid soldier
05033                   if( MercPtrs[ i ]->bActive && MercPtrs[ i ]->bLife && !MercPtrs[ i ]->fBetweenSectors && !(MercPtrs[ i ]->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) && !AM_A_ROBOT( MercPtrs[ i ] ) && !AM_AN_EPC(  MercPtrs[ i ] ))
05034                   {
05035                         if( MercPtrs[ i ]->sSectorX == gWorldSectorX && 
05036                                     MercPtrs[ i ]->sSectorY == gWorldSectorY && 
05037                                     MercPtrs[ i ]->bSectorZ == gbWorldSectorZ )
05038                         { 
05039                               return FALSE;
05040                         }
05041                   }
05042             }
05043             //KM : August 6, 1999 Patch fix
05044             //     Added logic to prevent a crash when player mercs would retreat from a battle involving militia and enemies.
05045             //           Without the return here, it would proceed to trash the world, and then when autoresolve would come up to 
05046             //     finish the tactical battle, it would fail to find the existing soldier information (because it was trashed).
05047     if( HandlePotentialBringUpAutoresolveToFinishBattle( ) )
05048             {
05049                   return FALSE;
05050             }
05051             //end
05052 
05053             //HandlePotentialBringUpAutoresolveToFinishBattle( ); //prior patch logic
05054       }
05055 
05056 
05057       CheckForEndOfCombatMode( FALSE );
05058       EndTacticalBattleForEnemy();
05059 
05060       // ATE: Change cursor to wait cursor for duration of frame.....
05061       // save old cursor ID....
05062       SetCurrentCursorFromDatabase( CURSOR_WAIT_NODELAY );
05063       RefreshScreen( NULL );
05064 
05065       // JA2Gold: Leaving sector, so get rid of ambients!
05066       DeleteAllAmbients();
05067 
05068       if( guiCurrentScreen == GAME_SCREEN )
05069       {
05070             if( !gfTacticalTraversal )
05071             { //if we are in tactical and don't intend on going to another sector immediately, then 
05072                   gfEnteringMapScreen = TRUE;
05073             }
05074             else 
05075             { //The trashing of the world will be handled automatically.
05076                   return FALSE;
05077             }
05078       }
05079 
05080       //We have passed all the checks and can Trash the world.
05081       if( !HandleDefiniteUnloadingOfWorld( ABOUT_TO_TRASH_WORLD ) )
05082       {
05083             return FALSE;
05084       }
05085 
05086       if( guiCurrentScreen == AUTORESOLVE_SCREEN )
05087       { 
05088             if( gWorldSectorX == sBattleSectorX && gWorldSectorY == sBattleSectorY && gbWorldSectorZ == sBattleSectorZ )
05089             {     //Yes, this is and looks like a hack.  The conditions of this if statement doesn't work inside
05090                   //TrashWorld() or more specifically, TacticalRemoveSoldier() from within TrashWorld().  Because
05091                   //we are in the autoresolve screen, soldiers are internally created different (from pointers instead of
05092                   //the MercPtrs[]).  It keys on the fact that we are in the autoresolve screen.  So, by switching the
05093                   //screen, it'll delete the soldiers in the loaded world properly, then later on, once autoresolve is
05094                   //complete, it'll delete the autoresolve soldiers properly.  As you can now see, the above if conditions
05095                   //don't change throughout this whole process which makes it necessary to do it this way.
05096                   guiCurrentScreen = MAP_SCREEN;
05097                   TrashWorld();
05098                   guiCurrentScreen = AUTORESOLVE_SCREEN;
05099             }
05100       }
05101       else
05102       {
05103             TrashWorld();
05104       }
05105 
05106       //Clear all combat related flags.
05107       gTacticalStatus.fEnemyInSector = FALSE;
05108       gTacticalStatus.uiFlags &= ~INCOMBAT;
05109   EndTopMessage( );
05110 
05111 
05112       //Clear the world sector values.
05113       gWorldSectorX = gWorldSectorY = 0;
05114       gbWorldSectorZ = -1;
05115 
05116       //Clear the flags regarding.
05117       gfCaves = FALSE;
05118       gfBasement = FALSE;
05119 
05120       return TRUE;
05121 }
05122 
05123 
05124 
05125 //This is called just before the world is unloaded to preserve location information for RPCs and NPCs either in
05126 //the sector or strategically in the sector (such as firing an NPC in a sector that isn't yet loaded.)  When loading that
05127 //sector, the RPC would be added.
05128 //@@@Evaluate
05129 void SetupProfileInsertionDataForSoldier( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
05130 {
05131       if( !pSoldier || pSoldier->ubProfile == NO_PROFILE )
05132       { //Doesn't have profile information.
05133             return;
05134       }
05135 
05136       if ( gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].ubMiscFlags3 & PROFILE_MISC_FLAG3_PERMANENT_INSERTION_CODE )
05137       //if ( gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].ubStrategicInsertionCode == INSERTION_CODE_PERMANENT_GRIDNO )
05138       {
05139             // can't be changed!
05140             return;
05141       }
05142 
05143       if ( gfWorldLoaded && pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->bInSector )
05144       { //This soldier is currently in the sector
05145 
05146                               //@@@Evaluate -- insert code here
05147                               //SAMPLE CODE:  There are multiple situations that I didn't code.  The gridno should be the final destination
05148                               //or reset???                 
05149 
05150             if ( pSoldier->ubQuoteRecord && pSoldier->ubQuoteActionID )
05151             {
05152                   // if moving to traverse
05153                   if ( pSoldier->ubQuoteActionID >= QUOTE_ACTION_ID_TRAVERSE_EAST && pSoldier->ubQuoteActionID <= QUOTE_ACTION_ID_TRAVERSE_NORTH )
05154                   {
05155                         // Handle traversal.  This NPC's sector will NOT already be set correctly, so we have to call for that too
05156                         HandleNPCChangesForTacticalTraversal( pSoldier );
05157                         gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].fUseProfileInsertionInfo = FALSE;              
05158                         if ( pSoldier->ubProfile != NO_PROFILE && NPCHasUnusedRecordWithGivenApproach( pSoldier->ubProfile, APPROACH_DONE_TRAVERSAL ) )
05159                         {
05160                               gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].ubMiscFlags3 |= PROFILE_MISC_FLAG3_HANDLE_DONE_TRAVERSAL;
05161                         }
05162 
05163                   }
05164                   else
05165                   {
05166                         if ( pSoldier->sFinalDestination == pSoldier->sGridNo )
05167                         {
05168                               gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].usStrategicInsertionData = pSoldier->sGridNo;
05169                         }
05170                         else if ( pSoldier->sAbsoluteFinalDestination != NOWHERE )
05171                         {
05172                               gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].usStrategicInsertionData = pSoldier->sAbsoluteFinalDestination;
05173                         }
05174                         else
05175                         {
05176                               gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].usStrategicInsertionData = pSoldier->sFinalDestination;
05177                         }                 
05178 
05179                         gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].fUseProfileInsertionInfo = TRUE;
05180                         gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].ubStrategicInsertionCode = INSERTION_CODE_GRIDNO;
05181                         gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].ubQuoteActionID = pSoldier->ubQuoteActionID;
05182                         gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].ubQuoteRecord = pSoldier->ubQuoteActionID;
05183                   }
05184             }
05185             else
05186             {
05187                   gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].fUseProfileInsertionInfo = FALSE;
05188             }
05189 
05190       }
05191       else
05192       { //use strategic information
05193 
05194             //It appears to set the soldier's strategic insertion code everytime a group arrives in a new sector.  The insertion data
05195             //isn't needed for these cases as the code is a direction only.
05196             gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].ubStrategicInsertionCode = pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode;
05197             gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].usStrategicInsertionData = 0;
05198             
05199             //Strategic system should now work.
05200             gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].fUseProfileInsertionInfo = TRUE;
05201       }
05202 }
05203 
05204 
05205 void HandlePotentialMoraleHitForSkimmingSectors( GROUP *pGroup )
05206 {
05207       PLAYERGROUP *pPlayer;
05208 
05209   if ( !gTacticalStatus.fHasEnteredCombatModeSinceEntering && gTacticalStatus.fEnemyInSector )
05210   {
05211             //Flag is set so if "wilderness" enemies are in the adjacent sector of this group, the group has
05212             //a 90% chance of ambush.  Because this typically doesn't happen very often, the chance is high.  
05213             //This reflects the enemies radioing ahead to other enemies of the group's arrival, so they have
05214             //time to setup a good ambush!
05215             pGroup->uiFlags |= GROUPFLAG_HIGH_POTENTIAL_FOR_AMBUSH;
05216 
05217         pPlayer = pGroup->pPlayerList;
05218 
05219         while( pPlayer )
05220         {
05221       // Do morale hit...
05222       // CC look here!
05223       // pPlayer->pSoldier 
05224 
05225               pPlayer = pPlayer->next;
05226         }
05227   }
05228 }

05240 }

05243 {
05244       //clean up the code
05245       ReStartingGame();
05246 
05247       //go to the main menu

05251       }

05255       }
